    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>yapuan éva maha ṅiriṅ liriṅ ira ṅgat-gat maség-séṅ smita,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>cumbva méndah arajasa misani yan pojar téka mlad prana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 36 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    330 <lg xml:id="rt_07.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="6r"/><lb n="1"/>tis-tis masa ri liṅairiṅ ravi maṅa luhya ṅadəg riṅ natar,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>tan śobha maṅuré gəluṅ misisakən susva-rjja deniṅ uyaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>marma ṅémbani putra-putran iran eñjuh édan patutan aji,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>tan ryamban kiaudaṅ-kudaṅnira pinak-pak cét tuhan liṅ nira.</l><note>Stanza numbered 37 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    335 <lg xml:id="rt_07.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>yan sore humusiṅ ḍavuh pitu mareṅ taman mahas lalana,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>bhrānta niṅhali cataka naṅis i rém-rémniṅ hima rantayan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>aṅhiṅ lét dinala-déla tiniṅhalan ləṅləṅ mihat riṅ tavaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>lvir muksaṅ kətəriṅ patar sumilib améṅ-péṅ kəḍapniṅ vulat, o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 38 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    340<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagadnātha" xml:id="rt_08" n="7">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_08.01" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/><app><lem>sinevakan</lem><note>Emend sinevakən?</note></app> i ramyaniṅ taman ateki hayuniran apéndahan liriṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>ləmas-ləmas i luṅgahiṅ gaḍuṅ aket mara-marak i təṅahnirāṅlurus,</l>
    345 <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>pucaṅ-pucaṅaniṅ pucaṅ gaḍiṅ aséva miriṅ i gəmuhiṅ payodhara,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>sasañjata puḍaknya teki makəmit ri sétisira parantiniṅ kalé.</l><note>Stanza numbered 39 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_08.02" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>syapéka tan avédya maṅpaṅa ajəṅ-ajəṅira ratuniṅ karasikan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>raras hati huvus manuṅkul anukula turida lara rāga kuṅ lulut,</l>
    350 <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="6v"/><lb n="15"/>lavan rudhita soka harṣa makiris rəṅih umatur i kiṅkiṅiṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>ya téka maharəp-harəp ri səḍəṅiṅ smara bhaya ri daləm pasaṅgaman.</l><note>Stanza numbered 40 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_08.03" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="6v"/><lb n="17"/>aras <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> umulat ajəṅniran abhūṣaṇa kadi-kadi muksa riṅ riṅ səkar,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>adandan aṅivis təṅah linuputan tapih aṅelih ikalaniṅ uyaṅ,</l>
    355 <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>baṅun mupéta rakva luncipi alisnira tahér agəlaṅ-gəlaṅ susu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>savaṅ madhu piniṇḍa manisa manis-manisira tuhu mūrtiniṅ sari.</l><note>Stanza numbered 41 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_08.04" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>laluṅ masa piraṅ kuləm vahu mayat məkara ṅasana muṅgu riṅ taman,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>gərəh jarumana kapat ḍatəṅa maṅaturakəna ri panjrahiṅ səkar,</l>
    360 <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>kapiṅrva tumiba riris ana kilatnya kuməḍap i samipaniṅ révéṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>baṅun majara harṣaniṅ patər anivya ri sira kaharəpnya sémbahén.</l><note>Stanza numbered 42 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_08.05" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>ikaṅ kaka-kaka-daləm puri manahnya paḍa vijah atuṅgalan raras,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>badu anaka mopa vasa kadi hira vajanika mahémbanan laṭi,</l>
    365 <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>anan dadak amahva-mavvani sipatnya karahurana sésa tan ləbur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>makanya masaput-saput pupur avarṇa śaśadhara tinampvaniṅ riris.</l><note>Stanza numbered 43 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_08.06" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>anan kadi tulis ajəṅnyan akéda-kéda aṅadəg avarṇa suṅkava,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>gəluṅnya rumarab mareṅ mukanika miu-miru təpiniṅ tapih lukar,</l>
    370 <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="7r"/><lb n="1"/>lumampah aṅelih-élih kadi tan intara sukunika kabvatan susu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>sapolah ika tan vruh aṅrva kaharəp-kaharəp ika tinuṅku-taṅkulan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 44 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_08.07" n="12">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>apan yan ucapən ayunya kadi muksa vulatana ri kalaniṅ rəməṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>alisnya kadi cataka ṅlayaṅ avarṇa kilat i pamitanya yan lihat,</l>
    375 <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>gərəh ləṅəṅ aganti mandra paṅəsah-paṅəsah ira ri pamrihiṅ sipat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>siris padhani luhnya sarbas i matanya vahu mətu kapəñcəriṅ kakus.</l><note>Stanza numbered 45 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_08.08" n="13">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>ikaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> ri daləm kabeh paḍa huvus vinarah i kaharəp vareśvari,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>méné kuləm ataṅya-taṅya sira rakva maréṅana ri pūrṇaniṅ sasi,</l>
    380 <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>lavan sahana saṅ mamarvani karasikan iki vinarah ginopitan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>parəṅ ḍatəṅa ratri kala marək ahyas adulara matuṅga-tuṅgala.</l><note>Stanza numbered 46 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_08.09" n="14">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>iaṅ saji huvus sumaṅgraha tiniṅkah arəja ri daləm pasaṅgaman,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>sugandha ana dhupa kasturi səkar jənu ana tigasan aṅutkatha,</l>
    385 <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>anan muliha riṅ svara laya hiḍəpniṅ umulat i laṅənya kasrépan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>garantuṅ alaṅa haneṅ yava maganti ṅaraṅin araras rinəṅvakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 47 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_08.10" n="15">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>samantara ri liṅsiriṅ ravi tumuṅgaṅ acala kadi harṣamatuka,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="7v"/><lb n="16"/>anan lumaku-lakvan olih asavaṅ héla-héla miyatiṅ vaṅiṅ purī,</l>
    390 <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>avas pətəṅa pambəkanya kaka havya hiḍəp ira monén katiṅgala,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>nimittanira ṅanti sakṣaṇa ləpas kadi lakuniṅ arés kaciryana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 48 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_08.11" n="16">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>gumanti rumahab limutnya saulésaiṅ akalihan anurun-kén lulut,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>mélés kadi gəluṅ kukar nirada méléh ahirəṅ amarantya-kén riris,</l>
    395 <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>suméṅ-séṅ i vijilnikaṅ śaśadhara vénés alura kəmul-kəmul hima,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>savaṅ mukanin adyah cruk avədin kaharékana kinubda riṅ saṅu. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 49 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" n="8" xml:id="rt_09">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+++\-++\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_09.01" n="1">
    400 <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>sampun yajña manobhaveki ginəlar śrī nātha riṅ lakṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>səṅniṅ rāga sumar haneṅ hati maha ṅgat-gat harəp saṅgama,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>nāhan marmaniran lumampah anilib mañjiṅ mareṅ jro purī,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>tan sah kasihira<!-- unmetr. --> vaṅ<!-- unmetr. read vvaṅ? --> aṅhinya<!-- unmetr. read aṅhyaya? --> ṅiriṅ mvaṅ paṅavin pavahan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 50 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_09.02" n="2">
    405 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="7v"/><lb n="27"/>ndan rakveki titar kadaṅ aji kulanya nvan vidagdhéṅ naya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>katiṅ rat kéta rāga hetuka ṅaranyan pavakiṅ rasika,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>vruh-vruh ry ambəkaniṅ sinévaka bisa ṅriṅ-riṅ manahniṅ tuhan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>sojarnyeki varahniṅ agama tétés siṅgih juga <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> kavi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 51 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_09.03" n="3">
    410 <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>ambək śrī naranātha denya taka harṣa kuṅ lulut kasrépan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>marma ṅgégvani tan sah aṅrahati sojarnya manah saṅ prabhu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>kambaṅniṅ satapatra lagi pamavan kuṅ rumnya muṅgviṅ taṅan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="8r"/><lb n="1"/>tan ryamban hinaras-haras tiniliṅan tiṅhal sumambya ṅucap.</l><note>Stanza numbered 52 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_09.04" n="4">
    415 <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>nāhan liṅnira rāga hetuka vuvusniṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> rəṅən teki-hén,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>ndin gayan vənaṅaṅ madhubrata vasāṅadoh o rarasniṅ səkar,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>ndo harṣa taḍah harṣa haran ri səkarniṅ lek mijil riṅ vəṅi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>ndak tén bhrānta kata kalaṅkyaṅ aharəp riṅ megha kabvan riris.</l><note>Stanza numbered 53 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_09.05" n="5">
    420 <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>nantən teki hatur paṭik aji səkarniṅ cémpaka nvaṅ mənur,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>nir ndon teki rarasnya sampun anəḍəṅ yan tuna ṅantiṅ gəluṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>lavan padapa tan anaéki pakénanya doha saṅkeṅ pipi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>maṅka rāga ṅaranya yaṅ hrétana kiṅkiṅnya tévas tanpa don.</l><note>Stanza numbered 54 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_09.06" n="6">
    425 <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>nāhan teki saharnya rāga karaṇāṅrəñcəm kasekan smara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>sampun prāpta sireṅ daləm tucapa tiṅkahniṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> iṅ jro purī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>kañcit śrī parameśvarī huvus aliṅgih ramya muṅgv iṅ natar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>sakvehniṅ paricārikākrama marək himpor səkarniṅ gəluṅ. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 55 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="sragdhara" n="9" xml:id="rt_10">
    430 <!-- <note type="prosody">++++\-++\-\-\-\-\-\-++\-++\-+=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_10.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>prāpta liṅgih (nr̥pati) sumaṇḍiṅ nr̥pati vasa-vasa nyambana ṅél amakpak,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>ambətniṅ ken kasiṅkab kadi maṅarahakən rāga kiṅkiṅniṅ onəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>suṅsut-suṅsut sudevī lagi kinəda-<hi rend="check">kəda</hi><!-- unmetr. --> muṅgah iṅ jro paturvan,</l>
    435 <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>marma nuntun tan imbā narapati madulur muṅgahiṅ jro jinəm mrik.</l><note>Stanza numbered 56 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_10.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="8v"/><lb n="18"/>ndatan saṅke tan aṅga vuyuṅ ira ta kunəṅ tan sakeṅ lot mapaṅgil,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>aṅhiṅ duké sé héṅniṅ turida kahavaran rumnira murna maṅras,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>marvāṅéo rés tikəlniṅ alis arəṅu ané socaniṅ luh kuməmbəṅ,</l>
    440 <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>tapvan mantén pinak-pak inari-hari təkap saṅ kéda lot rinəṅvan. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 57 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" n="10" xml:id="rt_11">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_11.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>maskv induṅ mapa hetuniṅ miṅo asuṅsut arəṅu-rəṅu éva suṅkava,</l>
    445 <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>ndak ton tapva manis-manisni pamatanta lumihat ibu tan kadiṅ lagi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>siṅ solahkv iki saṅharas pipi anan siniku-siku maṅolakən təṅah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>ndatan kani laraṅku ménva yadiyan ragəta tapaki tuṅtuṅiṅ kuku.</l><note>Stanza numbered 58 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_11.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>ah vantən-ku tan élika salaga riṅ patər akətər anantya-kén riris,</l>
    450 <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>miṅé padapaniṅ jriṅ aṅlih inavosan i paṅalayaniṅ vəlas harəp,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>paṅgil-paṅgilaniṅliraṅ kinayuh iṅ gaḍuṅ aṅelih aṅolakən tavaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>maṅke tki tuhan vuyuṅta sahaja puputa guyu panarkaniṅ hulun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 59 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_11.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>ndah laṅgə̄ṅa muyuṅta rakryan i manéhta pah lalun i pamvitiṅ hulun,</l>
    455 <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>aṅhiṅ teki tuhanku matya kaharəp-ku malabuhana jéṅta riṅ jinəm,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>déṅan śīrṇa kahandhém éṅ susu yadinya kacucuka ri landhépiṅ alis,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>pinta kénta huvun luhar ya rurubaṅ-kva bibi pénjaha riṅ pasaṅgaman.</l><note>Stanza numbered 60 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_11.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="9r"/><lb n="1"/>akara pva gənəp tigaṅ vulan ateki katuturana tāku riṅ tilam,</l>
    460 <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>caṇḍinta kvi raras-rarasta maviluṅ-luṅ lara turidanta riṅ halun,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>ndan yan pūrṇama kala carvana təṅahta saha kusuma layvaniṅ gəluṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>kəmbəṅ-kəmbəṅ luhta majar i lulutta salahasa tiniṅgaliṅ hulun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 61 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_11.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>sampun masa ḍavuh rva yan gumuliṅa pva kita təhər anurva-kén taṅis,</l>
    465 <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>ndan riṅ svapna katéna tāku maṅisapva ṅulu-nyuluha maṅharas pipi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>cumbva véha səpah sakeṅ vaja masa nuculana ri tapihta tan lukar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>ṅka tākun sari-sarya méṅ-péṅ ahajəṅta manékanana kaptiniṅ hulun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 62 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_11.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>nahan liṅnira naṅlipur-lipurakən turida saṅ akiro katasikan,</l>
    470 <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>maṅéh kakvan ikaṅ lulut kadi səkarniṅ asana vahu maṅrəṅa gərəh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>lavan cataka mét riris riṅ apa yan gila-gila ri karəṅvaniṅ patər,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>byakta sinvam arén akəmbaṅa asoka haṅu-haṅun i sampuniṅ hudan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 63 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_11.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>akveh buddhi narendra maṅracana kiṅ-kiṅ araras ṅayu priyambada,</l>
    475 <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>ləṅləṅ yan paṅiduṅ maha ṅudaṅ-udaṅ susu garégétan aṅaras pipi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>siṅ-siṅ rakva vuvus naraṅ-hulu taṅan saha marəka ri jə̄ṅ nareśvarī,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>cab-ṅér vasnira saṅ minaṅkana manisniṅ ujar aṅani padmaniṅ hati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 64 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_11.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="9v"/><lb n="17"/>ambək śrī parameśvari kadi tinaṅhi turidanira tan vavaṅ ləbur,</l>
    480 <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>vahva ṅluṅ-luṅi rāga tan vuruṅ anut tinari-hari lumé pinaṅkvakən,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>vantən aṅganya viraṅ niran vavaṅ asiñjaṅ ira lukara yan kinélakən,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>nahan marma niran lumiṅair akiput-kiputa tiki linuṅsuran tapih.</l><note>Stanza numbered 65 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_11.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>sampun mayu saraga riṅ jinəm aṅantyani turida viniddhyaniṅ smara,</l>
    485 <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>rəp mampəh pavisik-visih mari karəṅvan ujar-ujar aganti tan umuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>aṅhiṅ teki rəṅih-rəṅihnira lavan paṅəsah ira rinuṅva-ruṅvakən,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>nhiṅ ah vus kaka liṅnira mrih anéhak jaja mahénék apan katiṇḍihan. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 66 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="--+-+---+------+-+-=" n="11" xml:id="rt_12">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    490 <lg xml:id="rt_12.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>tadanantareki tumibaṅ ghaṭita təlu ri sampuniṅ gati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>irika ndatan vavaṅ aturva maharəja gəluṅ huvus lukar,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>karəṅa<!-- unmet. read karəṅə̄? --> ana babaniṅ aṅharéki pipi sumambya-suṅ səpah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>avarah ri sihnira silih suval ujar araras rinuṅvakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 67 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    495 <lg xml:id="rt_12.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>avuvus narendra təhər aṅharih-arih aṅucap nareśvarī,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>aharəp sirāṅləṅəṅ alalana mahas-ahas edran iṅ taman,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>təhər aṅrarah kusuma maṅlipura mara haripnikuṅ mata,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>sakatambey eṅjiṅ irikan laris adulur ahimyan-himyanan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 68 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    500 <lg xml:id="rt_12.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>ri huvusnira ṅucap aganti paḍa pituruniṅ karasikan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>aturu ndatan avədi kāla sira huvus amukti saṅgama,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>kisikiṅ huləs mari karəṅva ṅésésan aṅésah silih gupi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>hana ken lukar kavadal asriṅ aluluman aṅanti riṅ dagan. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 69 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    505<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" n="12" xml:id="rt_13">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_13.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="10r"/><lb n="1"/>sakvehniṅ paricārikā glar amajaṅ vulan atiki gumanti varṇanən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>akveh bhāvanika<!-- unmetr. --> anan paṅiduṅ asraṅ amaca-maca maṅgəlar nita,</l>
    510 <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>len tekaṅ magaməl anan panalukat ləṅgəṅ araras aliṅgih iṅ natar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>dudva bhava kalen na visik asuṅ-suṅan ujar amirəṅva-rəṅvakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 70 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_13.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="10r"/><lb n="5"/>strī-strī vr̥ddha mateki saṅ kili karaṇḍan anuha-nuha riṅ paguṇḍikan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>aśrī bhāvaniran hanāṅulih-ulih kaka-kaka marək asraṅ aṅrubuṅ,</l>
    515 <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>mar tvasnyan kəna raga-ragan aṅucap saha guyu-guyu lagi tan umuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>hetunyan paməkul ri rovaṅ ika marək-arəkana <app><lem type="emn">aṅukur-</lem><rdg wit="#JK">aṅukr-</rdg></app>ṅukur gəluṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 71 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_13.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>ndah vanton rara kanyaka réja savaṅ vulan aluru ri paṅlvaṅiṅ kapat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>ndan rakveki hələm gatinya tarima-kéna mayugala rāga hetuka,</l>
    520 <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>nahan hetuniṅ asmu suṅsut aviraṅ-viraṅa tiki yadin kinavruhan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>marmanya masaṅ ambak abvat avuyuṅ pinaca-pacəhan nambya-kén taṅis.</l><note>Stanza numbered 72 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_13.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>luṅhāṅdoh amisanta ri vitiṅ asoka gumuliṅ arurub-rurub səkar,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="10v"/><lb n="14"/>tan tévon lukariṅ tapih susus-susupnya kasarakat alum katindhidan,</l>
    525 <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>tan samvas rarabiṅ raréb-raréb anis rəsəp analasi gatraniṅ huləs,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>ndatan vruh mata yan tinaṅhi təkapiṅ kamula marək akon amuṅgaha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 73 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_13.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>len tekaṅ madulur-dulur kalih atuntunan araras arumpukan mənur,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>sə̄ṅ-séṅ rāga vuvusnya nojar akalib tinuna-tuna tinuṅtuṅan guyu,</l>
    530 <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>lila liṅgih ararya-raryan akéda-kéda kaguliṅan iṅ sila tala,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>ləs mrém teki paḍa harip sumaputaṅ mata sahaja katurvan iṅ natar.</l><note>Stanza numbered 74 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_13.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>eñjiṅ māsa huvus ḍavuh valu paréṅ nr̥pati vahu mijil sakeṅ jinəm,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>prāptaṅ kumba padamvandhamvanira sampun arəja sumonaha riṅ batur,</l>
    535 <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>len tekaṅ kaka sampun arpat akiré marək i sira manampa pahyasan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>riṅ ambyan sira yan maliṅgih ajajar mapédhé-pəḍək akalihan uləs.</l><note>Stanza numbered 75 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_13.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>byatitan ri huvusnira hyas umaréṅ taman adulur atun-tunan taṅan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>guṇḍik ramya paḍa dulur kaka-kaka nvam arəja kadi panjrahiṅ səkar,</l>
    540 <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>tan tva-mbaknya maha ṅlipur-lipurakən haripi matanika majaṅ sasi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>luṅhāṅadéh aṅalap səkar saka harəpnya vija-vijah arumpukan gaḍuṅ. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 76 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="śikhariṇī" n="13" xml:id="rt_14">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+++++\-\-\-\-\-++\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_14.01" n="1">
    545 <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>ri piṅgir-piṅgirniṅ<!-- unmetrical --> ve akaraṅ apañjaṅ maṅililan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>maṅaləṅləṅ luhya nr̥pati lumiyat kalih adulur,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="11r"/><lb n="1"/>ləṅəṅnyāhimpər sāgara mapasir iṅ groṅnya mahurus,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>mapaṇḍan rambat tūt sisi<!-- unmetrical. sīsi? --> kadi təṅah sampun aṅisis.</l><note>Stanza numbered 77 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_14.02" n="2">
    550 <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>ri tuṅha-tuṅhaniṅ pasisi pidaṇḍanya njrah asəkar,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>anan miṅgək rupanya hinupuk-upukniṅ ryak alaṅa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>ru vahnya ṅantiṅ karaṅ aluṅid arja riṅi-riṅi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>vias-vas tan péndah kadi susu kanin śīrṇa kakuku.</l><note>Stanza numbered 78 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_14.03" n="3">
    555 <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>ri duṅhusnya grət-grət pasi-pasir ika taṇḍəs aratha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>tinampvan-tampvan deniṅ alun agəṅ adyūs amalapar,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>kasiṅkab-siṅkab venya maṅəmuki paṇḍanya <app><lem type="emn">ri</lem><rdg wit="#JK">riṅ</rdg></app> təpi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>lumimbak ryak-ryaknyānikəl asəmu siñjaṅ linuputan. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 79 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="kilayu anəḍəṅ" n="14" xml:id="rt_15">
    560 <!-- <note type="prosody">++\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_15.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>prāsāda ləṅəṅ i təṅahiṅ taman sphaṭika kumram inukir aruhur,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>śuddhākiris aṅulap-ulap kasə̄ṅan i kəñarniṅ aruṇan umijil,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>aṅhiṅ para-parani limutnya niñjaṅ avəlun-vəlunan alimunan,</l>
    565 <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>hyaṅ candra mabaṅun aviraṅ tumona ri pucaknya dumilah asinaṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 80 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_15.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="11v"/><lb n="15"/>ṅkanan nr̥pati parəṅ umuṅgah asraṅ aruhun-ruhunana ta sira,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>ṅhiṅ tan sah ira téka rāga hetuka mapavahani sira marək,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>léng-léng lumiyati haləpiṅ lurah sinaput iṅ limut amaya-maya,</l>
    570 <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>megha hirəṅ aménuhi kéṅkulan hudan ikaṅ traṅa aniraṅ anisih. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 81 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" n="15" xml:id="rt_16">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_16.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>ṅkāne sornya <hi rend="check">kadava</hi><!-- unmetrical --> gurvan asənət muṅgviṅ luvukniṅ gəgər,</l>
    575 <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>aṅlistiṅ gupuranya maṅharəpakən lvah gə̄ṅ təlas vinvatan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>aṅde harṣa tiniṅhalan həduk i raṅkaṅnyāṅjəlag kesisan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>tan vaspada patumpa-tumpanikanaṅ merv aruhur koṅkulan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 82 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_16.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>deśa pveki kunəṅ kasimpar arénés tis-tis hənunya samun,</l>
    580 <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>rantun-rantunaniṅ hima dulu-dulur sampun madadyan riris,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>kuntalnya sraṅ anambayaṅ ləyəp adoh muksa nusup riṅ rəməṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>aṅhiṅ mraknya jənək manavaṅ alaṅa <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> matra tan vaspada.</l><note>Stanza numbered 83 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_16.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>lor vetanya ləbak-ləbak pasavahan ramya tata tut lurah,</l>
    585 <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>himpər sāgara maṅlurak-lurak arés tvasniṅ miyat kasrépan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>ləṅləṅ yan dinéla baṅun tan arata piṇḍanya diniṅ limut,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>muksa misra lavan laṅit pətəṅ adoh yāṅkən pətəṅniṅ ravi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 84 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_16.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>ramya thani ḍusun-ḍusun kuṭi ləvas caṇḍinya tan kambarah,</l>
    590 <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>vuṅva-njrah ri aatarnya sampun anəḍəṅ śīrṇa gumantén ləvas,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>pantəs teki parantyaniṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> ahañaṅ kalih kakuṅnya dulur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>luṅāṅdoha mamét hurip masənə̄tan hetunya muṅsir kadaṅ. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 85 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="citravilāpa" n="16" xml:id="rt_17">
    595 <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-+\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-\-+\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_17.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>makin alaṅā naranātha miyati ləṅəṅiṅ vanadeśa ləyəp,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>gunuṅ aruhur giri vindhya kaparək i <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenright">samīpa</lem><rdg wit="#JK">sam<del rend="strikeout">p</del>ipa-</rdg></app>nikiṅ nagara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>para-paraniṅ mahas aṅləṅəṅ asaṅu tanah ləpihan vinava,</l>
    600 <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>masənətan ahyun améta kaləṅəṅiṅ anantva kiduṅ kakavin.</l><note>Stanza numbered 86 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_17.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="12r"/><lb n="1"/>lvah ika saké ruhur agra tuməḍun aṅəné paraṅan gumuruh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>gumulakan iṅ éra madras amalhar i tusnya katon abiru,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>asana vuṅu jriṅ asoka kahili saha padapa kumram avon,</l>
    605 <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>hana kadi layvaniṅ adya sari ruhur amet ayu tīrtha gama.</l><note>Stanza numbered 87 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_17.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>paraṅan arés i mukanya tumayuṅ i rəṅatnya baṅun rébaha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>savaṅ hinukir ta rupanika kadi macavintén agatra muṅup,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>hana kadi caṇḍi sila tuvan inavitiṅ cdvad akét avilət,</l>
    610 <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>vé ika mélés humis adaravéyan aputih tinuduh-tuduhan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 88 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_17.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>rari liyatiṅ pataptan kadi siluman iṅ agra katon aṅisis,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>hana kuməḍap mavalantaga baṅun aṅavésa makon umara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>makin ahaləp maka gopura véléki limutnya suméṅ aruhur,</l>
    615 <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>ləyəp anamar ari loka pavulatanika kinédhap-kəḍapan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 89 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_17.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>hələm ibu yadyapi ta ṅvaṅ atuha ləvaséṅ viṣaya pva huvus,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>arəsəh akétya karaja vibhavan avaneh maṅiva karatun,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>luməkasa tāku lavan kita mahasa atiṅgala rājasabhā,</l>
    620 <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>umusira pad bhaṭāra kəta manusupeṅ giriśr̥ṅga mavan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 90 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_17.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="12r"/><lb n="17"/>kaka tan ika kaharəp-ku mahas-ahas adoha sakeṅ nagara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>masalaha vīrya manambuta kasaṅ i harəp-ku lumakva kavi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="12v"/><lb n="19"/>lévu mara ramyaniṅ anjajaha pasir ataṇḍaha deśa lényap,</l>
    625 <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>suka yadiyan pojah oṅ karaṅ akalihana təpiniṅ jaladhi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 91 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_17.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>nahan ika nojar ira srépati masahuran maṅucap kaharop,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>hana ri hiriṅnira stuka umatur aséṅ gayu-guyva kalib,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>paṭik aji maṅavinakəna karas tanah arja siṅi,</l>
    630 <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>palarən anirsa kavi svara tumuta pəjah dadahéṅ pasisi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 92 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_17.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>vau uménéṅ paṅucap nr̥pati ana ta teja katon asinaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>kadi-kadi candra sava kalaṅan ajéja bhāsvara konaṅ-unaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>iniṅət-hiṅətnira kalih umulat ahulap mataviṅ luṅayan,</l>
    635 <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>hana r̥ṣi <app><lem type="norm">nārada</lem><rdg wit="#JK">naradha</rdg></app> muṅvi təṅah atiti vaspada yan kaparək.</l><note>Stanza numbered 93 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_17.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>ḍatəṅ aṅadəg ri harəp yaya sira maṅabhivada ri saṅ nrpati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>tumuluy asanti mupakṣama aira paḍa harṣa mulat magiraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>padi madulur tumameṅ pura sira sukha yar sinégé-sigéhan,</l>
    640 <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>hana kéta padya sumaṅgraha saha saréh arja madhupa marum. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 94 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="basantatilakā" n="17" xml:id="rt_18">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">++\-+\-\-\-+\-\-+\-+=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>nāhan vuvus nr̥pati bhāgya ta saṅ maharṣi,</l>
    645 <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>maṅkén ḍatəṅ ry anupa deśa taman təmuṅ don,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>tis-tis ndatan hana bhinakti kuraṅ kalaṅvan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>siṅgih mateki puraniṅ prabhu hīnaśakti.</l><note>Stanza numbered 95 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>nan liṅ narendra sumahur vara paṇḍita kya,</l>
    650 <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>é vruh ṅhulun ri kita yan prabhu siṅha dhairya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>aṅhiṅ mateki pinujiṅ rans cakraniṅ rat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="40"/>saṅ laṅgə̄ṅa sivinén iṅ bhuvanandha don-ta</l><note>Stanza numbered 96 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="13r"/><lb n="1"/> sakvahni saṅ prabhu samapta kabeh paḍa tvaṅ,</l>
    655 <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>ndatan aneki vanya laṅghyana siṅ pakon-ta,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>bhaktya nukula ya umandhém i pādukan-ta,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>masnana sityasa lébuni pada dvayan-ta.</l><note>Stanza numbered 97 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>śaktinta hetunika yan mapagəh rikiṅ rat,</l>
    660 <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>saṅ sādhu teki pari dhalana de narārya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>vaṅ duṣṭa tan hana rinaksa dhinandha sikaya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>sojarniṅ agama tinut pinako-pa pati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 98 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>samanta riṅ bhuvana tékya pavé praharṣa,</l>
    665 <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>dhananta yeka magave sukha tanpa hiṅgan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>bhéddhanta yeka mégavé vara niścayéṅ tvas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>daṇḍanta yeka magave vədiniṅ tumiṅhal.</l><note>Stanza numbered 99 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>vantən mateki pavəkas-vəkas-ṅkva natha,</l>
    670 <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>avay rəsəh palé-paléh magave karakṣan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>rakséka nojarira saṅ prabhu śakty atiga,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>rapvan rinaksa vidhi nātha təkap nikiṅ rat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 100 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="13r"/><lb n="16"/>kéliknikaṅ bhuvana havya giṇeṅ hinambah,</l>
    675 <l n="b"><lb n="17"/>kahyunta yeka gavéyénta maraṅ sukaṅ rat,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="18"/>sampun pva yan kakavasé-ka təkap narendra,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="19"/>byskta mavéh sukha lavan pagəhiṅ kaśaktin.</l><note>Stanza numbered 101 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="20"/>lavan muvah pari varanta pilih təkapta,</l>
    680 <l n="b"><lb n="21"/>siṅ yogya maṅavina rajya vnéka niti,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="22"/>sadhunya sampun apagəh riṅ ulah tan himba,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="23"/>ambəknya sampun apagəh magave kabhaktyan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 102 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="24"/>silanya yeka magave sukaniṅ tumiṅhal,</l>
    685 <l n="b"><lb n="25"/>sankép ya riṅ guna ané riya tan anāṅsal,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="26"/>sastrājña dharma ginavenya jagaddhitéṅ rat,</l>
    . <l n="d"> <pb edRef="#JK" n="13v"/>27 ndatan vavaṅ maṅaka buddhi maṅaṅkas-aṅkas.</l><note>Stanza numbered 103 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="28"/>maṅko svabhavanikanaṅ pilihən narendra,</l>
    690 <l n="b"><lb n="29"/>siṅ karya yogya sara bhara-kénanta rirya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="30"/>svastaṅ jagad niyata yan kavasé-ka dénya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="31"/>byakta karakṣa kita tan hana dur-asan-ta.</l><note>Stanza numbered 104 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="32"/>yapvan ana ṅaku kasadhun iké ryavoknya,</l>
    695 <l n="b"><lb n="33"/>bhaṅga bhimana juga tan tuha sādhu buddhi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="34"/>lésyana yan harəpa vīrya kuraṅ gunanya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="35"/>nicca svabhavanika yogya tibana daṇḍa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 105 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.12" n="12">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="36"/>yadyan priyanta kétika yadi vandu varga,</l>
    700 <l n="b"><lb n="37"/>ndah yan kinélikan ulahnya təkapnikaṅ rat,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="38"/>ayvé-ka trésna kita duhkha təmahnya tésén,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="39"/>yan hat-hatén ṅuni-ṅunin vənaṅ opa patya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 106 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.13" n="13">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="40"/>aṅhiṅ jagat ya juga mitra kadaṅ narendra,</l>
    705 <l n="b"><lb n="41"/>mataṅya yogya gavéyéṅa sukanya dan-ta,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="42"/>yadyan matoha ri huripta magə̄ṅ yasan-ta,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="43"/>yapvan rumakṣa jana sādhu rumakṣa dharma.</l><note>Stanza numbered 107 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.14" n="14">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="44"/>ndan yatna-yatna ta kita naku riṅ sva karya,</l>
    710 <l n="b"><lb n="45"/>mvaṅ sevaké kita déla yateka takap-ta,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="46"/>solahnya yeka pilihanta lavan haturnya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="47"/>akveh ulahnya kavuvunnya paḍa padudvan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 108 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.15" n="15">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="48"/>ndah vantən hartha ginəlarnya pasevakannya,</l>
    715 <l n="b"><lb n="49"/>mvaṅ śabda siṅ rata maadva sadénya mojar,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="50"/>len kama yékana giṇeṅaya haturnya tam-tam,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="51"/>ta ton mara ika lamun katəkana vīrya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 109 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_18.16" n="16">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="14r"/><lb n="1"/> yoko musuhta bapa ayva kita pramada,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>saṅsāra duhkha paparihnya paro-pa vada,</l>
    720 <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>vavaṅ ika ta juga rovaṅaniṅ magosti,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>rapvan tan éṅguṅ apagəh mara ka-prabhun-ta.</l><note>Stanza numbered 110 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.17" n="17">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="14r"/><lb n="5"/>saṅsipta teki péṅucap-ku rəṅən narendra,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>saṅka-ryasih-ku bapa tan sakari kanintan,</l>
    725 <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>vétniṅ géma-géména tāku ri pémbakan-ta,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>riṅ svarga déva paḍa harṣa manadhukara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 111 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.18" n="18">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>na hetuniṅ hulun ateki ḍataṅ kamantyan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>saṅké rikaṅ bharatha varṣa matāku ṅuni,</l>
    730 <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>lila ləṅəṅ mahas-ahas téka riṅ samudra,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>vélanya dakṣiṇa paraṅ-ku sipiṅ kalaṅvan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 112 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.19" n="19">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>akveh karaṅ-karaṅ aṅgul adanta-danta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>maluntuh adrəs amagut mukaniṅ karaṅ-groṅ,</l>
    735 <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>lumra gəlar-gəlara tan kya sirat-siratnya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>ṅkana ṅhulun mahas anuddha uyaṅniṅ ambək.</l><note>Stanza numbered 113 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.20" n="20">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>paksāṅku matuka mateki ana dbhuta bhra,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>ṅké-ṅké kato ryarah-arahnikanaṅ kadhatvan,</l>
    740 <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>énda hdilahni gupuranya dudug lumandéṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>lumréṅ bhuvah pada sénonya lumə̄ṅ sateja.</l><note>Stanza numbered 114 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.21" n="21">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>marmāṅku yan ḍatəṅa padgata kala maṅké,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>mahyun vruhé sabha narāry anupa ti śobha,</l>
    745 <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>maṅke pva niścaya ri kādbhutaṅiṅ kadhatvan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>svarga hulap mulat apiṇḍa kavés kagéman.</l><note>Stanza numbered 115 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.22" n="22">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>āścarya buddhi mami harṣa mulat kapuhan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>siṅgih prabhūttama viśeṣa sudhiraśakti,</l>
    750 <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>saṅ tan kapaṅ-paṅa kulanta lavan gunan-ta,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>dirgghya-yu rastu jaya śatru jagad pramana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 116 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.23" n="23">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="14v"/><lb n="29"/>vdan srya-rjuno-ki maṅupa-ksama-rya pasaṅgup.</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>antyanta bharani vijilni vuvuv maharṣi,</l>
    755 <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>ayveki tan tulus asih vara paṇḍité-ṅrat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>varan mréteki pituturta haneṅ hati-ṅaku.</l><note>Stanza numbered 117 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_18.24" n="24">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>aṅhiṅ yaśeki kaharəp mami dadya vr̥ddhi,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>maṅrakṣa sādhu hitaniṅ jagat taṅ kinārya,</l>
    760 <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>ndan yan hana mapaga vīrya lavan kaśaktin,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>maṅgəh ṅulun pəjaha riṅ raṇa tan dadi jrih. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 118 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="rt_19" n="18">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>nāhan teki vuvus narādhipati tan liṅgar pagəhniṅ hati,</l>
    765 <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>tan sah śrī parameśvarī hana ri saṇḍiṅ śry arjunāṅrəṅvakən,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>harṣāmbək r̥ṣi <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenright">nāradā</lem><rdg wit="#JK">naradha</rdg></app>ṅulih-ulih maṅkilane saṅ prabhu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="40"/>akveh parva kathātiramya sahaneṅ <app><lem type="emn">svargenucap</lem><rdg wit="#JK">svarga nucap</rdg></app> tan kara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 119 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="41"/>tatkāle paṅucapnireki hana haṅsa sraṅ maśabdeṅ ruhur,</l>
    770 <l n="b"><lb n="42"/>mér ṅkāneṅ gaganāṅlayaṅ bhramita ya mét bhoga luṅha dulur,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="43"/>rimpar megha riniṅhalan malulunan ṅkāneṅ ruhurniṅ purī,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="44"/>tan péndah kadi śabdaniṅ gélap aghāṣa ṅrik karuṅviṅ laṅit. </l><note>Stanza numbered 120 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="14v"/><lb n="45"/>āścaryeki manah narendra lumihat tan vruh riṅ upadgata,</l>
    775 <l n="b"><lb n="46"/>apan riṅ danu tan aneki karəṅa kaliṅ niré-jro hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="47"/>nahan out niran patakvan ri saṅkan avaṅ ri paranyeki hén,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="48"/>lavan donya ḍataṅ mapeka ta knaṅ mojar maha paṇḍita.</l><note>Stanza numbered 121 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="15r"/><lb n="1"/>e nāthaṅku nihan rəṅən vara-varahniṅvaṅ ri saṅ bhūpati,</l>
    780 <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>vantén tīrtha ri vindhusara kéta śobhātyanta riṅ nirmala,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>kédran denikanaṅ gunuṅ makaṅaran konja ruhur bhīṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>prayāṅkén paraniṅ hulun mahas atīrtha mrih madévāśraya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 122 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>ndah ṅkāneki sabha-sabhanya jənək akveh bhoga tan pantara,</l>
    785 <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>njrah taṅ paṅkaja len sugandhika sugandhra srak hrəbuknya vaṅi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>kumbaṅ lot makaraṅ-karaṅ kumuda modran matta deniṅ sari,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>hréṅnya ganti manoharan masahuran mvaṅ aṅsa muṅgviṅ bañu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 123 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>lavan tan kavənaṅ lumaṅghyanana vérnya aṅsa vétniṅ ruhur,</l>
    790 <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>himpər parvata méru puncak ikahaṅ konja haləp durgama,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>tovin tan hana teki mérgga avananya luṅa maṅlalana,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>hetunyan bhravita péga kuliliṅan tut lambuṅiṅ parvata.</l><note>Stanza numbered 124 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>maṅke pvan ana askti padndhita dhanur sastrājña visnva-tmaka,</l>
    795 <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>khyātiṅ rat kota rama bhārgava panéṅgahniṅ jagat kétiama,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>ləṅkap ṅhiṅ pinaka-gra sénanira tan sah paṅhilaṅniṅ musuh,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>trus tekaṅ giri konja deni tapakiṅ hru śakti tan popama.</l><note>Stanza numbered 125 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>malva lyani guhanya kādbhuta maṅaṅ himpər tutukniṅ gunuṅ,</l>
    800 <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>paravanyeki sayat sayéjana lébanya tyanta riṅ bhīṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="15v"/><lb n="19"/>durgé-véh (bhīṣaṇa)ri daləm yatekana tinutnya aṅsa ramya dulur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>hetunyan katəka ḍatəṅ ry anupa madran riṅ tavaṅ tut rəməṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 126 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>saṅksepanya bapāṅku śaktinikanaṅ rama pagəh niścaya,</l>
    805 <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>sék riṅ svarga huvus prakasa karəṅa riṅ vriya lavan guna,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>yadyastun bhuvaneki dadya kaharəpnya tan vənaṅ laṅghyana,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>apan ṅhiṅ sinahaya saṅ prabhu ri katanyan marép mapraṅa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 127 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>nāhan de r̥ṣi <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenright">nāradā</lem><rdg wit="#JK">naradha</rdg></app>muji kaśaktin rama nissaṅśaya,</l>
    810 <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>yāṅde salyani buddhi saṅ nr̥pati himpər bahni muṅgviṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>apan tan kavənaṅ rumuṅvi-ka aśaktya-nani yaṅ savaneh,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>hetunya ṅabhimana tuṣṭa maṅadəg taṅ bajra muṅgviṅ muka.</l><note>Stanza numbered 128 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>é saṅ <app><lem type="norm">nārada</lem><rdg wit="#JK">naradha</rdg></app> nyva saṅśaya kita śaktinya tan popama,</l>
    815 <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>yadyan rama sahasra tan dadi matakut védhya denyeṅ raṇa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>mvaṅ yan sāgara tulya śaktinika himpər méru riṅ bhīṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>dik tan sy arjuna tāku yanya yadiyan tan matya deṅkv iṅ raṇa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 129 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.12" n="12">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>saṅksepanya halém-halém ṅhulun amet oṅgvanya réṅva-kéna,</l>
    820 <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>donén siṅ kahananya deṅkva pususén hopénya héntya-kéna,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>yadyan muṅsira riṅ siva-ndha ṅunivéh brahma-ndha maṅhét taya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>tutén tan hana teki-hén paritahan soṅgvanya nastha-kéna.</l><note>Stanza numbered 130 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.13" n="13">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="15v"/><lb n="37"/>van liṅ srya-rjuna mojar aaru kumatuṅ taṅ krédha tan pantara,</l>
    825 <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>harṣāmbək r̥ṣi <app><lem type="norm">nārada</lem><rdg wit="#JK">naradha</rdg></app> ciha-ciha mvit mantuk én saṅ prabhu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="16r"/><lb n="1"/>luṅha tékya avan tavaṅ huvus adéh ṅkan śīghra muksé ruhur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>prāpteṅ svarga tumuntén nvara-varah vratta ana praṅ hələm.</l><note>Stanza numbered 131 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_19.14" n="14">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>ndan saṅ śrī nara narha mogha katəkan duhkha niké jro hati,</l>
    830 <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>aṅhiṅ rama jugeki rakva magave hrakṣalya saṅ bhūpati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>tan kva-mbéknira teki tan kadiṅ husana bvat vavaṅ suṅkava,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>aṅhiṅ teki viveka yé-niṅət-hiṅət riṅ tvas minuṣṭiṅ hiḍəp. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 132 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" n="19" xml:id="rt_20">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    835 <lg xml:id="rt_20.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>buddhi śrī parameśvarī sinaput iṅ turida təkapi gə̄ṅnikuṅ lara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>vruh-vruh rakva (manah) sire manah nr̥pati tan katahənan i dilahnikiṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>lāvan deni varah maharṣi ri kaśaktinira paraśurāma kādbhuta,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>yāṅde duhkha kinubda tan kəna linālana mavətu taṅin tinurvakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 133 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    840 <lg xml:id="rt_20.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>onék buddhinireki tan hana hiḍəp aira manémana sésthiniṅ manah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>aṅhiṅ lot viniveka yeka ṅén-aṅan sakarana aji marya duhkita,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>antuk riṅ vəkasan mateki ana rakva kira-kira niéṅ dalam hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>ndan rakveki mané ḍatəṅ nr̥pati riṅ śayana sira manambya taṅgéha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 134 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    845 <lg xml:id="rt_20.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>nahan hetuniṅ éhyas amrih asénaha sa-maṅinaki riṅ nareśvara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>siñjaṅ caṅvli huvus kinasturi sugandha kadi hima kasénvaniṅ sasi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>mvaṅ raṅkaṅ paḍa hinyasan jamanika-nu kinuliliṅakən təkeṅ dagan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="16v"/><lb n="18"/>siṅ solahnira māṅlada gavéya marna aji matatur éṅ smara tura.</l><note>Stanza numbered 135 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    850 <lg xml:id="rt_20.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>sotan kalanireki muṅgah i paturvanira kadi maha gavé lutut,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>kiṅ-kiṅ rāga manis-manisnira luṅidiṅ mata vaja umadhaṅ sinajyakən,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>len tekaṅ lurusiṅ təṅah saha payodhara təmunén i saṅ maraṅ jinəm,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>ndah sampun suménaha taṅ pupur umuṅgvi pipi pinék amaṅya-maṅyani.</l><note>Stanza numbered 136 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    855 <lg xml:id="rt_20.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>tég kumvaṅ gatīta rva vahu tumiba marvṅi kətəri nalaniṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>nyér kvi tvas kumaras-raras kadi katona nr̥pati ḍatəṅ aṅ pasaṅgaman,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>marma ṅolakəna ṅisapva néhér aṅarékana pipi sambya suṅ səpah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>ṅkana śrī parameśvarī majar i kiṅ-kiṅ ira tohér anamba-nambaha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 137 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    860 <lg xml:id="rt_20.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>maṅke pvan lalu masa tan taka narendra yatiki vinavéta riṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>suṅsut-suṅsut iran təmah luh aṅsapta ri pipi vélés aniram pupur,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>tan ryamban gumuliṅ sumuṅkém akaraṅ hulu ləṅən asaput-saput sabuk,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>amrém karva karasnira ṅisék-isék néhér aṅucap arantanan taṅis. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 138 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    865<div type="canto" rend="met" met="kilayu anəḍəṅ" n="20" xml:id="rt_21">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">++\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_21.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>rakryan ndi karika paṅucapta ṅūni ri səḍəṅku vahu kakavaśa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>marmāṅari-ari mavarah ri sihta sahaja mətu-mətu kalaṅə̄n,</l>
    870 <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>mojar saha śapatha sinākṣyaniṅ ratih i kālaniṅ akarasikan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>vantənku kaka aja kita ndatan vənaṅa teku luhika riṅ ujar.</l><note>Stanza numbered 139 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_21.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>maṅke pva vəkasani lutut ta ṅūni kadi tan papuput atilara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>vruh-ku pva gisi-gisiniṅ harəṅ-harəṅ i sihta kadi kaluputan,</l>
    875 <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>marya-kéni paṅəsahaniṅ kinévala kiteku tan avih iṅ asih,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>ambəkta kaka kadi gaḍuṅ məkar paḍa tatan panébasi kalaran.</l><note>Stanza numbered 140 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_21.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="17r"/><lb n="1"/>mvaṅ donku harəp i ḍatəṅanta riṅ śayana tan hana kinira-kira,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>siṅgih mata ana kaharəp-ku majara taṅis-ku yata kaṅ ucapən,</l>
    880 <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>mvat-vata kayali-yalin-ku vatni vana-sih tiki tan alaṅ-alaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>tapvan marəsəhi paṅamérta tan varəg anam-tami vəkasiṅ ulah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 141 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_21.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>nahan péṅuap ira mavéh raras hati təhər tuna-tuna séségén,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>ndan śrī narapati ana riṅ taman sira lumalana-kénāṅən-aṅən,</l>
    885 <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>ri vitniṅ asana gumuliṅ sira mrém sharp tarika kavalésan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>ṅhiṅ tan sah i sira rāga hetuka marək-marək aṅisapu jéṅ. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 142 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagadnātha" n="21" xml:id="rt_22">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_22.01" n="1">
    890 <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>atīta rahineki vāhu suməna hyaṅ <hi rend="check">aruṇa nijil</hi><!-- mijil? --> aṅrarah limut,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>narendra tumuluy mareṅ pura ḍatəṅ ta sira ri kahanan nareśvarī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>hañar təka sakeṅ padhamvan hiniriṅniṅ uva kaka anéka māṅdulur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>aliṅgih i harəp narendra <hi rend="check">majar-jajar</hi> asəmu paliṅgih iṅ tulis.</l><note>Stanza numbered 143 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_22.02" n="2">
    895 <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>vavaṅ nr̥pati mojar induṅ apa hetuniṅ avénés anambva-kén raras,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>baṅun hana laranta masku masépég-sépéṅ i jaja təkeṅ payédhara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>vuvusnira təhər vasa ṅusap-suap muka saṅ ahayu kémbéhan manis,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="17v"/><lb n="16"/>kataṅgama masuṅ səpah sira sumbya ṅucap analimur puték hati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 144 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_22.03" n="3">
    900 <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>anambəki kakanta masku laris aṅləṅəṅ amahas-ahas lavan kita,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>para prabhu kabeh ya māṅdulura ramya saha bala samuha véhana,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>asiṅ sakaharəpta masku parananta kuṭi-kuṭi sudharma paryaṅan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>yadin ləpasa tan hiṅana ḍatəṅ éṅ pasir alaléh umuṅgah éṅ vukir.</l><note>Stanza numbered 145 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_22.04" n="4">
    905 <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>ikaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> i daləm paḍa ṅiṅət-hiṅət ry ulahanika daləm numaṅkata,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>anan dadak amadhya-madhyani dukula vija-vijah amet karajasan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>dudu taṅ ahurup dhardharnya kahurup sakaharəp ika lésyaniṅ hiḍəp,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>hana misiki révaṅanya madulur makalihana manuṅgaṅ éṅ ratha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 146 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_22.05" n="5">
    910 <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>riṅ eñjiṅ hinataṅ tikaṅ bala samuha maṅiriṅiṅ anaṅkil éṅ ləbuh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>apañjir akatap-katap anasasañjatanika umandhaṅ paḍa pupul.</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>lavan sahananiṅ pra vīra kavi bhadtha nipuṇa ri kalaṅvaniṅ vukir,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>paḍa lala sénaha sénjata kasaṅ karas arəja tanahnya dag siṅi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 147 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_22.06" n="6">
    915 <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>mijil nr̥pati sampun arpat atihaṅ ratha mani maya ratna bhāsvara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="18r"/><lb n="1"/>umuṅgah adulur-dulur nr̥pati maṅgaməl iri luṅayan nareśvarī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="2"/>praśasta kavi rāga hetuka ané hiriṅan ira mamaṅku pavahan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="3"/>ikaṅ kuda padati śakti śara sarathinira tuhu céstya nindita.</l><note>Stanza numbered 148 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_22.07" n="7">
    920 <l n="a"><lb n="4"/>lumampah adədəṅ matut ləbuh agə̄ṅ vija-vijah asusun taruṅ pəgat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="5"/>ikaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> aṅiriṅ parək ri sira teki lituhayu paḍa nvam iṅ vayah,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="6"/>titik ry anupa <app><lem type="norm">kavvaṅanya</lem><rdg wit="#JK">kavaṅanya</rdg></app> vəka sevaka tumuluy asevake haji.</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="7"/>ya kāraṇanika vruhiṅ naya vidagdha maṅinaki ri jə̄ṅ nareśvarī. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 149 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="sragdhara" n="22" xml:id="rt_23">
    925 <!-- <note type="prosody">++++\-++\-\-\-\-\-\-++\-++\-+=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_23.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="8"/>lāvan sakvehnikaṅ strī ry anupa haṅu-haṅun yan rumuṅgviṅ narendra,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="9"/>hetunyāṅaṅkas-aṅkas lumaku-laku vijil kapva tan vriṅ manahnya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="10"/>lampah<app><lem type="emn" rend="hyphenleft">nyāgyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">-nya gya</rdg></app> vədin sepa lumihati narendrādulur mvaṅ sudevī,</l>
    930 <l n="d"><lb n="11"/>ndātan <hi rend="check">kéva</hi> lukarniṅ gəluṅ amiru-<hi rend="check">miru</hi><!-- unmetr. --> kenya sampun kaluṅsur.</l><note>Stanza numbered 150 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_23.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="18r"/><lb n="12"/>ndah vantən teki sākṣāt pinuhutaṅan ira rasiko jro paturvan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="13"/>sampun kékét vuvusayéṅ karas arəja pinatra-kén ojar palambaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="14"/>maṅke prāpta ṅadəg riṅ lavaṅa anaviṅakən vaṅnya maṅgviṅ harəpnya,</l>
    935 <l n="d"><lb n="15"/>ambəknya-raṅ vədinyan tagihan i manisiṅ tiṅhal aṅde prapañca.</l><note>Stanza numbered 151 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_23.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="18v"/><lb n="16"/>len takaṅ vahva gat-gat lara turindanika binvatan kuṅniṅ onəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="17"/>lagya syaṅ rovaṅanyan mijil apakadhaṅan-nyéṅ raras tan vənaṅ sah,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="18"/>prāpta gya-gyan moninjo ri sira masahuran mojar aṅds raras tvas,</l>
    940 <l n="d"><lb n="19"/>buddhnya bvat paḍa bvat sahaja maru-marun yan tumiṅhal sadévi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 152 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_23.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="20"/>lavan sakvehnya muṅgu ṅ paṅuṅaṅan ararəm <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> makadyan vihiṅ rum,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="21"/>təkvan buddhinya tan karkasa bhisa makakés rāga tapvan kavastvan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="22"/>lagya-mém basa muṅgviṅ hati kéta-kétégén sébnya muṅgviṅ jaja agras,</l>
    945 <l n="d"><lb n="23"/>haṅko mamba manisyéṅ mata pata matasak hyuṅnya métvéṅ halisnya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 153 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_23.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="24"/>akveh pélahnya tan tuṅgal araras agave harṣaniṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> tumiṅhal,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="25"/>miṅgək-miṅgək alisnya rəṅu-rəṅu kadi tan harṣa tiṅhalnya sva,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="26"/>sampur-sampurnya keṅis dumadak inuvahan tan lukar mogha keṅkab,</l>
    950 <l n="d"><lb n="27"/>kadya mintonakən hritni susunika kuniṅ len təṅahnyaṅgaluṅgaṅ. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 154 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagadnātha" n="23" xml:id="rt_24">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_24.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="28"/>dudū taṅ adulur-dulur pili-pilih <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> arəja ta kunaṅ tuhan-tuhan,</l>
    955 <l n="b"><lb n="29"/>karaṇḍan aṅiriṅ yathākrama <hi rend="check">paḍātuhan ana</hi> ri harəp <app><lem>mapavvahan</lem><rdg wit="#JK">mapavahan</rdg></app>,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="30"/>vagəd rasiki saṅ hinəmbanakən iṅ kaka-kaka kadi tambaṅiṅ vulan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="31"/>ḍataṅ pva ri harəp narendra sahajaṅ gumuyu-guyu tinagva-tagvakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 155 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_24.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="32"/>atuṅgalan ulahnikaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> umulat ri sira paḍa kəna priya ṅalam,</l>
    960 <l n="b"><lb n="33"/>ya kāraṇani luhanya marbas i matanya bavu-bavu manis nareśvara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="19r"/><lb n="1"/>anan dadak alisya-lisya ri haripnya-ripi matanika majaṅ sasi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>təka sih apəpət-pəpət muka rarasnyan api kalilipən sadék hrəbuk. </l><note>Stanza numbered 156 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_24.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>anéki maṅənés kalih kavula tan duga-duga yan aliṇḍuṅan taviṅ,</l>
    965 <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>asiṅ sakaharəpnya yenucapakənya matanya-tanya liṅgi tan umuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>ndi toṅgvaniki rāga hetuka vulat-vulati mara vuvusnika kalib,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>vaya pva si tuhanku tan sah i hiriṅ nr̥pati marək amaṅku pavahan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 157 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_24.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>kunaṅ gatinika turuṅ katəkana ṅraga-kéni rarasiṅ pralapita,</l>
    970 <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>anyar vahu silih-silih kirim ujarnya katəka suménaha riṅ ṭikā,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>méné kuləm ateki rakva samayanya ḍatəṅa ri vijilnikaṅ sasi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>ya outnika yan suméṅ-séṅ avuyuṅ-vuyuṅan néséli mithyaniṅ smara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 158 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_24.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>samaṅkana tikaṅ vuṅ iṅ ləbuh atambak aṅadəg atata silih javil,</l>
    975 <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>tékéṅ nijaja moṇḍuh<app><lem type="norm">-oṇḍuh</lem><rdg wit="#JK">-onfhuh</rdg></app> apupul-pupul ararəm i piṅgiriṅ hənu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>ḍataṅ pva sira rép maliṅgih akatap-katapi paḍa tan anāṅucap,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>vijah-vijah anémba-nəmbah umulat ri sira majari tr̥ptiṅ hiḍəp.</l><note>Stanza numbered 159 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_24.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>taṅhéh yan ucapən pratiṅkah ikanaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> atiki caritan nareśvarī,</l>
    980 <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>təlas kahalivat sire ləbuh agə̄ṅ tutug i vəkasi kanthəniṅ purī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>təgal arah-arah arata adukuti hébun ika turuṅ tibéṅ limah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>baṅun sinipatan təkapni tapakiṅ ratha kadi cinarit dinudvakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 160 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_24.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="19r"/><lb n="19"/>anantara ləpas laku nr̥pati ləṅləṅ umulat i kalanvaniṅ hənu,</l>
    985 <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>gagany malaria-laris panəpiniṅ lvéh aṅisisi mukanya konkulan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>siriṅnya ya gunuṅ-gunuṅ kélimutan kadi susu masaput-saput sabuk,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>nanuknya késédhap-kəḍap samar alivran asəmu-səmu vuryaniṅ kuku.</l><note>Stanza numbered 161 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_24.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>pradeśa kasənət kapaṅgih alaṅa kuṭi-kuṭi riṅ husana kalasan,</l>
    990 <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>rəṅat-rəṅati gopuranya kari ruksa maṅililan arés tuasiṅ mulat,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>tahənya ana dharma buddhi maṅilaṅ-gilag alaléh i piṅgiriṅ hənu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>bukur pathani simbaran tulis ika-rjja katuruhan avor lamuk-kamuk.</l><note>Stanza numbered 162 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_24.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>təgalnya magiraṅ-giraṅ vinulatan səmini tahən ika<!-- unmetrical --> suhun səkar,</l>
    995 <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>paḍa ṅlih aṅuṅan vəlas harəp ika ṅave-ave amalar-malar javuh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>valik adép ika malik ayap i sor kuməḍap amarəki prihiṅ gəgər,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>kuvoṅ muni laki strya vada karəṅa masili-silih ujarnya tan tuhu. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 163 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="navaharṣa" n="24" xml:id="rt_25">
    1000 <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-\-+\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_25.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>lalu lampahira nr̥pati alivatiṅ vanadeśa ləṅəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>vəlaran hiriṅiṅ rava-rava kadi sāgara konaṅ-unaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>makaraṅ liman adyus inisuh-isuh təkapiṅ ryak agə̄ṅ,</l>
    1005 <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>baṅun aṅgala ghūrṇita hana tuban adrəs i roṅnya sumoṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 164 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_25.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="20r"/><lb n="1"/>ri təpinya rənək-rənək adadu pakisnya mavor asinaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>kumicir hana tīrtha raca-racahi valka ikaṅ paraṅan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>kasarah-sarah iṅ vata hana kari gaṅgeṅ adhimpat akét,</l>
    1010 <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>suməlap harəmisnya manusu-nusup arja haneṅ gəluṅan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 165 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_25.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>turahiṅ manas aṅləṅəṅ adulura teki anyar<!-- hañar?--> katəmu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>hana ramvananika<!-- unmetrical --> kalakah ika srét muṅgvi təpi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>makaraṅ-karaṅan kumuda avaniṅ adyusa teki kunaṅ,</l>
    1015 <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>anəṅah musiré karaṅ aharəp anabraṅ aməntas adoh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 166 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_25.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>hana nusa kadiṅ tulis arəja baṅun minaha ṅililan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>ndi kunaṅ avaniṅ ḍatəṅ iriya pa-tan ana mārga tinut,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>panəḍəṅni səkarnya maṅiṅin-hiṅin iṅ vau-vau ḍataṅ,</l>
    1020 <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>paṅuvuhni kuvoṅnya maṅalik-alik asriṅ aganti ləyəp.</l><note>Stanza numbered 167 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_25.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>yaśa śūnya mahantən anəpi-nəpi rincuṅ atīta ləvas,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>umiriṅ pakatonanika kadi katumpəka deniṅ aṅin,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>naranātha kalih sira madulur aliṅgih araryan aṅel,</l>
    1025 <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>miyat iṅ kakavin ri vilah ika anyar<!-- hañar?--> cinarik-carikan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 168 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_25.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>tucapeki karaṇḍanira kaka-kaka-yva paḍaməṅ-aməṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>mapatih-patihan mahas-ahas akalih-kalihan madulur,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>anusup-nusup i pakis aréséb amupva susuh kinéré,</l>
    1030 <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="20v"/><lb n="20"/>avavan ri taṅanya ana kula lata-rijja sinumpiṅakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 169 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_25.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>ri trəbis-trəbisiṅ paras arupit arés ri avanya situ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>tirisan gaḍiṅ anjəlag i sélévaṅiṅ paraṅan tumuvuh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>vah ika kuniṅ arja paja-paja salah manahi lumiyat,</l>
    1035 <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>kinayuh-kayuhiṅ kaka-kaka tinulis-tulisan kakavin.</l><note>Stanza numbered 170 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_25.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="20v"/><lb n="25"/>ri hiriṅnya gaga para-paranika ramya katon adalur,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>katirahnya lumuṅ-luṅ amituturi rāga təkapniṅ akuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>lumalé suluriṅ gaḍuṅ aharəp aṅola pupus maputih,</l>
    1040 <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>masila vulakanya kadi harəp amaṅkava puḍak maṅisia.</l><note>Stanza numbered 171 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_25.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>sadavan ikanaṅ avan asiluk hinambah adoh pinaran,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>paḍa harṣa narendra lumiyati laṅanya mavéh turida,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>hana thani ḍusun-ḍusun atiki kapaṅgih asiapar alit,</l>
    1045 <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>paḍa ta hinalintaṅan ira jinajah sinépa-sépéran.</l><note>Stanza numbered 172 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_25.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>rasa tan ləpas éki lakunira pijér jənək iṅ kalaṅə̄n,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>séka-véṅnya nira-ki juga pinakapaṅrərəban dinadak,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>təpiniṅ lvah agə̄ṅ pinarvasa təgalnya kinuvan atap,</l>
    1050 <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>katitih təkapiṅ bala gaja ratha mévi-vu laksa tumut.</l><note>Stanza numbered 173 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_25.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>amuraṅ-muraṅ iṅ gəgər aməgat<!-- unmetrical --> təgal palapat-palapat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>agənət sayabiṅ ratha madulur adədəṅ<!-- unmetrical --> amuṅgvi sinaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>tumurun<!-- unmetrical --> aṅusir havan alavas ahət marupit-rupitan,</l>
    1055 <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="21r"/><lb n="1"/>hana boddhi tinandur ajajar i təpinya rumambey atə̄b. 0.</l><note>Stanza numbered 174 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="bhramaravilasita" n="25" xml:id="rt_26">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">++++\-\-\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_26.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>deśāgə̄ṅ ramya matiki katəmu,</l>
    1060 <l n="b">śobha tiṅkahnya thani janapada,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>kubvan alva pəkən agə̄ṅ arənəb,</l>
    . <l n="d">buddhyāgə̄ṅ kayvanika pinariṅi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 175 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_26.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="4"/>katyāgān maṅarəpakən<!-- unmetrical --> ahaləp,</l>
    1065 <l n="b">bvat-bvat hanténya marək amarépét,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>merv atumpaṅ pitu ləyəp aruhur,</l>
    . <l n="d">akveh raṅkaṅnya ya paḍa hinəduk.</l><note>Stanza numbered 176 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_26.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>vaṅnya kveh ri ləbuh aṅadəg-adəg,</l>
    1070 <l n="b">ramyānonton ri laku narapati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>harṣātiṅhal ri sira paḍa sukha,</l>
    . <l n="d">śabdanya ṅhiṅ juga vijan aṅalém.</l><note>Stanza numbered 177 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_26.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="8"/>kagyat deniṅ gaja adulu-dulur,</l>
    1075 <l n="b">péka yodha krama parəṅ apupul,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>len taṅ muṅgvi kuda vijah asusun,</l>
    . <l n="d">krura mundhuṅ paḍa tau riṅ ayun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 178 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_26.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>harṣeka mbak nr̥patin umulat,</l>
    1080 <l n="b">béniṅ kvehnin bala tumut aṅiriṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>lagya néṅka avan agə̄ṅ agənət,</l>
    . <l n="d">len tṅ lunha narabhasa malalar.</l><note>Stanza numbered 179 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_26.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="12"/>ramy-lon lampah ira tan asarag,</l>
    1085 <l n="b">tuṅhaniṅ deśa ya kahalivatan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>kubvanya-rnéb ana pudhaṅ ajajar,</l>
    . <l n="d">nyuh vahnya-téb ana ta pinahatan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 180 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_26.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>karyan-kalyan katəmu təkap ira,</l>
    1090 <l n="b">sumbérnya həniṅ gumulak amulakan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>tusnya-drés sampun hinuruṅ-uruṅan,</l>
    . <l n="d">śobha kéndhél paḍa ta hinasaban.</l><note>Stanza numbered 181 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_26.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="16"/>saṇḍiṅ-saṇḍiṅnya ya ana pathani,</l>
    1095 <l n="b">sajya-génnya saracana malavas,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>vénya ṅémbaṅ hurusanika padhét,</l>
    . <l n="d">asrét hisniṅ makara katutupa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 182 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_26.09" n="9"> <l n=""><pb edRef="#JK" n="21v"/><lb n="18"/>ṅkana lor maṇḍala kniaṅlalisan,</l>
    . <l n="b">runtuh śīrṇa gupura katuvuhan,</l>
    1100 <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>aṅhiṅ karya payasan aṅililan,</l>
    . <l n="d">gandhyāgə̄ṅ ndan ulu kuda maruhur.</l><note>Stanza numbered 183 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_26.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="20"/>ramya srép taṅ panataran aradin,</l>
    . <l n="b">kambaṅniṅ jambu sumavur agəlar,</l>
    1105 <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>tanjuṅ len campaka surabhi ruru,</l>
    . <l n="d">kumbaṅnya ṅréṅ kadi manaṅisakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 184 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_26.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>lalya-la śrī nr̥pati ləpas adoh,</l>
    . <l n="b">tovin séb-séb panas asəpi maméṅ,</l>
    1110 <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>lvah-lvah géṅ-géṅ katəmu tara-tara,</l>
    . <l n="d">kayvanya ṅhiṅ rvi kadiravadara. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 185 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" n="26" xml:id="rt_27">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    1115 <lg xml:id="rt_27.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="21v"/><lb n="24"/>mārgāgə̄ṅ ya tinutnirāmənər agaryaṅ asəpi kadi tan hana vaṅa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="25"/>vanvādoh pitovin təgal-təgal ayun taruṅ atiki panuṅga-nuṅgalan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="26"/>raṅra kayvanikāsinaṅ səḍəṅ akəmbaṅ ajahala vayāvahiṅ hənu, (?)</l><!-- what is intended by the "(?)" in JK? -->
    . <l n="d"><lb n="27"/>lvāgə̄ṅ puṅgul aket kapuh saraṅ aghāṣa ana karameyanya simbarən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 186 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    1120 <!-- NB JK has a numbering discontinuity here — 167 should be 187 -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_27.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="28"/>ṅake sornya buyut-buyut vatu tinumpuk apa katika ṅūni riṅ daṅu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="29"/>tuṅkub-tuṅkub ika<!-- unmetrical --> haləp vinavaran saha tuvu-tuvuhan turuṅ ləvas,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="30"/>aryanya gəlar iṅ natar kadalakar saha səma-səmatan haneṅ ləmah,</l>
    1125 <l n="d"><lb n="31"/>pintən ganya pasaṅya-saṅyan iki maṇḍi hana vatu gumantuṅ iṅ vilah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 167 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_27.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="32"/>kṣetrāgə̄ṅ kiduliṅ vatəs rumakət ahyaṅ ararəm aparək juraṅ-juraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="33"/>śobhātiṅkah ikaṅ pahoman aruhur agupura kadi meruparvata,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="34"/>tambaknyeki kapala saṅgya matitip midər ahaləp i héṅnya kādbhuta,</l>
    1130 <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="22r"/><lb n="1"/>ṅkāneṅ jro bharali pratiṣṭha pasabhan rasiki paramasādhakottama.</l><note>Stanza numbered 168 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_27.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>nyagrodha ruhuriṅ natar mapatiga-sthi kavayaka apurva bhīṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>muṅgviṅ dakṣiṇa taṅ śamī druma siluṅluṅ atiki riṅ husana tan vaneh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>parnah lor hana vr̥kṣa siṅ ksapa rumambe avilətan ikaṅ latā salit,</l>
    1135 <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>muṅgviṅ sornya nilih <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> aṅanyut anaknya makasa-kasaran taruṅ pəjah.</l><note>Stanza numbered in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_27.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>vetanyeki təgal-təgal pagəlaran ghada r̥ṣika samipaniṅ avan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>aglar taṅ sirara ləvas pagalaṅan kalasa sébit avér védhiṅ-védhiṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>len tekaṅ tavulan anyar<!-- hañar?--> karakahan ana turuṅ apacaṇḍi taṅ vətis,</l>
    1140 <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>rambutnya lulunan kapala kahariṅ humis adaravéyan sakeṅ mata.</l><note>Stanza numbered 170 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_27.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>saṇḍiṅnyeki dukut-dukut paḍa pajéh kapanasan akuniṅ vaneh avuk,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>dupa snaha pahiṅ gigal ana payuṅ daluvaṅ ika kasaṅsaṅiṅ sukət,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>aṅréṅ śabdanikaṅ arégala marébut pupu katəka patihnya tan ləbur,</l>
    1145 <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>kagyat maṅalulu ana mrih anéhér-néhérakəna malayva-kén vitis.</l><note>Stanza numbered 171 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_27.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>ṅkāne sornya ləbak-ləbaknya hana vaṅke apupul akanin rujit-rujit,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>strī-strī mati anyar<!-- hañar?--> kalih jalu-jalunya siniluk ahaméṅ ruruṅ ləvas,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>amvas rahnya maṅəmbəṅ adaravayan hana maképél i saṇḍiṅiṅ avan,</l>
    1150 <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>hetu śrī parameśvari maṅutus adrəs alayata ri lampahiṅ ratha. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 172 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagadnātha" n="27" xml:id="rt_28">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    .<lg xml:id="rt_28.01" n="1">
    1155 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="22v"/><lb n="18"/>huvus kahalivat sirerika tan aglis alaléh amuraṅ-muraṅ avan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>gagā pasavahan daminya paḍa bhasma vahu mətu dukutnika ijo,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>binañvan aracéh-racéh vinulatan hana turahi harəṅnya tan ləbur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>anan kadi sipat lutur ya təkapiṅ luh amalapar arantunan pipi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 173 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_28.02" n="2">
    1160 <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>kidulnya hana deśa muṅgvi təṅahiṅ savah aḍusun anambvakən laṅa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>sapinya madulur-dulur paḍa makanjuṅ<!-- norm. kañjuṅ? but kañjuṅ not in OJED --> asahuran aganti riṅ gəgər,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>hana <app><lem>vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> akéthéṅ-kéthéṅ<!-- kəṭəṅ? --> rva paḍa maṅhani-hani macapiṅ-capiṅ janur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>dudū taṅ aṅuvuh sakeṅ gubug aməñcar aṅagəmi mamavva-mavvakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 174 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_28.03" n="3">
    1165 <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>pitovi lalu masa lampahira teki vau-vau sirém séṅiṅ ravi,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>ḍatəṅ sahananiṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> aṅiriṅ anut vuri manututi lampahiṅ ratha</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>animpaṅ aṅusir damārga kadi tan ləpasa təkapi lon ikaṅ laku,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>miyat ri rusitiṅ avan ana suməṅka tumurun apasiṅga-siṅgahan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 175 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_28.04" n="4">
    1170 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="22v"/><lb n="30"/>i sornya valahar trəbis-trəbis arəs lumu-lumutən i réṅnya koṅkulan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>rəṅat-rəṅat ika təmah rubuh hinambah arupék apəḍək-pəḍək avan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>mələs umis atut paras titisiṅ ertali manəḍuni tiṅhasiṅ karaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>siratnya kadi hira cūrṇa sumarambahan anələs ananar-namar javuh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 176 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_28.05" n="5">
    1175 <l n="a"><lb n="34"/>lumampah aməgat gəgər sira matut siku-siku hiriṅiṅ gunuṅ-guṅuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="35"/>katon arah-rahnikaṅ parana teki vau-vau dinuṅkapiṅ vula,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="36"/>tahənya kadi parvata rarəm avandhira tuhu-tuhu an paḍa ruhur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="23r"/><lb n="1"/>pətəṅ kinasutiṅ limut ana javuhnya tuməḍun anisih samar-samar. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 177 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    1180<div type="canto" rend="met" met="svādamālinī" n="28" xml:id="rt_29">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-+\-\-+\-\-+=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_29.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>makin aparək sayabiṅ ratha gamya,</l>
    . <l n="b">təpiniṅ ayun ri vatəsnya kalalvan,</l>
    1185 <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>hana kuṭi dharma kaśevan atīndu,</l>
    . <l n="d">mahada-hada<!-- unmetrical --> gupuranya sateja.</l><note>Stanza numbered 178 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_29.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="4"/>masəmu bahitra rumuṅkəb aṅuṅgul,</l>
    . <l n="b">vuvuṅani raṅkaṅ ika réréh aśrī,</l>
    1190 <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>hana kadi megha kuniṅ mapucak mas,</l>
    . <l n="d">irika haneśvararūpa vinimba.</l><note>Stanza numbered 179 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_29.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>kidul aparək kadi hemakuṭādri,</l>
    . <l n="b">didhiti lumə̄ṅ ri pucaknya maṇīndra,</l>
    1195 <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>i kavari cetya tathāgatabajra</l>
    . <l n="d">kadi śatasūrya mijil ya sakeṅ doh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 180 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_29.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="8"/>kapadu ri héṅnya paṅambvan apantha,</l>
    . <l n="b">miḍər i hiriṅ-hiriṅi dvija sédha,</l><!-- śodha? -->
    1200 <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>ahaləp apūrva binapra kuməṇḍəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d">aputih alepana bhadra ginātra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 181 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_29.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>ləṅəṅ alaṅa naranātha tumiṅhal,</l>
    . <l n="b">avan ika ramya gunuṅ-gunuṅ arnéb,</l>
    1205 <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>hara-haranam pagagan ri hiriṅnya,</l>
