    . <l n="d">savah ika tut lépitiṅ juraṅ ajro.</l><note>Stanza numbered 182 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_29.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="12"/>kaka-kaka ləñjəp ateki tumiṅhal,</l>
    . <l n="b">sahana-hane pagaṅan paḍa tan vruh,</l>
    1210 <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>java tumuvuh dinalih jaguṅ akveh,</l>
    . <l n="d">jahli sinəṅgah ika vah amutnya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 183 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_29.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>katirah aket lumuṅ iṅ pagər akveh,</l>
    . <l n="b">vihikana teki kadaṅni laṭinya,</l>
    1215 <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>gaḍuṅ avilət lumalay-lalay aśrī,</l>
    . <l n="d">vruh apan aghāṣa ləməsni təṅahnya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 184 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_29.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="16"/>sakahənu ramya siriṅni gaganya,</l>
    . <l n="b">lvah alaṅa gə̄ṅ atés laraṅan ravunya,</l>
    1220 <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="23v"/><lb n="17"/>madrəs tusnya manampikakən jə̄ṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d">ikaṅ aṅéb iṅ ahaṅét sukət akveh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 185 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_29.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>təgal arata raro aṅvan adhém-dhém,</l>
    . <l n="b">paka buréṅaṅ sapi hiṅvan akumpul,</l>
    1225 <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>védi miyatiṅ gaja réṅga manédéṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d">vijah alayu maṅusi təgal alam.</l><note>Stanza numbered 186 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_29.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="20"/>satəkaniran təpiniṅ kuṭa vetan,</l>
    . <l n="b">hana kəta maṅgala saṅka ya tinyup,</l>
    1230 <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>baṅun avarah ri ḍatəṅnira maṅke,</l>
    . <l n="d">karaṇanikaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> atun-tun anonton. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 187 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" n="29" xml:id="rt_30">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_30.01" n="1">
    1235 <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>sampun prata<!-- prāpta? --> narendra tapva mandulur sira vahu tumurun sakeṅ ratha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>ṅkāneṅ bvat alu kilyan arpat ahaləp kahananira lavan nareśvarī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>sampun teki ginandhapattra kinənan jinəm arəja siniṅsətiṅ jənu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>mvaṅ sakvehnikanaṅ karaṇḍan ararəm kaka-kaka marək asraṅ aṅaḍəp.</l><note>Stanza numbered 188 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_30.02" n="2">
    1240 <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>mantri satya vicakṣaṇa ṅiṅət-hiṅət ry ulahanira rumakṣa saṅ prabhu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>sakvehniṅ bala yodha kapva tinitahnya sana-sini yathākrama haləp,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>himpər bapra patapni sañjatanika kr̥tala curiga tomara luṅid,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>matéṅga-sva ratha ruhar pinakagopura sahaja tinumpa-tumpa ya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 189 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_30.03" n="3">
    1245 <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>mvaṅ sakvehnikanaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> uttama manaṅkil apupul atata salaṅsaṅan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>lavan saṅ prabhu sevake nr̥pati teki sira huvus atiṅkah akrama,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>len tekaṅ makəmit haneṅ yava tiniṅkah atiki paḍa tan hanāṅucap,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="24r"/><lb n="1"/>ndah rājyiry anupa ṅalih kahiḍəpanya təkapiṅ umulat paḍa ṅaləm.</l><note>Stanza numbered 190 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_30.04" n="4">
    1250 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="24r"/><lb n="2"/>alva teki natarnika pəkən atip ḍəḍət apaligaran təkeṅ ləbuh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>deniṅ kvehnikanaṅ balāṅiriṅakən kathamapi paḍa tan hana jaruh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>hə̄bniṅ vandhira tan hanāṅinak-hinak patiganika paḍeki kavaṅan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>aṅhiṅ teki narendra muṅgvi təṅah arja sira kadi haneṅ daləm purī.</l><note>Stanza numbered 191 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_30.05" n="5">
    1255 <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>sore prāpta ikaṅ taḍah saha garantuṅ aṅaraṅin i héṅ paḍa ṅayap,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>aṅhiṅ teki garit narendra viniveka rasanika rinəṅva-rəṅvakən,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>lāvan saṅ kavi rāga hetuka hane kananira sumahur silih sahur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>apan ṅhiṅ marək aṅarəp-harəpakən manaḍah i sira teki tar vaneh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 192 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_30.06" n="6">
    1260 <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>sampun teki sirānaḍah sahananiṅ carikan umətu vinvat adulur,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>vantən prāpta muvah sakeṅ asuhuran paṅiriṅ atha təlas sumaṅgraha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>sakveh-kvehnika saṅ manaṅkil anumas parəṅ a…….</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>…………… hinan ipun mula sapuniki .o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 193 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="girisa" xml:id="rt_31" n="30">
    1265 <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-\-\-+++++\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_31.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>səḍəṅ asəpəta tekiṅ bhandharya kutak-atikan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>vijah adadah adum-dum bhakta pāna paḍa sukha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>bala sahananikākveh norāṅsal vijah aṅaləm,</l>
    1270 <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>ikaṅ akuda jugāṅhiṅ matāṅhruk jəmur ajaruh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 194 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_31.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>tucapa ta para taṇḍa dhém tapva maṅan aṅinum,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="24v"/><lb n="19"/>aṅacap i kavaninya praṅ sahya sahuran avu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>tuvi hana tiki mājar vantən satra lurugana,</l>
    1275 <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>hələm atiki madonən petəṅ siṅ kahananika.</l><note>Stanza numbered 195 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_31.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>paḍa macakép ahosan avanya ṅrégut aṅhéṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>paḍa pəjaha mamuk amrih liṅnyaṅ raṇa dadaha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>paḍa masamaya tan svaṅ mundur liṅnya yan alaga,</l>
    1280 <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>təvasa aji maṅiṅva véh vīrya puhaka hurip.</l><note>Stanza numbered 196 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_31.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>tan ucapən ika sampunya <hi rend="check">muktja</hi><!-- muktya? mukt<del rend="strikeout">y</del>a? --> rasa saphala,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>para juru paḍa mamvit mantuk riṅ gr̥ha madulur,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>huvus atiki ya mavat cantén brasnya paḍa médan,</l>
    1285 <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>sahana-hanani deśanya kveh tvaknya paḍa pinik.</l><note>Stanza numbered 197 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_31.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>lalu divasa paḍa mrém tekaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> təlas aṅinum,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>apituvi rapuh aṅlih deniṅ mārga tan arata,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>tabé-tabéhan umampəh marya araṅ matalu-talu,</l>
    1290 <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>saragi muni tan agya kadya ṅriṅ-riṅ aṅaraṅin. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 198 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="kilayu anəḍəṅ" xml:id="rt_32" n="31">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">++\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_32.01" n="1">
    1295 <l n="a"><lb n="34"/>hvāṅduduti taṅan ireki tapva ta…..</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="35"/>ndan śrī narapati təlas aṅlilir kadi tinaṅhi sira varurutén,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="36"/>va….. hinan ipun mula sapuniki,</l>
    . <l n="d">kalih pada néntén bacik….</l><note>Stanza numbered 199 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_32.02" n="2">
    1300 <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>ndatan vavaṅ anəkani buddhiniṅ maharəp aṅdadak aparihara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>hanan i paṅucap-ucapiṅ maminta sih aṅola təlas inubhayan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>harṣa səmu-səmu guyu yan pamak-pak aṅagəm susu hinənəṅakən,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="40"/>ṅhiṅ śabda nr̥pati karəṅa hanan sinahuran paṅəsah aṅəsəsan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 200 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .<lg xml:id="rt_32.03" n="3">
    1305 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="25r"/><lb n="1"/>ndah sampuniṅ ulah amiveka ramyaniṅ asaṅgama rəsəp i hati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>sāsiṅ paraniṅ ujar anutakən sakaharəp-harəp ira maṅucap,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>cumbva tanya lavasiṅ atiṅgalaṅ nagara maṅhinép i para-paran,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>lagya ṅiṅət-hiṅəti galar taṅan sinélaṅan guyu mavada-vadan. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 201 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="śikhariṇī" xml:id="rt_33" n="32">
    1310 <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+++++\-\-\-\-\-++\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_33.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>byatitan tis-tis masa paḍa vahu mamrəm sira kalih,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>lumiṅsir-liṅsir taṅ śaśadhara lumə̄ṅ vahu luməyəp,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>tinūtiṅ mogha-raṅ anan asuma vintaṅnya kuməḍap,</l>
    1315 <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>vinas-vas luṅhāṅdoh baṅun aləpəha karana hurip.</l><note>Stanza numbered 202 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_33.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>laluṅ māsa srép méh rahina tumibā hisnikaṅ əbun,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>patər mandra gréh ika gupyan avisik …..</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>limutnya …… ṅililan kadrəsan aṅin,</l>
    1320 <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>riris mampəh lvir luhniṅ anaṅis arés sampuniṅ ulah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 203 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_33.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>ḍavuh vantən séb-béb paḍa karahinan taṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> aturu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>garantaṅ munya-sraṅ baṅun amuṅu riṅ śrī narapati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>lavan sakvehniṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> kaka-kaka paḍa tiṅkah atata,</l>
    1325 <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>huvus kapva dan riṅ rahina sahana maṅkil apupul. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 204 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagadnātha" xml:id="rt_34" n="33">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_34.01" n="1">
    1330 <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>mijil nr̥pati sampun ahyas adulur sira lumaku lavan nareśvarī,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>karaṇḍan aṅiriṅ lavan sahananiṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> arəja pinakesiniṅ purī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>parəṅ tumama muṅgah iṅ gupura ramya paḍa vahu huvus təkeṅ natar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>miyat ri haləpiṅ sudharma racananya kahiḍəp anamar surālaya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 205 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_34.02" n="2">
    1335 <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>mahantənya rəjāhaləp ri harəpanya lagi hana parantiniṅ tulis,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>aśoka hana nāga puṣpa hana campaka surabhi tinandur iṅ natar,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="25v"/><lb n="23"/>səkarnya kadi payvan anjrah anodhéṅ masaji-saji vaṅinya tan ləvas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>madhubratanikāṅréṅ adran amagantakən asana marāṅjajah sari.</l><note>Stanza numbered 206 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_34.03" n="3">
    1340 <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>paḍa ṅalap ahur-huran səkar ika kaka-kaka paḍa meñjuhiṅ laṅa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>anəmpal asana mépét-népéti padapa ri mukanika pupur hrəbuk,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>anāṅdadak amék puḍak tinulisan kakavin hinuparəṅga riṅ ṭikā,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>ri hémbanan asusva-susvan hinamər lagi timuru-turunya riṅ kiduṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 207 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_34.04" n="4">
    1345 <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>ikaṅ kaka-kaka nvam adyus asibu paḍa vijah atukup-tukup taṅan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>lumut-lumut ikaṅ payodhara tumus kavaséhan asila haneṅ bañu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>sipatnya ana sandéṅ-andéṅ i matanya karahupan anambva-kén mirah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>ikaṅ bhramara medran iṅ kumuda malihi mukanika maṅrəṅ-aṅrubuṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 208 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_34.05" n="5">
    1350 <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>hana ṅadəg i salvaṅiṅ talaga sampun amabar akəmul-kəmul putih,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>maha ṅureyakən gəluṅ sinuruyanya kulu mélés arantunan pipi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>tumus amariṅət haneṅ jajanika avas amuri-muri gatraniṅ susu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>anan karakət iṅ dukula turahiṅ vəḍak avaṅi kapəñcəriṅ burat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 209 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_34.06" n="6">
    1355 <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>vaneh tiki mara dyus iṅ makara bojya<!-- bejya? --> racana kumucur pinañcuran,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>tumuṅkul aṅure gəluṅ aika kinumbah amadha hirəṅiṅ lumut-lumut,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>tapihnika banantən eñjuh anipis tinélési karakət haneṅ vətis,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="40"/>katon buṅah ikaṅ təṅah kadi pupus putih asəmu parantiniṅ limut. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 210 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    1360<div type="canto" rend="met" met="citraturida" xml:id="rt_35" n="34">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">++\-\-\-\-++\-\-\-\-++\-\-\-\-+=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_35.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="26r"/><lb n="1"/>caṇḍy aruhur i təṅahniṅ talaga ləṅəṅ rumyani racananya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>piṅgirnyamidər adédhéṅ minakaran akveh paḍa ya lumanda,</l>
    1365 <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>maryak-ryak anikəl asriṅ maṅipék-ipék lvir viru-aviruniṅ kén,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>kambiṅniṅ asana lumrā gəlar alabuh kumbaṅ anaṅis aṅhréṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 211 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_35.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>paṇḍan <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> asidéha muṅgvi təpinika liṅgih aṅisis arja,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>śobha ṅisapu puḍaknya putih asila lvir vətis aṅudéda<!-- aṅudoda? -->,</l>
    1370 <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>lumraṅ hrəbuk amupur tat sisi sumavur muṅgvi pasi-pasirnya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>kombak ana kasarah riṅ karaṅ aluṅid lvirnya alis alaṅhép.</l><note>Stanza numbered 212 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_35.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>ṅkāna nr̥pati muja sira magave dyana sakala śuddha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>ndan śrī krama ginəlar saṅ prabhu təlas enak təpat ikaṅ ambək,</l>
    1375 <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>mvaṅ nyasa paḍa husus tarpaṇa vinaṅun cakra umiḍəp ahəniṅ.</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>nisvasa kakavaśaṅ prana vimala hiṅanya sakala śūnya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 213 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_35.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>énak pva kavasaniṅ jñāna gumaveyāṅrakṣana saha japya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>svasta pagəhanikeṅ rat ahilaṅaniṅ śatru paraniṅ ambək,</l>
    1380 <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>riṅkah prabhu tan avarsih satata rumakséṅ bhuvana tan himba,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>taan svaṅ balé-paléhiṅ dharma gumaveyaṅ yukti hitanikaṅ rat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 214 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_35.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>munya paḍahi ri héṅ lvir gərəh alaṅa riṅ masa kapat aṅras,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>ghaṇṭa sraṅ asahuran saṅka kumisik aṅrik kana kala rinyup,</l>
    1385 <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>len taṅ dhvaja majajar kuməlab arəja kady aṅave-ave asriṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>dhūpa srik avaṅi gandhanya kumutug aṅdhūma hana lum anəḍəṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 215 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_35.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="26v"/><lb n="21"/>mantry aṅayap ahaləp riṅ natar atata tiṅkah ararəm atvaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>sampun praṇata manəmbah ri sira sadaṇḍa krama paḍa bhakti,</l>
    1390 <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>ndātan ana kakuraṅ śrī narapati riṅ vīrya paḍa kavastvan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>siṅgih prabhu lituhavy anvam aguṇa sureṅ raṇa kavi śakti. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 216 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="sragdhara" xml:id="rt_36" n="35">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">++++\-++\-\-\-\-\-\-++\-++\-+=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_36.01" n="1">
    1395 <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>sampun taṅ yajñakārya lilaṅ ahəniṅ ikaṅ jñāna himpər śaśāṅka,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>ṅkāneṅ prāsāda hambalnya sira maṅadəg aṅhér i lampah sudevī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>lagya gagvan taṅan śrī narapati tumurun tan kara ṅantun-antun,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>śīghra prāpteṅ natar teki hana payuṅira svata śuddha pucak mas.</l><note>Stanza numbered 217 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_36.02" n="2">
    1400 <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>tan varṇa teki tiṅkahnira manaḍah asiṅ patya tekaṅ bhinukti,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>sakvehniṅ sevake jə̄ṅ nr̥pati paḍa marək sura samanta raja,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>sampun kapvānunas tan hana kakuraṅika lyab təkeṅ peka yodha,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>ndan saṅ śrī nātha kalih mahas aṅahasi laṅla laṅə̄niṅ kalaṅvan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 218 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_36.03" n="3">
    1405 <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>parnah lor larya-laryan paṅuṅaṅan aruhur ləṅləṅ aṅde kalaṅvan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>kandhaṅ-kandhaṅ phlémbvan siriṅ ika maparək saṇḍiṅiṅ brahma sala,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>vannya liṅgih manon-ton ri sira paḍa kapuhan mulat sopa cara,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>prāptaṅ gophaa mavvat minyak asira-siran len péhan vahva-vahvan. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 219 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="śikhariṇī" xml:id="rt_37" n="36">
    1410 <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+++++\-\-\-\-\-++\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_37.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="27r"/><lb n="1"/>asiṅ ramya ndah yeka pinaraniran ləṅləṅ alaṅa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>lavan sakvehniṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> ri daləm aṅiriṅ tan sah adulur,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>gagā garyaṅ-garyaṅ ana tapak kasumbanya linarik,</l>
    1415 <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>ikaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> ləñjəp-ləñjəp apupur i pipya sahu-sahur.</l><note>Stanza numbered 220 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_37.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="27r"/><lb n="5"/>aneki lvah géṅ-géṅ linaraṅan ikannya ṅacar-acar,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>pinatyan-patyan véṅa sinilukakən riṅ pasavahan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>tinambak-tambak riṅ vatu ana tisampyak pinarigi,</l>
    1420 <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>ri rumpvanya-kveh yeka tinava-tava vénya ya sinat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 221 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_37.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>makin harṣeka mbék nr̥pati lumihat kalih apupul,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>pinupvan-pupvan lagya-pi pati uraṅnya ṅicir-icir,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>rumambat-rambat riṅ vatu susuh ikatumpaṅ atitp,</l>
    1425 <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>hana ṅala muṅgviṅ lumut-lumut ikanya ṅumik-umik.</l><note>Stanza numbered 222 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_37.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>karaṇḍan mvaṅ guṇḍik para kaka-kaka nvam vija-vijah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>vətisnya kém-kém riṅ bañu rəsəp atis kumram aputih,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>mélés kén-kényāṅraṅdi kécécép apan tan hinuniṅa,</l>
    1430 <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>pijér ləṅləṅ denya pupu-pupuki rah ya lumu-lumut.</l><note>Stanza numbered 223 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_37.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>huvus kédran sakvehni kaéṅéṅaniṅ dharma jinajah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>také katyagan maṇḍala kuṭi huvus teki pinaran,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>kuləm saṅ hyaṅ mantuk ri végilanira tiṅkah ararəm,</l>
    1435 <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>riṅ eñjaṅ rakvan maṅkata lumaris aṅuṅsira pasir. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 224 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="--+-+---+------+-+-=" xml:id="rt_38" n="37">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_38.01" n="1">
    1440 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="27v"/><lb n="21"/>tadanantara krama lumampah anəbu-nəbu tut hiriṅ-hiriṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>larini ratha dulur asantun asaləsək i piṅgiriṅ hənu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>təkapiṅ bala ṅiriṅ i vuntat(ira) i harəp asusun silih pəḍək,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>rumuhun vaneh lumaku-lakv aməṅ-aməṅ i anāṅrərəb-rərəb.</l><note>Stanza numbered 225 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_38.02" n="2">
    1445 <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>alaṅa katuṅkulan i sor pasavahanika tut juraṅ-juraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>valahar sakeṅ gəgər adurga tuməḍun aməgat-məgat havan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>hana vinvatan pətuṅ agantuṅ alaléh hinahambah aṅguṅan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>adulur-dulur <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> ika yan lumaku-laku matun-tunan taṅan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 226 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_38.03" n="3">
    1450 <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>asamun hənunya pamuraṅ-muraṅan atuha śūnya durgama,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>titir aṅhaḍaṅ-haḍaṅ ikaṅ pathani ləvas avuk pararyanan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>sirar<hi rend="unmetrical">a</hi> gəlar hañar ararva asana sumahur haneṅ natar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>katirahnika səmi gaḍuṅ ṅabét aṅivat i saṇḍiṅiṅ havan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 227 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_38.04" n="4">
    1455 <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>alivat narendra viyatiṅ<!-- miyatiṅ? --> aras-aras sukuniṅ gunuṅ-gunuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>amijah dukut mrak ataraṅ gigi adal-adal iṅ gəgər-gəgər,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>kulurak rumambat akataṅ-kataṅ agəlar atut hiriṅ-hiriṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>hana limva-limvan apupul pulutan i təpiniṅ təgal-təgal. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 228 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="rt_39" n="38">
    1460 <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_39.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>marya tut hiriṅiṅ ………</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>koṅaṅ matra hana tulap-tulap akaryak asurak amaṅun-maṅun hima,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>lumraṅ varṣa kuvuṅ-kuvuṅnya sumarambah asinaṅ anaruh traṅiṅ ravi,</l>
    1465 <l n="d"><lb n="40"/>ghor gér śabdanikaṅ gərəh masahuran tuna-tuna kadi muksa riṅ rəməṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 229 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_39.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="41"/>gnyaṅ nusa ləyəp samar-samar i dohnya namu-namu kinusaniṅ riris,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="42"/>muksa miṇḍa lavan laṅit vinulatan pətəṅ asəmu parantiniṅ vəṅi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="43"/>tapvan vaspada sə̄k katon ri kəñariṅ ravi kadi minaha lamad-lamad,</l>
    1470 <l n="d"><lb n="44"/>pintən ganya parantiniṅ kavi mahas layat alarasan aṅhañut laṅa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 230 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_39.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="28r"/><lb n="1"/>ləṅləṅ ramya tiniṅhalan ri tələṅiṅ jaladhi ləyəp avor lavan tavaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>saṅhubnya-raṅ arantéyan məlek aṅanti patər akətər aṅdadak riris,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>ləs muksan didəla-dəla matəmahan rəməṅ ahirəṅ <app><lem type="norm">akandəl</lem><rdg wit="#JK">akandhel</rdg></app> iṅ laṅit,</l>
    1475 <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>aṅhiṅ sodha maṇīndra capa kuməḍap-kəḍap i vəlasi hiṅhaṅiṅ mulat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 231 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_39.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>duṅhus-duṅhus ika kahundul aməgat bañu maṅacar-acar tiniṅhalan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>karvanya jajar aṅjəlaṅ kadi vaya tinudu-tuduhaṅiṅ hañar ḍatəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>maṅkin mukas samar-samar sinaputiṅ limut aməgat arantunan tahən,</l>
    1480 <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>nimpér anusa karaṅ ləṅəṅ pavulatanya tuṅa-tuṅa katon sakeṅ adoh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 232 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_39.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>tis-tis masa huvus tibaṅ javuh aṅantya ri ləṅəṅi kalaṅvani pasir,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>hetu śrī naranātha kalih adulur-dulur aḍarat i duṅhusiṅ karaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>sakveh strī aji saṅ haneṅ ratha huvus paḍa tumurun akabvatan raras,</l>
    1485 <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>mvaṅ guṇḍik paricārikā kaka karaṇḍan hinya puyaṅ uva sraṅ aṅhulur.</l><note>Stanza numbered 233 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_39.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>luṅha tut sisi maṅrarah sahananiṅ sarasah ana gəlar vijah-vijah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>namya sraṅ makaraṅ-karaṅ harama len haraṅ inagəm ika vavan taṅan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>solahnya gigu tapva tan tau macaṅkrama mahas asabha-sabha pasir,</l>
    1490 <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="28v"/><lb n="16"/><app><lem>pantəs yan</lem><rdg wit="#JK">pantəs<del>-pantəs ayun</del> yan</rdg></app> tarim-kénéṅ kavi kayogyanika varahan aṅjajah laṅa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 234 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_39.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>len taṅ luṅa mahas-mahas dhara-dharan lumiyat i pasurakniṅ hampuhan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>lagya … lavan harus i palajəṅnya kaṅelihan araryan iṅ karaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>lagya maṅku sukunya késisi tapihnya duga-duga sumundhé aṅliga,</l>
    1495 <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>akrap aṅganya vətisnya dani tapakiṅ bañu asin aputih savaṅ hrəbuk.</l><note>Stanza numbered 235 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_39.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>akveh bhavanikaṅ haneṅ karaṅ aliṅgih umulat i kalaṅvaniṅ pasir,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>ləṅləṅ yan paṅuré gəluṅ susu-susupnika maratih haneṅ salaṅ-salaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>vahva gatra samar-samar pavulatanya sinaputan i saṅhubiṅ bañu,</l>
    1500 <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>muksa piṇḍa lavan limut kahiḍəpanya sahaja ḍatəṅ ahavan riris.</l><note>Stanza numbered 236 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_39.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>vantən ləṅləṅ anuṅga-nuṅgal iṅ upala sumayana mamaṅkvakən ṭikā,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>ndan parnahniki lagi rakva paririm aji katəka sinūkṣma tan umuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>mvaṅ siñjaṅnya hañar kinasturi sugandha saha kusuma layvaniṅ kapa,</l>
    1505 <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>hetunya kékés ambək eñjuh i vədinya kavihikana de nareśvarī.</l><note>Stanza numbered 237 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_39.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>siṅ solahnyan i panamun turida tan hana kavətu kinubdaniṅ hiḍəp,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>aṅhiṅ teki pinivruhan pakadaṅan rasiki rəsəp akalihan lulut,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>kiṅ-kiṅ rāga hinémnya tan sah akivéka<!-- amiveka? aviveka? --> riva-rivani lésyaniṅ hati,</l>
    1510 <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>rovaṅnyan paṅapus vilapa suvalanya rinupati méné pajaṅ sasi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 238 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_39.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="29r"/><lb n="1"/>ambək śrī naranātha denya tuhu rañca sinaputan i śaktiniṅ smara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>ndan riṅ masa kuləm siran ḍatəṅa rakva sumuliba tatan hana vruha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>vantən teki vəkas-vəkasnira haneṅ puḍak arəja ginātra riṅ kuku,</l>
    1515 <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>marmanya səmu rāga karana vulatnya suméṅ i mata tan hané tutuk. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 239 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="aśvalalita" xml:id="rt_40" n="39">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>nr̥pati haneṅ karaṅ lumihatiṅ pasir pasi lavan narendra mahiṣī,</l>
    1520 <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>hana kuməḍap-kəḍap manuk ika navat-navat anambayaṅ ləpas adoh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>patər akətər haneṅ rəməṅ aganti mandra lumarap kilatnya tan avas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>masəmu rəṅihniṅ adyah hinamər yva cancala tikəl alisnya-ti nira.</l><note>Stanza numbered 240 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="29r"/><lb n="9"/>ri təpi-təpinya paṇḍan akusa guliṅ-guliṅan iṅ karaṅ saha ṭikā,</l>
    1525 <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>hana kakavin palambaṅ i lavénya majar i taṅisnya tan tinurida,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>ləṅəṅ asaput hima raras añaṅvəli paglari səkarnya tan hinuṅiṅa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>asəpi dinohaniṅ kavi ajəṅnya lāgi masamun tinambuṅ alavas.</l><note>Stanza numbered 241 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>ri pasi-pasirnya cindhaga parantiniṅ mahas-ahas ləṅəṅ masusupan,</l>
    1530 <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>mavəlas hrép nyar-anyar apatutan kakavin arja maṅdadi ṭikā,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>anan avéndhak-vəḍak hrəbuk anuṅka-nuṅkali səkarnya vahu maṅisis,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>tinaṅisaniṅ riris gérah asamba-sambat apépé kilatnya kuməḍap.</l><note>Stanza numbered 242 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>tucapa samāṅdulur-dulur atiṅkah akrama padhāṅrərəb sira kabeh,</l>
    1535 <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>asana vuṅu kataṅga vinaṅun mahantən arəja atép jriṅ asinaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="29v"/><lb n="19"/>sahana prara prabhūttama sirāṅləṅəṅ mahas amet səkar siṅ avaṅi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>masira-siran kalaṅvan avədin kasérana paḍa hyun aṅrahatana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 243 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>ləṅəṅ akatap-katap ri təpiniṅ samudra kadi puṣpa parvata tinon,</l>
    1540 <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>katirah avor gaḍuṅ jamanikanya kumram i téténya maṅkin alaṅa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>satəkani gandhaniṅ kusuma sumrak arja sinirirnikaṅ aṅin alon,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>bhramara mariṅ mara ṅréṅ amaganta-kén səkar harum jənək tan avéliṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 244 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>vau luməyəp pa …. katélihén i ramyaniṅ jalanidhi,</l>
    1545 <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>hana sumaput limutnya satəpihniṅ adyah akiput vədin kaharasa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>gərəh adédé patərnya sarəṅih-rəṅihsiṅ anahén lara smu séségén,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>vulan avénés mijil samukaniṅ kinévala kavés …..</l><note>Stanza numbered 245 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>makin alaṅa narendra miyatiṅ kalaṅvan i vijilnikaṅ śaśadhara,</l>
    1550 <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>saṅ araras arja ləṅləṅ aniliṅ-niliṅ vulat iréṅ ravaṅ ləyəp adoh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>réṅa-réṅaniṅ satha muni rinəṅva-réṅva-kén iran séma tuna téka,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>sahaja paḍa nuduh-nuduhi vintaṅ olém asuma kucém vahu mijil.</l><note>Stanza numbered 246 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>apuhara rāga polah ira tapva sisa… libiṅ manah ya tinékan,</l>
    1555 <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>anan amibik-mibik tapih asuṅ səpah sira təhər sumambya ṅaréki,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>ragət ikanaṅ payodhara ginātraniṅ kuku anyar<!-- hañar?--> yva tauan aləsəh,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>nr̥pati sira mépér sinaharan alis tikəl acumbu maṅkin araras.</l><note>Stanza numbered 247 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>patəmu niran silih sih i daləm kalaṅvan aṅajəṅ karasikan apém,</l>
    1560 <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="30r"/><lb n="1"/>gaḍuṅ vilət liraṅ paḍa nira-ki yan sama-sama raras silih asih,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="2"/>vəlas harəp iṅ tahən puriṅ akét lulut-lulut ireki tapva mamati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="3"/>aséna lavan riris haras irekihénpadha turuṅ mavarsih iṅ ulah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 248 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="4"/>lalu sampuniṅ gati siré-ka vahu gumuliṅ nda tapvan aturu,</l>
    1565 <l n="b"><lb n="5"/>maṅucap-ucap silih suval i ramyaniṅ ujar gatra mandra karəṅa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="6"/>sari-sari rāga ntuka maké-siniṅ vuvus i géṅni sih narapati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="7"/>ri harəp ira-ki yan pasuṅa karma ya-nulih-ulih lavan saṅ araras.</l><note>Stanza numbered 249 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="8"/>ibu ana teki-hén kaharəpiṅ hulun ri kita masku havya tan asih,</l>
    1570 <l n="b"><lb n="9"/>pihanana sih-ku ratna kusmāṅga yrki palakun-ku tan hana vaneh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="10"/>pakénanikan tumaṇḍiṅa ri rāga hetuka kita grahé riya hələm,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="11"/>sama-sama pan paḍa <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> aéaéas vicakṣaṇa paké-siniṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> i daləm.</l><note>Stanza numbered 250 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.12" n="12">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="30r"/><lb n="12"/>yadi ana sanmatanta tumuta-ryadih-kvi riya teki yan pitulusa,</l>
    1575 <l n="b"><lb n="13"/>hələm i kapiṅrvaniṅ vulan i taṅgaliṅ katiga yan kasapta karika,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="14"/>larisanikan patémva pilihənta siṅ sakaharəpta masa rahayu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="15"/>sahana pasajya-sajyani kakanta sajya-kéna rapva tanpa dadakan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 251 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.13" n="13">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="16"/>kaka aji tan salah vacana rakryan aṅras agave larāṅku ri hati,</l>
    1580 <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="30v"/><lb n="17"/>riṅ apa ta naku yan vənaṅa drévya buddhi vihaṅé manah narapati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="18"/>sakaharəpanya teki tumut aku pan-ya pagəhāṅkvé denta huluna,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="19"/>ya karika mulya yadyapi harip-ku tan asaktāku<!-- śaktāku? --> kasrah i kita.</l><note>Stanza numbered 252 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.14" n="14">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="20"/>apituvi taki tan hana hiḍəpku len ya parananya téka-ti-hati,</l>
    1585 <l n="b"><lb n="21"/>sahananikaṅ karaṇḍan i daləm paḍa vruh iriyan matəmu ri hələm,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="22"/>kunəṅ iki karanāṅku kaka tan vavaṅ marahakən harəp-ku ri aji,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="23"/>miyati vayahnya ṅūni səḍəṅ anvam matiki turuṅ vənaṅ karabhasa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 253 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.15" n="15">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="24"/>tuhun iki deyani ṅvaṅ iriyan ndatan vavaṅ avéha tāṅvaṅ i kita,</l>
    1590 <l n="b"><lb n="25"/>ndah avaraṅeki tapva kaharəp-ku tiṅkaha lavan kita matutana,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="26"/>ndvasi kaka tumbasanya sakaréṅ yata srahakənanta teki tumuhun,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="27"/>sasaji-sajinta lan laris amantva maṅlamara sambya suvala gara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 254 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_40.16" n="16">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="28"/>yayi mapa dayani-ṅva apa tan hana srahakənanta masku ri kita,</l>
    1595 <l n="b"><lb n="29"/>ṅhiṅ iki karasikana ya patukva-tukva tarimanta hantusakəna,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="30"/>vacananira prahasana maha ṅgaməl susu bisa mrayé saṅ araras,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="31"/>dalian irāṅdudut talih apan huvus kasah i pundhutan tinitihan. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 255 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="-+---+-+---+------+-+---=" xml:id="rt_41" n="40">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-=</note> -->
    1600 <lg xml:id="rt_41.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="32"/>paḍamu maharip ri sampuniṅ ulah tucapa sahan saṅ mamarvani lulut,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="33"/>prapañca humarəp-harəp ri ḍatəṅa nr̥pati lumavadé raras-rarasira,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="34"/>ya kāraṇaniran paḍa hyas amaharja gəluṅ asalin dukula pinilih,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="31r"/><lb n="1"/>atuṅgalan unéṅnira-lah asénaha turida kinékés hane kati pinə̄m.</l><note>Stanza numbered 256 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    1605 <lg xml:id="rt_41.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>hana guliṅan iṅ karaṅ liman anurvakən i pamanisiṅ smara marəpəhi,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>lana ṅiṅət-iṅət ri buddhya aji yeka tinaha-taha lot vinarṇa ri hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>vavaṅ réṅa-rəṅən rumuṅvi pasurak-siraki panikəliṅ yak adran i təpi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>ya kāraṇanira ṅlilir mujar i kasihira kaka marək vasa ṅisapu jə̄ṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 257 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    1610 <lg xml:id="rt_41.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>kakāṅku mapa deyaniṅvaṅ i manah nr̥pati tan avəlas riṅ onəṅ alulut,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>ndatan tulus ujarnya ṅūni ri səḍəṅku turuṅ anuti polahiṅ silih asih,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>ri kālanika ṅūni duk vau sumomah aku bapa aji ndatan vavaṅ asuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>ujarnya pinasatyakənya yadi tan tulasa si pujin vənaṅ ya luhika.</l><note>Stanza numbered 258 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    1615 <lg xml:id="rt_41.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>sahurnya saṅ inojaran masəmu rāga karana tuməṅgəp éndah araras,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>tuhanku riṅ apaṅ madhubrata madoha riṅ asana sugandha sampun anəḍəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>apan bhramita riṅ səkar <app><lem>kumuda</lem><rdg wit="#JK">kumudha</rdg></app> jaṅga kanigara mavuṅv aśoka surabhi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>ndi yan paḍa lavan manahnya miyatiṅ sumanasa palarənta masku muvaha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 259 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    1620 <lg xml:id="rt_41.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>ujarnya rəsəp aṅlipur-lipur i buddhinira təhər alésyan aṅarih-arih,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>titir vinava riṅ kalaṅvanika denya maṅucap agave raras hatinira,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>anan sinélaṅan kiduṅnya tau rakva maṅusira pi yan tikəl alisira,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>vidagdha bisa maṅdadak-dadak amarṇana kakavin anindha-nindha turida.</l><note>Stanza numbered 260 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    1625 <lg xml:id="rt_41.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="31v"/><lb n="18"/>laluṅ masa pilih ḍavuh ném aturu sahana-hananika ndatan hana ṅumik,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>śaśāṅka gumavaṅ mava kalaṅan arja mamuṅu-muṅu rāga tan duga-duga,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>gərek muni haneṅ dukilyan alaṅa sinahuran i payérnya mandra kumətər,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>anan kadi visik-visikniṅ amaṅun sara mamalihi rāga kuṅ tuna téka. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 261 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    1630<div type="canto" rend="met" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="rt_42" n="41">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+++\-++\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_42.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>mvaṅ sakvehnira saṅ prabhūttama paḍa ṅgéṅ rāga rambaṅ laṅa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>āpan deni lavas nireki mapasah mvaṅ saṅ minuṣṭiṅ hiḍəp,</l>
    1635 <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>yāṅde rañca vinarṇaneṅ puḍak hinaptya pan giṇeṅ lambaṅa.</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>yan pamrəm sakəjəp hanan kadi sumaṇḍiṅ vetniṅ gə̄ṅniṅ lulut.</l><note>Stanza numbered 262 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_42.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>akveh bhāvaniran prapañca təkapiṅ kiṅ-kiṅ paḍa pet raras,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>amrəm karva ṭikā sinuṅkəmanirenasparśa marmé-namér,</l>
    1640 <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>bhrānta pan hiniḍəpnira ṅəsah amiṅkus-iṅkus aṅlad hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>tan ryamban hinaris-harisnira pinak-pak lagya karvan huləs. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 263 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="vidyutkara" xml:id="rt_43" n="42">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_43.01" n="1">
    1645 <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>len tekaṅ mahas aṅlipur-lipurakən huyaṅi manahiran kinūṣaniṅ unəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>ndan rakveki turuṅ smara tura tuhun hana riva-riva saṅ cinitta ri hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>kiṅ-kiṅ rāga silih kirim-kirim ujar ya pirəsəpakəneṅ ṭikānak-anakan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>nāhan hetunirāṅapus kakavin arja vinaca masuluh śaśāṅkakiraṇa. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 264 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="rt_44" n="43">
    1650 <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_44.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="34"/>dyah saṅ lvir kətəriṅ patər mara rarasta hinavara ri tikananiṅ ravi,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="35"/>tvaskva riṅ-raṅ akuṅ ri dohni kahananta riniṅa-riṅakənku riṅ tavaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="36"/>aṅhiṅ teki tuhan svaranta karəṅa mamisiki titir aṅlare hati,</l>
    1655 <l n="d"> <pb edRef="#JK" n="32r"/><lb n="1"/>himpər cataka tāku ləṅləṅ amalar ḍavuhakən i rirista riṅ hulun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 265 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_44.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>nantən masku suvalkv i raśminiṅ ujar vaca-vacaneni maskva riṅ tilam,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>sampun kekət amiṇḍa riṅ karas amūrti kakavin araras linaṅvakən.</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>tan pāṅdeya rəṅunta maṅlaraṅa cihnaniṅ aharəp aminta sanmatan,</l>
    1660 <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>aṅhiṅ teki tuhan təḍaṅkv i kita tan vuruṅa hələm akalihan huləs. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 266 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="vidyutkara" xml:id="rt_45" n="44">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_45.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>nāhan denira maṅlipur-lipurakən lara turida nira-pa<!-- nirāpa? --> tan patahənan,</l>
    1665 <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>ndan riṅ sakṣaṇa śīghra yar təka tikaṅ rahina hana limutnya kumram asinaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>ləs <app><lem type="norm">luṅhaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">luṅaṅ</rdg></app> <hi rend="unmetrical">əbun</hi> avri vahva sinirirniṅ anila kadi ken huvus linukaran,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/><hi rend="unmetrical">candra</hi> lek mavənəs baṅun təkapi tejaniṅ aruṇa suməṅ hanan vahu mijil.</l><note>Stanza numbered 267 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_45.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>ndan saṅ śrī naranātha sampun arahap sira padulu-dulur maliṅgih ajajar,</l>
    1670 <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>kāṅən rakva haləpnikaṅ nagara ramya təkapi lavasiṅ haneṅ para-paran,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>nāhan hetunira harəp muliha sarvi mahavana ḍusun-ḍusun kuluvutan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>śīghra dandan ikaṅ gajāśva ratha maṅkata para ratu sampun arpat atihaṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 268 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_45.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>maṅkat śrī naranātha ləṅləṅ alaṅa matut i ujuṅ ikaṅ pasir ləyəp adoh,</l>
    1675 <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>lalya-lén lariniṅ ratha ṅusir i himbaṅiṅ acala hiriṅ-hiriṅnya təpi lor,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>koṅaṅ matra lurah-lurahnikaṅ aṅarya lamu-lamuk aṅəṇḍəp-əṇḍəp alaṅa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>akveh deśa huvus kalalvan apa tan caritakəna ləpas narendra tumuluy.</l><note>Stanza numbered 269 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_45.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="32v"/><lb n="18"/>ṅkāneṅ ləmbah ika rənəb raca-racah lumu-lumuti vatunya kambah aléyé,</l>
    1680 <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>caṅkriṅ kayunika paruṅ-puṅ i təpinya kamumu makajar-kajar pacar alas,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>sumbér-sumbér ika jajar kalamukan pakis i təpinika ṅurambat aséva,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>paṅ-puṅ paṅgaga len kuvur-kuvur atip kata-katakan apuntya-las maka médhur.</l><note>Stanza numbered 270 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_45.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="32v"/><lb n="22"/>saṇḍiṅ-saṇḍiṅ ika daləm rava-ravan malun-alun anamar-namar tasik anak,</l>
    1685 <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>jrah sogandhika puṣpa maṅibəki lagi pinara-paraniṅ matīrtha gamana,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>tuñjuṅ baṅ hana nīla paṅkaja sumaṅgraha kadi minahā tinandur ahaləp,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>piṅgirnya kamarək-rəkən kayu pu gaṅgəṅ alalé alumut-lumut sumarasah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 271 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_45.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>muṅgviṅ madhyanikaṅ uyambaṅ alaṅa manuk umibər apantha-panthan adalur,</l>
    1690 <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>ləs <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenleft">luṅhā</lem><rdg wit="#JK">luṅa-</rdg></app>nusup iṅ vé yahniṅ anucuk sulur amilihi bhoga tan hana vaneh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>mvaṅ haṅsa jajar iṅ karaṅ tumurun adyus anəṅah asisik-sisik paḍa sukha,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>len tekaṅ manusup-nusup ri səkariṅ sara sija karəṅa svaranya tan avas. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 272 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="rt_46" n="45">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_46.01" n="1">
    1695 <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>buddhi śrī naranātha denya masəkəl yan ton riyātyadbhuta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>kāṅən deni varah mpu <app><lem type="norm">nārada</lem><rdg wit="#JK">naradha</rdg></app> yatāṅde duhkha tan pāntara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>mādəg krodhanirāpa tanpa tahənan muntab dilahnyaṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>ṅhiṅ saṅ rāma jugeki patyana maran maṇḍəg kutugniṅ rajah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 273 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_46.02" n="2">
    1700 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="33r"/><lb n="1"/>nāhan hetunira ṅucap gəlisakən lampahku koṅ <app><lem type="emn">sārathi</lem><rdg wit="#JK">sarathai</rdg></app>,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>ndah havya gigu riṅ avan juraṅ alas durgama yeka vələg,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>agyaṅ rampasa matyanaṅkva kétikaṅ mleccha ṅaran bhārgava,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>sambi teki huripnya ya prasakəneṅkv i tuṅtuṅiṅ sayaka.</l><note>Stanza numbered 274 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_46.03" n="3">
    1705 <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>sampun teki ləpas narendra alivat riṅ deśa tan varṇanən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>mvaṅ tiṅkah ira maṅhisép tan ucapən lvaniṅ təgal koratan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>konjaṅ teki lurahnikaṅ ry anupa deśātyanta riṅ kādbhuta,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>rimpér parvata pavaka gupura deni dityan sumunviṅ laṅit.</l><note>Stanza numbered 275 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_46.04" n="4">
    1710 <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>vr̥ttta śrī naranātha teki rumahun sampun karəṅvan ḍataṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>mantri mvaṅ para taṇḍa rakryan ikanaṅ karya kəmit riṅ purī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>yeka rampak énuṅsuṅ iṅ avan agə̄ṅ dədəṅ pəgat tut hənu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>rəp yékan paḍa bhaktya luṅguh ararəm yapvan alintaṅ aji.</l><note>Stanza numbered 276 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_46.05" n="5">
    1715 <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>ndah yékan alivat siro ləbuh agə̄ṅ sampun ḍataṅ riṅ purī,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>tvasniṅ strī ry anupa giraṅ raga-ragan maṅkén ḍatəṅ saṅ prabhu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>apan ṅūni rikén laput pasamayanya-gya sinuksméṅ karas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>maṅke rakva hiḍəpnya maṅratakəné hyuṅa lavan kéṅgatan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 277 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_46.06" n="6">
    1720 <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>lavan saṅ prabhu māṅhulur sira kabeh samanta sampun téka,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>akveh bhavanira vara-varah i saṅ kalih nira=ṅras hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>maṅgəh rakva siran pasatya tinanyan yan tan salah riṅ varah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>mavat cihnanireki konəṅ alavas gya-gya mareṅ pamréman. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 278 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    1725<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="rt_47" n="46">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_47.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="33v"/><lb n="21"/><app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> ri jro pura sakaraṇḍan atuha nvam arəja sira teki varananén<!-- varṇanən? -->,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>akveh kāri mamitra-mitran ika tan tumut aṅiriṅi jə̄ṅ nareśvarī,</l>
    1730 <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>ndan <hi rend="unmetrical">yeka</hi> kinirim-kirimnira ri santuk ira téka sakeṅ paran-paran,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>tan samvas ya linava-lava kinéreki pahali-hali rékva liṅ nira.</l><note>Stanza numbered 279 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_47.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>len tekaṅ kaka majar onəṅ i təvəknyan alasah alavas ndatan vulat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>maṅke rakva ḍatəṅ taṅ anyaya silih pəkuli gulu makalihan huləs,</l>
    1735 <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>mojar liṅnya tayāntuk-antuki kakanta rari pahalavan tikuṅ manah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>heman masku kiteki tan tumut asəpy aku bibi taya rovaṅiṅ hulun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 280 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_47.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="33v"/><lb n="29"/>nahan denya amet prahasana ri rovaṅ ika vijah akəmbulan lulut,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>tan tuṅgal rva mateki solahan ikaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> arəja-rəja tan ya varṇanən,</l>
    1740 <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>ləs luṅheṅ rahina paganti vəṅi vahva pətəṅ iki pilih ḍavuh pisan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>sə̄ṅniṅ candra mijil mava kalaṅan arja kadi harəp anuṅsu-nuṅsuṅa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 281 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_47.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>ṅkāne morniṅ aśoka padapa narendra paḍa maliṅgih iṅ natar,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>sampun teki sirānaḍah sahananiṅ kaka-kaka manunas paḍa rarəm,</l>
    1745 <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>mamba kasturi riṅ paturvan araras mamituturi kaśaktiniṅ smara,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>sə̄ṅniṅ rāga hane alis kuməḍal asriṅ anamayani muṅgah iṅ jinəm.</l><note>Stanza numbered 282 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_47.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>maṅke muṅgah apə̄m ndatan hana vikalpa ruməgəp isiniṅ karasikan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="34r"/><lb n="1"/>tiṅkahniṅ smara tantra yeki ginəlarnira sari-sari tan kəneṅ vaneh,</l>
    1750 <l n="c"><lb n="2"/>mudrāliṅgana cumbanādi saha japya kakavaśa mateki tan salah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="3"/>nityābhyāsa samādhi saṅgama minuṣṭi ri taruṇa bhaṭāra manmatha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 283 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_47.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="4"/>nda sampun kavaśeki yoganira tapva humiḍəp i katuṅgaliṅ hiḍəp,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="5"/>tan rvekaṅ rva mateki tan tiga maraṅ tiga sakaya sinimpən iṅ hati,</l>
    1755 <l n="c"><lb n="6"/>mūrchāniṅ viṣayāṅrahasyani rahasyanira tuməmu sandhiniṅ smr̥ti,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="7"/>mokṣa rāga mamiṇḍa niṣkala ri sampuniṅ aṅavaki mūrtiniṅ smara. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 284 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagadnātha" xml:id="rt_48" n="47">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_48.01" n="1">
    1760 <l n="a"><lb n="8"/>anantara ri sampuniṅ gati mateki sira tan ucapən paḍāturu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="9"/>muvah sahana saṅ sumevaka ri raganira tiki gumanti varṇanən,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="10"/>huvus paḍa huvus sinūkṣma kinirimnira turida tiniṅgaliṅ lulut,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="11"/>yan iṅ masa silib-silib <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> irika nr̥pati mahas adum karasikan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 285 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_48.02" n="2">
    1765 <l n="a"><lb n="12"/>aneki gumuliṅ-guliṅ sira riṅ ambyanira kadi mahaṅlipur lulut,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="13"/>maṅa lumiyat iṅ vulan kalamukan baṅun aviraṅ i vimbaniṅ mukha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="14"/>ndatan kahuniṅa lukar-lukar ikaṅ gəluṅ akusut anambvakən raras,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="15"/>ḍatəṅ nr̥pati maṅgyat asəmu pacəh sahaja sukha jinaṅgi-jaṅgitan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 286 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_48.03" n="3">
    1770 <l n="a"><lb n="16"/>umuṅgah adulur-dulur sira mareṅ jinəm anəkani senakiṅ manah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="17"/>anan sinəlaṅan priyambada rəṅih-rəṅihiran anukər pinaṅkvakən,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="18"/>suməṅ-səṅ avuyuṅ-vuyuṅ pinari kala mapari ala tan təke hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="19"/>nimittani vuvusnira kətər apiṇḍa riris alit anənvakən hiḍəp.</l><note>Stanza numbered 287 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_48.04" n="4">
    1775 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="34v"/><lb n="20"/>kakaṅku vinaliṅku teki tulus asiha kita ri tuvuhku kasihan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="21"/>ujarta kita ṅūni kési ri hatiṅku kadi madhu huvus vinəṅyakən,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="22"/>yateka mabalik laré-tvasi arinta sinalahasa denta tan tuhu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="23"/>bətahta riṅ hiraṅ pujin prabhu vənaṅ luhika ri samyanta riṅ hulun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 288 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_48.05" n="5">
    1780 <l n="a"><lb n="24"/>tuhanku mapa ṅojarāṅkva ri sahutva ri kita bibi tan anenaka,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="25"/>katuhvan iki māṅsa deśa mapa deniṅ aṅasa ri vuyuṅta riṅ hulun,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="26"/>yadin pva kita naku daṇḍa rari mon tilana təṅahi masku lampunən,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="27"/>tathāpi marək aku nityasa matuṅgva kidhépa i daganta tan saha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 289 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_48.06" n="6">
    1785 <l n="a"><lb n="28"/>nahan vuvusnira ṅiris hati mapeka tan adhédhésa saṅ kinolakən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="29"/>huvus katəmu muṣṭiniṅ tapih i madhyanira vas lukar tiniṇḍihan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="30"/>chinidra kiniré-yva kamrén i manis-manisiṅ ujar améṅakən lulut,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="31"/>nimittaniki hənti sihnira tan olya pakaparani kiṅkiṅiṅ hati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 290 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_48.07" n="7">
    1790 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="34v"/><lb n="32"/>taṅéh yan ucapén raras-raras ireki saharas i daləm pasaṅgaman,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="33"/>atīta rahina buṅah ri vijiliṅ ravikiraṇa <app><lem type="norm">sudīpta</lem><rdg wit="#JK">sudhipta</rdg></app> riṅ laṅit,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="34"/>paḍa hyas aradin-radin sahana saṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> i dalam apupul paḍa raras,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="35"/>maraməṅ-aməṅ iṅ taman mahas-ahas ri huvusira mamukti saṅgama.</l><note>Stanza numbered 291 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_48.08" n="8">
    1795 <l n="a"><lb n="36"/>katuhvan ika vah kalaṅvan ikanaṅ racana ləyəp amiṇḍa riṅ tulis,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="37"/>mapaṇḍan akaraṅ liman ləṅəṅ apañcuran aranu bukurnya tut sisi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="38"/>paranti pinaran-paran saṅ adulur-dulur araras arumpukan gaḍuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="39r"/><lb n="1"/>ya kāraṇanireñjaṅ-eñjaṅ alaṅa hənəṅakəna narendra varṇanən. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 292 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="rt_49" n="48">
    1800 <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_49.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>ambək śrī naranātha mepu apəga maṅaṅən-aṅən i dagdhaniṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>ndan saṅ rāma jugeki tan hana vaneh kinira-kira pakesiniṅ hiḍəp,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>nāhan hetunirāharəp mijil ahə̄makəna sahana saṅ vatək ratu,</l>
    1805 <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>mvaṅ mantrī para taṇḍa <hi rend="unmetrical">yudha</hi><!-- yuddha? yodha? --> marək apupula<!-- marəkāpulula? --> ya sakatambayeñjiṅa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 293 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_49.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>sampuh rakva ghinoṣitan sahananiṅ bala marəka kabeh manaṅkila,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>mvaṅ raṅkaṅ hana bhakti marpat ahaləp rinacana sinugandha lepana,<note>After this line, <ptr target="#JK"/> has: <foreign>(malya-baṅ pinako-pa sobba mideriṅ taretepan ivaṅ)</foreign>, the brackets clearly being meant to cancel the words in question, which are identical to 48.3c. The scribe realized he had skipped ahead.</note></l>
    . <!-- <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>(malya-baṅ pinaké-pa sobba midəriṅ tarétépan ivaṅ)</l> -->
    1810 <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>śobha listiṅ i madhyaniṅ vataṅan énjah arəja tinulis bhinūṣaṇan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>mvaṅ luṅsir kanaka dravāraṅ i hiriṅnya kumuliliṅ arambatan tətə̄.</l><note>Stanza numbered 294 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_49.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>gambar mas vuvuṅanya kumram akuvuṅ-kavuṅ asəmu sinaṅliṅiṅ ravi,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>abhrāṅəṇḍəp atiṇḍu-tiṇḍu palisirnya maparada suvarṇa komala,</l>
    1815 <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>malyābaṅ pinakopaśobha midəriṅ tarətəpan arəcəp rinūpaka,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>ṅkāne duryani kontal-ontal ika camara minirah atuṅgalan padu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 295 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_49.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>ndah sampun sumənəha taṅ śayana kr̥ṣṇa guməlar i harəp mapadapa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>mvaṅ ratna sina siṅha rūpa sapatarana valunika ratna kambala,</l>
    1820 <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="35v"/><lb n="16"/>rva taṅ catra haneṅ harəpnya suməkar maṅadəg-adəg adaṇḍa mas tatur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>kīrṇa kəmbaṅ ura sugandha ri natarnya təlas iki siniṅsətiṅ jənu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 296 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_49.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>sampun prāpta para prabhūttama manaṅkil apapul araran paḍa haləp,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>mvaṅ mantrī karuhun purohita vidagdha sira pinakamaṅgaleṅ sabhā,</l>
    1825 <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>sakvehniṅ paməgət ri kirva niti paṅhulu nipuṇa ri tiṅkahiṅ naya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>kapva liṅgih atiṅkah akrama paḍa ṅiṅət-iṅət i sinādhya saṅ prabhu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 297 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_49.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>munya saṅka mr̥ḍaṅga munda ri vijil nr̥pati sira huvus mabhūṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>somya dandan aliṅgih iṅ kanakasiṅha maṇimaya suteja bhāsvara,</l>
    1830 <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>śīghra pan tumuluy purohita maśānti təhər aṅabhivāda śāsvata,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>len mantrī paḍa bhakty anəmbah i narendra matiki karuhun para prabhu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 298 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_49.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>tan sah saṅ kavi rāga hetuka mamaṅku pasərəhan aliṅgih iṅ batur,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>mvaṅ sakvehnya anaṅ vahin larasa teki ana marək amaṅku taṅkulak,</l>
    1835 <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>rəp ndatan ana śabda matra karəṅa ri harəp i vuri tan hanāṅucap,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>mojar śrī naranātha riṅ bala samūha sama-sama manaṅkil iṅ sabhā. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 299 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="rt_50" n="49">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+++\-++\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_50.01" n="1">
    1840 <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>he sakvehniṅ para prabhūttama sama ṅgéṅ sevaka riṅ hulun,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>mvaṅ mantrī pata bāhudaṇḍa pinatih riṅ rājaśāstrādhika,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>saṅ <hi rend="unmetrical">hyaṅ pina</hi>kādiniṅ kuśala riṅ dharmāpagəhniṅ naya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>yatnāyatna <app><lem rend="check">rahadya</lem><rdg wit="#JK">rahadya<del>n</del></rdg></app> saṅhulun atakya rəṅvajarniṅ hulun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 300 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_50.02" n="2">
    1845 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="36r"/><lb n="1"/>sampun vruh ṅvaṅ ikeki bhaktini bapāṅkun tonku yan riṅ jagat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>sāsiṅ śatru huvus viśīrṇa paḍa bhakti ṅke ri jə̄ṅniṅ hulun,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>ndātan len kita hasta pāda kəta <hi rend="unmetrical">saraṅrakṣake</hi><!-- sārāṅrakṣake? --> tan vaneh,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>śaktinteki ya kāraṇanya mapagəh riṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> sinaṅgah prabhu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 501 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_50.03" n="3">
    1850 <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>maṅke pvan hana bhāra donku laki havyaṅde ragətniṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>mvaṅ tan duryaśa səṅgahə̄n mimul-imul ry asihta deniṅ vuvus,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>vruh ṅvaṅ yan riṅ apeki névéha kitery āptiṅku tan laṅghyana<!-- norm. laṅghana? -->,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>yadyan teki huripta kahyuna huvus saṅka ry asihteṅ hulun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 302 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_50.04" n="4">
    1855 <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>prastāvanya nihan haneki kasusuk ri tvasku maṅde səkəl,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>nojar saṅ r̥ṣi <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenright">nāradā</lem><rdg wit="#JK">naradha-</rdg></app>vara-varah ṅunin ḍataṅ riṅ purī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>vantən paṇḍita śakti saṅ paraśurāma khyāti siṅ rat kabeh,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>donyābhyāsa <hi rend="unmetrical">dhanurdhara</hi> mapasa <hi rend="unmetrical">vīryāṅkvi</hi> jagat kottama.</l><note>Stanza numbered 303 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_50.05" n="5">
    1860 <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>saṅkṣepanya vuvusku yeka amukən donən təkap saṅhulun,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>denyan matya riṅ āśramanya rəvəkén hayvenapés hop gəlis,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>tovin saṅ katuduh marāṅjəjəpa tiṅkahnyeki samun ḍatəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>nda yeka sakatambeyeñjiṅ irikan kun lampah opadgata.</l><note>Stanza numbered 304 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_50.06" n="6">
    1865 <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>maṅke pveki viveka yekana dələ̄nta siṅ samāṅyogyana,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>prih-prih denta pakojariṅ kira-kira pəh-pəh vijilniṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>mvaṅ sastreki<!-- śāstra? śastra? --> gamana vadhi ginəlar petən pagantākəna,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>siṅ solihta maṅadvakən vinaya yeka dlāha yata dələ̄n. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 305 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    1870<div type="canto" rend="met" met="sragdhara" xml:id="rt_51" n="50">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">++++\-++\-\-\-\-\-\-++\-++\-+=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_51.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="36v"/><lb n="23"/>nāhan liṅ śrī narendran mujar i sahananiṅ vīra yodha prihiṅ praṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>rəp kapvānəmbah iṅ śrī narapati tumaḍah ry ājña saṅ nātha tan len,</l>
    1875 <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>sampun śīghra paliṅgih krama dadi sumahur saṅ mahāyodha mantrī,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>khyātiṅ rat saṅ makon iṅ kira-kira mapatih vīrasiṅheṅgitajña.</l><note>Stanza numbered 306 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_51.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>sojar śrī nātha sampun hana ri hati minuṣṭy ājña saṅ śrī narendra,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>ndātan saṅke manah vr̥ddhi karaṇanikaturniṅ apiṅgiṅ <app><lem rend="check">təkasvi</lem><rdg wit="#JK">teka<del>p</del>-svi</rdg></app>,</l>
    1880 <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>tiṅkahniṅ sevake pan rasa-rasana hatur pva ṅhulun mo pituhvan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>jati muparpasa svaṅ katugətakəna sojarnya ta hop karəṅva.</l><note>Stanza numbered 307 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_51.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>ndah sampun ṅvaṅ ruməṅva ya bhimatanika saṅ pakṣa donən tékana,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>tan saṅke vīrya tan saṅka riṅ aharəp hinak madéhaṅ rājamānya,</l>
    1885 <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>yan vantən mana duṣṭa ṅapak aṅapa karih dhyāna lavan samādhi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>ndah yakan śaktiniṅ laṅkap himadu pinéniṅ paṅhilaṅ vāhya śatru.</l><note>Stanza numbered 308 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_51.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>maṅke donən mapāṅdon aṅusirən aharəp kīrti tan dady avr̥ddhi,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>apan kadéh təkapniṅ maṅavata ya səḍəṅ saṅ maṅelala dharma,</l>
    1890 <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>saṅkṣepanyeki rakṣan aji kuməmita saṅ sādhu tan lamba-lamba,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>sama mvaṅ dhana yar vehākəna maləsa riṅ jana su-ddharpa śakti.</l><note>Stanza numbered 309 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_51.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="39"/>yadyastun śuddha karya mənaṅa mara ajəṅ yuddha yāṅde prapañca,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="40"/>āpan <app><lem type="emn">byaktekanaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">byatekanaṅ</rdg></app> ya tumuvuh aseva riṅ vəltikiṅ mana karma,</l>
    1895 <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="37r"/><lb n="1"/>lavan yan sora maṅkin rahayu makaphalaṅ vadhaniṅ rat kapaṅgih,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>rug taṅ dharma pagəh kadi hiṅaraman i vadniṅ <hi rend="check">kaduryaśa magə̄ṅ</hi><!-- or kaduryaśan agə̄ṅ? -->.</l><note>Stanza numbered 310 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_51.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="37r"/><lb n="3"/>nāhan doniṅ mahém buddhi milihana kaṅ opaya yagya petən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>yapvan sampun taya doṣa yatika hamésan lakva saṅ niti manta,</l>
    1900 <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>ndah yan tapvan tayāṅdon maya tika vulikén met-metən tan tahən tvas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>hayvenaṅgəh vavan adah rasana ya ləvədən havya tan yatna-yatna. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 311 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="basantatilakā" xml:id="rt_52" n="51">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">++\-+\-\-\-+\-\-+\-+=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_52.01" n="1">
    1905 <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>nda kantənanya aji havya bharaṅ lumampah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>yapvan turuṅ katəmu sendikaniṅ ginoṣṭhi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>tan vruh yatevəh ana tevəh <hi rend="check">ikan</hi><!-- ikaṅ? --> kinārya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>prajñā ṅaraṅyaṅ avikeka təbəṅ lumakva.</l><note>Stanza numbered 312 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_52.02" n="2">
    1910 <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>maṅke pva yuddha gəlarən aji havyva mana,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>tuṅtuṅniṅ evəh ati tiṅgitaniṅ nayeka,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>ton tiṅkahiṅ musuh apet iṅ upāya sandhi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>kośanya vāhana balanya déla təkapta.</l><note>Stanza numbered 312 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_52.03" n="3">
    1915 <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>sampunya maṅkana ataṇḍiṅ akasniṅ ambək,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>yan sor titihnya ciri vədya kunəṅ kuraṅ tvas,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>kośanya tan hana balanya kuraṅ viveka,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>sép glis rəvək təkani havya vineh adhana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 313 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_52.04" n="4">
    1920 <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>ndan yan paḍeki hana śakti hanan vivaka,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>taṇḍiṅ masalyan apa tan hana soriṅ ambək,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>kālanya deśanika hér juga havya magya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>prih taṅ upāya karananya maran virodha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 314 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_52.05" n="5">
    1925 <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>sampun pvaya-mbala virodha kəneṅ upāya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>durbala paṅrəṅə̄-rəṅə̄n ika vākparuṣya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>siṅ śakti yeka hiniḍəpnya sadhara mojar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>dr̥ṣṭa vasananika mati hələm təkapta.</l><note>Stanza numbered 315 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_52.06" n="6">
    1930 <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>yapvan musuh ləvih anəki balanya makveh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>kośanya sāgara paḍanya hanan atamba,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>hayva rəsəh gumaveya kuṭa durga mevəh,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>mvaṅ paṇḍitāśraya<!-- sreya? --> sira bvat haneṅ svakārya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 316 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_52.07" n="7">
    1935 <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>sāsiṅ prayoga gaveyən ya saendikanya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>vidveṣa lan taṅ abhicāruka japya siddhi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>sampun pva yeka kavaśe ta samaṅka donən,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>dravyanya sadhana ajin malape huripnya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 317 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_52.08" n="8">
    1940 <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>saṅsipta yan musuh ateki hanaṅ viveka,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>maṅke pva rāma juga saṅ rəvəkən təkana,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>antyanta sādhu tuvi paṇḍita <app><lem>mr̥ddhu</lem><note>Spelling <foreign>metri causa</foreign>.</note></app> rūpa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>tan vruh paṭik haji ri deyaniṅ aṅlagana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 318 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_52.09" n="9">
    1945 <l n="a"><lb n="39"/>nojarniraṅ mapatih akṣama yar pataṅguh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="40"/>vetniṅ kabhaktin ati satya viśeṣa mantrī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="41"/>ḍaṅ hyaṅ purohita sirojar aṅakṣama rum,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="42"/>yogyan rase haturi saṅ mapatih sumantrī.</l><note>Stanza numbered 319 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_52.10" n="10">

    . <l n="c"><lb n="45"/>mvaṅ sādhananya tan abhasa lava alanya,</l>

    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>yeka miruddha magave pətəṅiṅ svacitta,</l>

    1965 <lg xml:id="rt_52.13" n="13">

    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>maṅka hiḍəpku lahi tiṅkaha saṅ narendra,</l>

    1980 <lg xml:id="rt_52.16" n="16">

    1990 <lg xml:id="rt_52.18" n="18">

    2020 <lg xml:id="rt_52.24" n="24">

    2025 <lg xml:id="rt_52.25" n="25">

    . <lg xml:id="rt_53.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="57"/>na vuvusiraṅ narendra sumahur magadhendra rəsəp,</l>
    2035 <l n="b"><lb n="58"/>prabhu riṅ apeki rakva vihaṅe paṅutus nr̥pati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="39r"/><lb n="1"/>sakaharəpanta yadyapi huripku ya tan təṅətan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>pakənanikiṅ masevaka suməmbah i pādukadi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 336 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_53.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>iki mara bhāra donani paṭik haji de nr̥pati,</l>
    2040 <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>si maṅiriṅe narendra mayase praṅa toha hurip,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>vnaṅ apa ṅaranya tan maharəpeṅ <hi rend="check">daśa</hi> vīrya ləvih,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>tinuduhakən ananya musireṅ hyaṅ ananta śiva.</l><note>Stanza numbered 337 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_53.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>athava yadin mareṅ niraya loka ya tar vihaṅa,</l>
    2045 <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>itipan ikiṅ kavah rumuhune sukhaduhkha haji,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>niyata paṭik narendra musireṅ hariloka hələm,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>yan agaməlan kabhaktin atisatya ri ājña haji.</l><note>Stanza numbered 338 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_53.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>nr̥pati ri aṅga rājya sira mārdava yar umatur,</l>
    2050 <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>riṅ apa paṭik haji vənaṅ alaṅghyana tan tumuta,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>tuhun iki hīna śakti masa tambəha tapya guṇa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>sada ta jugāṅrivəg-rivəgane suku saṅ nr̥pati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 339 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_53.05" n="5">

    . <lg xml:id="rt_53.06" n="6">

    . <lg xml:id="rt_53.07" n="7">
