    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="sragdhara" xml:id="rt_54" n="53">
    2070 <lg xml:id="rt_54.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>mojar śry avantinātha ṅgréguta bapa kunəṅ buddhi saṅ śrī narendra,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>an saṅ rameku donən paja kétaṅ aṅucap yan huvus dhīra riṅ praṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>ton-ton de saṅhulun mapraṅa hələm i harəp śrī mahābhūminātha,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>téh ndyanuṅ taṅ kavədya gada-gadana kunaṅ mon silih daṇḍa-daṇḍan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 343 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2075 <lg xml:id="rt_54.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>apan tahv ika saṅ bhūpati miyati paṭik nātha riṅ yuddha ṅuni,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>tapvan kondur təkapniṅ ripukula rinəbut riṅ musuh bhīṣaṇākveh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>madya-<hi rend="check">dyas</hi> thana lagyesuh-isuh i luṅidiṅ kandha kéntaṅ pulaṅ rah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>dhvastekaṅ cāpa cakra kr̥tala ya pinusus kasya himpərnya cūrṇa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 344 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2080 <lg xml:id="rt_54.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>maṅke pvan jamadhagni vinuvus ika kaśaktinya tasyaṅ kavədya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>yadyan gandharva <app><lem>vidyādhara</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vidhyadhara</rdg></app> mapuliha ya ṅké ri saṅ rama tosén,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>vilniṅ vil yakṣaniṅ yakṣa tan ika katakutniṅ hulun dadyavr̥ddhi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>aṅhiṅ dharma pagəh mon pəjaha kadi rajan cūrṇaniṅ bhindhi vala.</l><note>Stanza numbered 345 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2085 <lg xml:id="rt_54.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="39"/>dhīrāmbək śrī kaliṅgādhipa dadi sumahur yukti liṅ śrī narendra,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="40"/>toh ndya-nuṅ teki maṅgəh ṅhulun iki sapasaṅ saṅhulun hayva mundur,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="41"/>kralniṅ dhīra napan mārga maṅusira yaśa ṅir-akén dharmakārya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="42"/>ndan saṅ śrī nātha muṅgvi vuri umabéta sarathya riṅ dharmayuddha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 346 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2090 <lg xml:id="rt_54.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="43"/>taṅhéh ki kāryasiddheki yaṅ inucap-ucap tan kavastvan vəkasnya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="44"/>yadyan siṅ kārya mevəh ləkasana ta huvus hayva maṅgén vikalpa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="45"/>kevəhniṅ dharma mevəh juga luməkasa ta bvat vuvus tan viveka,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="46"/>apan doniṅ hurip meman iki kava təkeṅ kr̥ṣṇa makveh tinolih.</l><note>Stanza numbered 347 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2095 <lg xml:id="rt_54.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="47"/>lavan sakveh vatək bhayakula madhakép kapva magyanékana,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="48"/>matus taṅ raja samanta paḍa vija-jivah ténya tuṅgal ginoṣṭhi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="49"/>maṅke kupvan dadak védhya paran ika kavédhyāṅkva liṅnyeṅ sabha ṅras,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="50"/>ṅuni yuddheki tapvan ana manaha-naha naṅsayé śatruśakti.</l><note>Stanza numbered 348 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2100 <lg xml:id="rt_54.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="40r"/><lb n="1"/>yeko śatrunta vanya mapagakəna pamuk taṅ mahāyuddhamadhya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>apan tuṅgal yaniṅ śakti sama-sama yadin mr̥tyu matvaṅ tumuṅkul,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>yadyan brahmādi tar vanya ya lumiyat apan deni géṅniṅ prabhāva,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>vīryanteka haləpniṅ raṇa bhavana sumusvi jagat sūryaniṅ rat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 349 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2105 <lg xml:id="rt_54.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>ṅuni ta ravana-lah taya maṅadu ri géṅniṅ kaśaktin prabhita,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>marmanya aruk anəmbah ri aji makapanuṅkulnya rajyanya ləṅka,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>raṅkaṅ mas mulya saṅke hyaṅ amarapati ṅunin səḍəṅ digjayeṅ praṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>strīratnādinya len taṅ rajata kanaka vastrārja pavatnya mulya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 350 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2110 <lg xml:id="rt_54.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="40r"/><lb n="9"/>harṣāmbək śry arjunāṅrəṅvakən i pamuji saṅ rāja samanta mahya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>hetunya bajra muṅgviṅ muka kadi sinaṅa hrét kutuṅiṅ kadhīran,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>himpər siṅhāṅréṅa géntér avurahan avu kapva tan vriṅ manahnya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>mojar saṅ hyaṅ kas-aṅkas nr̥pati ménéb-énéb dagdhaniṅ tvas tumaṅgəh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 351 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2115 <lg xml:id="rt_54.10" n="10">
    . <l n=""><pb edRef="#JK" n="40v"/><lb n="13"/>ayéy sakvehta vīrottama hana kariké śatru tan bhraṣṭa denta,</l>
    . <l n="n"><lb n="14"/>sakvehniṅ rājadhāni ndi kari taya duruṅ dagdha tapvan maṅuṅkél,</l>
    . <l n="o"><lb n="15"/>kīrtinté-kya pagəh riṅ tribhuvana vəki sék deni géṅniṅ kaśaktin,</l>
    . <l n="p"><lb n="16"/>tuṅgal tapvan kavastvan pati juga ta vəkas misyanaṅ kṣatriyāṅśa. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 352 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    2120<div type="canto" rend="met" met="mr̥dukomala" xml:id="rt_55" n="54">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_55.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>nojar śrī naranātha teki sumahur ta rakryan apatih,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>bisniṅ lah səkəliṅ tvas arddha pinégéṅnira srét i gulu,</l>
    2125 <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>mojar mandra pəgat-pəgat vuvus ira taréh tan asarag,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>bhakttya mrih-mrih anémba-nəmbah umusap ri jéṅ(nua) narapati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 353 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_55.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>é nathāṅka aihan rəṅən hatar ikiṅ kapapa kalusa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>tan saṅkeṅ avalépa dénani paṭik narsandra umatur,</l>
    2130 <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>géṅ trésna ati sihniṅ aprabhu ya hetuni ṅvaṅ amuvus,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>yadyan siṅ sarasanya de nr̥pati mon mareṅ salah ika.</l><note>Stanza numbered 354 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_55.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>tiṅkah sevaka tar vənaṅ palé-paléh rumakṣa ri aji,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>apan papa jugeki rakva numulat yadin uménéṅa,</l>
    2135 <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>nda yan tan amatur hita-rtha i siraṅ sinévaka nira,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>bhaktyaṅ duryaśaniṅ jagat ṅani-ṅunin kadi ṅhulun iké.</l><note>Stanza numbered 353 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_55.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>nahan don mami sarjaseki amatur tatan dva ri aji,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>msaṅ mantri kaya parnahiṅ hulun apeki tar paṅucapa,</l>
    2140 <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>marmāṅkva mrih ataṅgé-éṅgéh i harəpta tan pati tumut,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="41r"/><lb n="1"/>apan byakta mateki yar kita mamaṅguhaṅ lara hələm.</l><note>Stanza numbered 356 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_55.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>maṅke pvan savuyuṅ narendra taḍahan paṭik narapati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>yadyastun pajaheki paṅraha təvək saréndra karika,</l>
    2145 <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>mvaṅ téṅgék mami tiṅhasénta ya manarjanéṅ ripu kala,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>tan satyeki ṅaran paṭik aji humintareki sakilan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 357 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_55.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>lavan yan tinsheki tan tumut asiṅ saduhkha nr̥pati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>yāṅde salya ané tvas atiki jémah narendra mulata,</l>
    2150 <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>yan tan matya riko-harəpta masiluṅ-luṅa pada aji,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>yapvan yaddha hələm syapeki mulaté daləm pabharatan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 358 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_55.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>dira-mboknira sojar asru tvi tan aneki tinaha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>luṅhaṅ buddhi kasatvika sumaputaṅ kasiṅhan i sira,</l>
    2155 <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>édran tiṅhal iréṅ sabha sahana saṅ tiniṅhalan arés,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>apan tan hana vanya maṅpaṅa mulat juga-muka nira.</l><note>Stanza numbered 359 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_55.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>nojar saṅ mapatih ndatan ana mumik para prabhu kabeh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>bhyam sakveh para taṇḍa yodha ṅuniveh balapratihata,</l>
    2160 <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>deniṅ buddhi kasādhun atvaṅ apagəh kasatyan i sira,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>tovin tanpa paruṅvaniṅ naya sabha sudhīra nipuṇa. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 360 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="rt_56" n="55">

    2165 <lg xml:id="rt_56.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="41r"/><lb n="17"/>sampun mayu ṅalapkəneki tadanantara mari maṅucap nayodhara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>śīghra prāpta tikaṅ taḍah paḍahi maṅdulur i vuri yathākrama haləp,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>sakveh-kveh para taṇḍa riki maṅiriṅ saha vəḑihan anambah iṅ sabhā,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>ramya sraṅ saṅ aniṅkāṅiṅkah itisiṅ sapaṅaləpaṅ iniṣṭiniṅ hati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 361 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2170 <lg xml:id="rt_56.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="41v"/><lb n="21"/>nda yeka ri huvus narendra manaḍah sahana-hananikaṅ rasādhika,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>sakvehniṅ carikan yateka ḍinavuh-ḍavuhakən i siraṅ para prabhu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>mvaṅ mantri para taṇḍa tan hana kuraṅ paḍa vəki-vəki sə̄k təke vuri,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>norāṅsalnya huvus tikaṅ akuda sārathi paḍa ya makambulan cacar.</l><note>Stanza numbered 362 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2175 <lg xml:id="rt_56.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>atyadbhūta haləpnikaṅ taḍah aneka surasa hana māṅsa <hi rend="unmetrical">matayaka</hi>,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>saṅkəp sahaneṅ pasir vukir ateki paḍa hana bhinuktya véh sukha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>vah milya tvak avarṇa sāgara səḍəṅ pasaṅ atiki sakeṅ daləm purī,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>somya liṅgih acum tikaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> alarih-larih ajajar atuṅgalan sajəṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 363 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2180 <lg xml:id="rt_56.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>sakveh saṅ anunas paḍa sraṅ aṅinum sahana saṅ larih paḍa larih,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>brəm <app><lem>tampvānadu</lem><rdg wit="#JK">tamp<del>a</del>van adu</rdg></app><!-- tampva madhu? --> lobha riṅ rasa-rasanya ya rinasa-rasanya patya ya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>tambul-tambul akendah-endah adulur-dulur ahulur alivran aṅhaləp,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>makraṅ makrama maṅhañaṅ-hañaṅ aminta hara mataritip lavan tirəm.</l><note>Stanza numbered 364 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2185 <lg xml:id="rt_56.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>varsih saṅ maṅinum kabeh paḍa huvus varəg atiki samaṅhañut cacar,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>prāpta candana cūrṇa kapura dinum-dumakən iki huvus kinasturi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>sumrak gandhanika haneṅ jaja haneṅ muka saha səkar arja riṅ kapa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>kapva gīta hana nr̥teki vinidhi nr̥pati vijah adumpi-dumpilan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 365 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2190 <lg xml:id="rt_56.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>ndah yeka paḍa garjjiteki para yodha maṅucap asélur sadha cakép,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>agyāṅrampak smatyanaṅ ripa kula-ki vuvus ika manambyayaṅ hurip,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="42r"/><lb n="1"/>krodhāmbəknya ana ṅrégut micépi lambé yika kadi véra-véra dava,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>aṅga kara musus tananya saha bhavaka kadi ana maṅgaməl curik. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 366 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    2195<div type="canto" rend="met" met="-+---+-+---+------+-+---=" xml:id="rt_57" n="56">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_57.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>huvus maluvaran katéki saṅ ahém sahana-anani taṇḍa rakryan umulih,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>narendra tumuluy mareṅ paṅuṅaṅan prasana-sama<!-- is prasama-sama or smthg like that intended? --> para prabhūttama marək,</l>
    2200 <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>kathañcana gubar ḍinəṇḍa saha goṅnya kumətug aparəṅvan iṅ kṣititala,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>ratag sahananiṅ balādhika sudhīra mijila ya maśabda réṅ ləbuh agə̄ṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 367 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_57.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>ḍataṅ sahananiṅ pravīra saha bhūṣaṇanika pinasaṅnya kumram asinaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>piraṅ ivu pireki lakṣaṇika tar kavənaṅ iki tiṅhalan vinulatan,</l>
    2205 <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>tumandaṅ i harəp narendra paḍa pantəs arəja tuhu vīrasiṅha nipuṇa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>vidagdha ṅakarah masiṅhəl akalan paḍa lituhayu anvam uttamakula.</l><note>Stanza numbered 368 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_57.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>praya nr̥pati saṅ tumandaṅ araṅin saha karah i jajarja vīrataruṇa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>vatək madanarūpa saṅ van aṅiriṅ mapati-patihan <hi rend="unmetrical">ujvala</hi><!-- ujjvalā? --> vinulatan,</l>
    2210 <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>ravisni palaganya kumram iki camara putih hinaṅit rinūpaka tinap,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>curiknya kadi mr̥tyu danta lumarap maṅayam-ayam i jīvaniṅ ripukula.</l><note>Stanza numbered 369 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_57.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>haneki madulur <app><lem type="norm">tumandaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">tumandhaṅ</rdg></app> asinaṅ kadi kusuma sumamburat vija-vijah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>vaṅ uttama pakəmba-kəmbaṅan ateki makarah asusun vidagdha riṅ ayun,</l>
    2215 <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>ulihnya paḍa vīra riṅ raṇa sabhūṣaṇanika paḍa lurva pitana kuniṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>titir kalilipiṅ musuh praṅ ika tan hana maṅucap amundur eṅ pabharatan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 370 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_57.05" n="5">

    .</div>

    2225 <lg xml:id="rt_58.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>avicaritan laluṅ masa narendra vāhu tumurun sakeṅ paṅuṅaṅan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>sahananikaṅ makañjar umulih kasovaṅaniran huvus maluvaran,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>narapati mañjiṅ iṅ pura sire daləm ri kahanan narendra mahiṣī,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>vahu sumurup hyaṅ arka tumibaṅ ḍavuh valu təkaṅ śaśāṅka sumilih.</l><note>Stanza numbered 372 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2230 <lg xml:id="rt_58.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="27"/><app><lem type="norm">jalada</lem><rdg wit="#JK">jaladha</rdg></app> haneṅ laṅit kadi sinaṅliṅ iṅ śaśadhara sinaṅ makalaṅan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>vahu suməkar haneṅ talaga kəmbaṅiṅ kumuda gandha mari kumudu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>rumarab ikaṅ rərəb-rərəb umampva amvas aniram kucup kagərəhan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>paḍa matihaṅ mayat məkar akəmbaṅiṅ mənur <hi rend="unmetrical">hinimbu</hi> muṅgvi gəluṅan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 373 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2235 <lg xml:id="rt_58.03" n="3">

    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>irika narendra manvit avarah sire saṅ araras ri yaṅkatanira,</l>

    2240<div type="canto" rend="met" met="navaharṣa" xml:id="rt_59" n="58">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-\-+\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_59.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>ibu pamvitani ṅvaṅ i kita bibi maṅkata tāku tuhan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>saka<app><lem rend="hyphenleft" type="norm">tambayeñjiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">-tambeyeñjiṅ</rdg></app> irika larisaṅkv iki maṅluruga,</l>
    2245 <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>kalavan bala saṅghya maṅiriṅa huvus kinudur-kuduran,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>para taṇḍa para prabhu panəpi kabeh paḍa vāhu ḍatəṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 375 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_59.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>hana teki si rāma ṅaran ika musuhku yathā amukən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="43r"/><lb n="1"/>rarahən patapanya pəjahana ri madhyanikaṅ palagan,</l>
    2250 <l n="c"><lb n="2"/>yadiyan hariloka parananiki muṅsira pāda hari,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="3"/>valaténkv i tikan vitakəna ri bhaṭāra huripnya huvus.</l><note>Stanza numbered 376 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_59.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="4"/>pavəkas-vəkasaṅkva ri kita bibi karya ta riṅ nagari,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="5"/>kəkəsənta ajəṅ kakahatakəna teki rarasta tuhan,</l>
    2255 <l n="c"><lb n="6"/>sakalaṅvaniṅ adri pasisi tuduhənkv iki karya muvah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="7"/>pakənanya rumakṣa lumipa-lipura-ki manahta nakuṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 377 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_59.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="8"/>panikəl-nikəliṅ ryak apata-patahan mələs arja siṅi,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="9"/>mamaharja gəluṅta makusut hinure katitih-titihan,</l>
    2260 <l n="c"><lb n="10"/>səminiṅ kayu teja makiris akila kariris-ririsan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="11"/>sari-sarya tika mitaturana laṭinta yadin kasaraṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 378 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_59.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="12"/>jaladhāraṅ <hi rend="unmetrical">añavəli vijili kukusiṅ</hi> bañu kumram alit,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="13"/>kadi kenta lukar suruhananika masku ya tan huniṅa,</l>
    2265 <l n="c"><lb n="14"/>pupusiṅ liraṅ arja pumati aṅisis vahu-vahu məkar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="15"/>ya matuṅgva təṅahta nahayaṅ aṅelih pinépét-pəpətan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 379 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_59.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="16"/>katəriṅ patər aṅusa suhunan aṅanti ririsnya sumar,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="17"/>ləṅəṅ aṅarih arya mupih-upiha teki rəṅihta nakuṅ,</l>
    2270 <l n="c"><lb n="18"/>panəḍəṅni səkarniṅ asana karuhun kagərəh-gərəhan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="19"/>mapavana suyaṅta pakənanika matya sinəmpal alum.</l><note>Stanza numbered 380 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_59.07" n="7">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-+\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-\-+\-\-=</note> -->
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="43v"/><lb n="20"/>na vuvus naranātha maméṅé-méṅén ojar asuṅ turida,</l>
    2275 <l n="b"><lb n="21"/>gərəhiṅ katiga raras asəmu riris pinakāmbəkira,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="22"/>riṅ apeki ya tan rəṅə-rəṅən <hi rend="unmetrical">asəmu lata vəlas harəp</hi>,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="23"/>niyatanya aluṅ asəmi turida rāga masarya lulut. o .</l><note>Stanza numbered 381 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="girisa" n="59">
    2280<!-- <note type="prosody">\-\-\-\-\-\-+++++\-\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="24"/>kaka haji vihikan ṅvaṅ ry ambəkta larisa hələm,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="25"/>kunəṅ amuhara kiṅ-kiṅ riṅ tvasku mətu-mətu luh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="26"/>sipi ali-alini-ṅvaṅ yan rakryan laris anuku,</l>
    2285 <l n="d"><lb n="27"/>hana kavədi mataṅyan rəñcəm tvasku kadi linud.</l><note>Stanza numbered 382 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="28"/>rəṅən atəki pataṅguh-taṅguhiṅ hulun i haji,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="29"/>maṅimur-imur apet sih saṅke sihkv i kita kaka,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="30"/>sahana-hanani vadvanta siṅ śakti lumarisa,</l>
    2290 <l n="d"><lb n="31"/>kita kavəkasa riṅke rajyevəhnya pari tahan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 383 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="32"/>sarasa pəjaha tāṅvaṅ yadyan kantuna lumurug,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="33"/>sinaputan i gəṅiṅ sih deniṅ tan vənaṅ apasah,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="34"/>taha karika katolih ṅvaṅ denta kari pəjaha,</l>
    2295 <l n="s"><lb n="35"/>ndi kari manisiṅ ojar tan kesyan śapatha haji.</l><note>Stanza numbered 384 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="36"/>yadi larisa riṅ eñjiṅ rakryan havya ali-alin,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="37"/>niyata tumuta ta ṅvaṅ sakvan selvan adulura,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="40"/>yadi pəjaha sukha ṅvaṅ yadyan sora kita hələm,</l>
    2300 <l n="d"><lb n="41"/>kadi vahu-vahu kāṅvaṅ kuṇḍaṅ-kuṇḍaṅa riṅ ayun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 385 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="42"/>nahan ujarira marma mlas harṣa ṅətəri hati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="43"/>saha luh i mata milya drəs hisnya avan i pipi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="44"/>nr̥pati sira mamak-pak mojar lvir madhu tinakis,</l>
    2305 <l n="d"><lb n="45"/>vacananira kadi pyah tamba-tambaniṅ ataləh. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 386 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="śikhariṇī" xml:id="rt_60" n="60">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">\-+++++\-\-\-\-\-++\-\-\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_60.01" n="1">
    2310 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="44r"/><lb n="1"/>ariṅkv induṅ vruh ṅvaṅ ri ali-aliniṅte ṅhulun ibu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>tuhun marmaṅkva taṅgəhi kita yadin milva lumurug,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>ivə̄hiṅ praṅ yadyan ṅvaṅ arivega tar top ṅvaṅ agigu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>rusithiṅ<!-- rusitiṅ --> mārga séṅkan ajuraṅ alas durga paraṅan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 387 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_60.02" n="2">
    2315 <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>kunəṅ yan rakryan monəṅa lavasa takviṅ para-paran,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>vacan sambat-sambatku kavəkas umuṅgviṅ karas alit,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>paraṅkv iṅ lambaṅ yeka rasa-rasananteki yan akuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>tan olya ṅvaṅ yadyan puri-purik haneṅ jro pakasutan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 388 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_60.03" n="3">
    2320 <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>lavan pintaṅkva iṅ bibi saṅu təṅah sampun aṅisis,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>səpah saṅke caṅkəm paséré-séréhankv ikin anuku,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>dhadarkva siñjaṅ sah ri panəpi sumar yeki palakun,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>rəṅihtatma rakṣāṅkv aṅən-aṅənaniṅ tvaskun alaga.</l><note>Stanza numbered 389 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_60.04" n="4">
    2325 <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>tuhun pavat-vatniṅ hulun i kita maskv iki tariman,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>vruhante gə̄ṅ riṅ sih pakiri-kiriyaṅkv i kita tuhan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>laṅəniṅ kiṅ-kiṅ cumbana vəkasi rumniṅ karasikan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>puputniṅ rāga misyani samaya śr̥ṅgāra racana. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 390 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    2330<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_61" n="61">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_61.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="44r"/><lb n="17"/>huvus nr̥pati muṅgahiṅ jinəm aṅalihi turida miniddhyaniṅ smara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>rarasniṅ ujar asrah aṅrahati sojar ira kadi juruh lavan madhu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>baṅun salaga maṅrəṅa gərəh ateki turida niran aṅdadak məkar,</l>
    2335 <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>savaṅ bhramara matta muṅgvi səkariṅ kumuda turuṅ avarsih iṅ gati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 391 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_61.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>sapolah ira teki yén paḍa vicakṣaṇa manəkani senakiṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>anan kavatək aṅgaməl-gaməl anan pamalaku vhiliṅ tapih suji,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>ané gulu silih vilət-vilət ateki luṅayanira tan salah dunuṅ,</l>
    2340 <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="44v"/><lb n="24"/>kirinciṅ ikanaṅ kalé susu numuṅgvi vətis ira baṅun kinaṅsyakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 392 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_61.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>anantara tiba tikaṅ ghaṭita piṅ lima huvusiṅ amukti saṅgama,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>paḍa mrém iki séṅ haneṅ jinəm aṅgarvani huləs apupul silih pédhak,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>ndatan ana vikalpa solahiṅ aṅéka tana paḍa madum-duman lulut,</l>
    2345 <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>təṅahnira turuṅ kasah ri luṅayan nr̥pati tuhu makəmbulan hurip.</l><note>Stanza numbered 393 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_61.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>gumanti tucapən para prabhu kabeh balasah apəga tan kəneṅ turu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>paḍa ṅaṅən-aṅən ri tiṅkahaniṅ aṅlagana mapaga śaktiniṅ musuh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>lavan takisaniṅ silih praṅa silih tutuga musala bajra tomara,</l>
    2350 <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>hana ṅiṅət-hiṅət dhanur dhara samaṅ-haləpa yadin umuṅgva riṅ limén. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 394 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_62" n="62">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_62.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>sakvehniṅ bala yodha garjjita paḍa gya-dan harəp maṅkata,</l>
    2355 <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>sranta-mbéknika yan paṅanti paṅarah hetunya maṇḍəg muvah,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>radga mvaṅ palaganya sampun atihaṅ vahvas curik saṅkəpan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>eñjiṅ rakva pilih vaṅundhahina ginya-kén maṅantyaṅ sabhā.</l><note>Stanza numbered 395 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_62.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>tinyap taṅ kula saṅka ghūrṇita umuṅ goṅ kéndhaṅ mtya-dbhuta,</l>
    2360 <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>hetunya bala samprayukta padhadhan ṅanti vijil saṅ prabhu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>névi <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> gaja réṅga vaji marasuk saṅkəp kabeh sayudha,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="40"/>sar sə̄k taṅ vataṅan təkeṅ ləbuh agə̄ṅ tan pantara-tip ḍəḍət.</l><note>Stanza numbered 396 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_62.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="41"/>umvaṅ tanpa paruṅvan atri gumuruh taṅ śabda tan paṅkuré,</l>
    2365 <l n="b"><lb n="42"/>nvaṅ pahyaniṅ asiṅha nada kumətər himpər sarakniṅ tasik,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="43"/>paṅhrikniṅ gaja matta ghurna maparəṅvan iṅ laṅit katara,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="45r"/><lb n="1"/>lyab taṅ rat kadi koncaṅ andha bhuvanan kandhég baṅun kabvatan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 397 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_62.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>samanta prabhu vīra sampun arəpat lavan bala hya umuṅ,</l>
    2370 <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>saṅkəp taṅ géja sévu riṅ sajuru ya-dhém tan kavoran dudu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>téṅranyo –jvala kumlab olah aṅalimpva-néka varṇa dyoti,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>apan ca-prabhu-sa-prabhūttama madudvan vīra cihnéṅ raṇa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 398 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_62.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>samanta prabhu uhaya pupul anaṅkil muṅgu riṅ samaja,</l>
    2375 <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>nvaṅ vadvanira rotta-rotta matihaṅ kadganya has saṅkəpan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>nuṅgvi asva sahasra len kaṅ aḍarat movi-vu laksa pupul,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>kapva-dhém ya makandha-kandha savatəknya tuṅgalan témara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 399 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_62.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>saṅ śrī nātha mijil sakeṅ pura sira-dan maṅkat apadgata,</l>
    2380 <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>sampun mahyas abhūṣaṇa-rjja suména ratnanya muṅgviṅ jaja,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>śīghra-dan maṅadəg siréṅ gupura harṣan tén vatək éhaya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>lavon saṅ prabhu sevaké-aji padhāṅgéṅ bhékti tan laṅghyana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 400 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_62.07" n="7"> <l n=""><pb edRef="#JK" n="45v"/><lb n="14"/> nakryan saṅ mapatih vidagdha ta sira mvat ryājña saṅ bhūpati,</l>
    . <l n="j"><lb n="15"/>kapva dan-dan aniṅka-niṅkaha ri lampah saṅ vatək yuddhaga,</l>
    2385 <l n="k"><lb n="16"/>apan ṅhiṅ vinuvun vicakṣaṇa yan iṅ byuha pagəh kottama,</l>
    . <l n="l"><lb n="17"/>təkvan yatna riṅ hiṅgita vruh i rusitniṅ praṅ huvun vadaka. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 401 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_63" n="63">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.01" n="1">
    2390 <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>ndan śrī magadha pati pancadhasiṅ laku sabhūṣaṇanira pinasaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>muṅgu iṅ gaja abhinasa sukla varṇa kadi parvata hima sumaput,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>svéta-mbhara védhihanireki śuddha tinulisniṅ aruṇa didhiti,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="45v"/><lb n="21"/>mvaṅ cakra ri vurinira hira culanika dipta salaga suména.</l><note>Stanza numbered 402 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.02" n="2">
    2395 <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>vadvanira ana gaja sévu matta ya tinampil ika kavigaran,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>siksanya paḍa kavasa paṇḍitéṅ tarali saṅku kaya gaja pati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>saṅkyaṅ ruhu-ruhunan aṅimbaṅiṅ sira kr̥ta-rtha mayasa riṅ ayun,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>védurya pinahat shaləp karahnya marasuk ana matapu-tapu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 403 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.03" n="3">
    2400 <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>péka yudha piraṅ ivu laksa bhīṣaṇa pénuh pracalita gumuruh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>téṅranya kadi jaladha cancalo-jvala tinubniṅ anila sumahab,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>radganya nisita kuməḍap kilatnya guru vindanika ya dumilah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>śabdanya ana kadi gélap sahasra ya manambora acala sikara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 404 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.04" n="4">
    2405 <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>harṣāmbək ira nagadha raja sahya miyatiṅa aruha-ruhan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>krura ṅgétém maṅadəg i réṅganiṅ darirada matta palagan agalak,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>daṇḍa yudha pinutér ira-kivan ri téṅénan ana sili-silihan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>lagya lagi-lagi takisiṅ silih palu ya kādbhuta tinakisakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 405 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.05" n="5">
    2410 <l n="a"><lb n="34"/>ṅkāne vuri narapati yaṅga rajya ana riṅ ratha kanaka maya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="35"/>vé kram ta makuṭa nira/rakta kadi pavaka səḍəṅ umurub, /dipta</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="36"/>vastra-rjja védhihanira gandha késara subaddha mapamulu tatur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="37"/>abhra dhanuh i taṅanireki taṅkalak umuṅgvi ta kuraṅa nira.</l><note>Stanza numbered 406 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.06" n="6">
    2415 <l n="a"><lb n="38"/>sakvehni balanira haneṅ pinati paḍa vīra nipuṇa riṅ ayun,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="39"/>malyala curiga ana bajra konta ana tosara palaga tuvuk,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="46r"/><lb n="1"/>sarvva bharana carama vīra cihna savənaṅ-vənaṅ ika rinasuk,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>cipta kara i jaja mapadma rāga pinatik mata-mata lumarap.</l><note>Stanza numbered 407 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_63.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/> vadvanira rata hampak-hampak avijah raga-ragan avéra,</l>
    2420 <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>sar sə̄k sésék asélur atindih hopék apəḍək-pəḍəka silih hidhék,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>raktaṅ dvaja paḍa kumélab ravisni palaganya kumutug avilət,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>rupanya namadha badhava gni maṅgéséṅana tribhuvana bhavana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 408 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>mvaṅ vīra taruṇa mapupul pinik paḍa gunanya pamaja sinélir,</l>
    2425 <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>saṅkəp sikəp ika mavataṅ papan paḍa vidagdha vinani mapupuh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>siṅhəlnya mapati-patihan karahnya salivah paḍa taya linévih,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>dévaṅga cari-carikan ojvala-bhra kavacanya ya makara-kara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 409 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/> goṅ (géndhiṅ) kéndhaṅ i harap ira ghūrṇita tara-tara dvaninika karəṅa,</l>
    2430 <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>yeka ṅgugah i manah ira kasiṅhan ati dhira sumaput i hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>yatna ṅgénéṅi laras irekivan paha vélun təhər hinayatakən,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>mvaṅ hrunya ana maka hiṅan ri karna patitisnya tiṅət-iṅətakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 410 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="46r"/><lb n="15"/>ryaṅkatnira narapati sṅhalo-gra kadi siṅha variṅut agalak,</l>
    2435 <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>muṅgviṅ ratha mani maya mantén éndah ati bhīṣaṇa tara suména,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>syama réja pamulunika sinaṅliṅ i kəḍapniṅ abharana lumə̄ṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>nabhraṅ kavaca mukuṭa vidrumo-ttara su-bhaskara sama dumilah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 411 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>rakta dhika ya pinakabau daṇḍanira mambaṅi ri vuri nira,</l>
    2440 <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="46v"/><lb n="20"/>lakyaṅ kuda makuda-kudan vidagdha mamutér palu-palu ginéga,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>kruraṅ kavaca vési capiṅ-capiṅnya nava ratna salaga kuményar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>kila pracala séna su-jvali jaja karahnya sahaja tinatur.</l><note>Stanza numbered 412 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.12" n="12">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>séna ḍarat i harəp i vuntat atri manabéh padhai vija-vijah,</l>
    2445 <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>sambartaka mavilət akét dvajanya mahirəṅ paḍa kagiri-giri,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>matta ṅamah-amah aṅunus kr̥tala mala kétu lumarap i taṅan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>himpərnya gana-gana bhaṭāra bhérava tékāṅrimaha ripu kula.</l><note>Stanza numbered 413 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_63.13" n="13">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>dhira-mbék ira lumiyat iṅ bala dhika mahém hilaṅi musuh ira,</l>
    2450 <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>dagdha ṅgéséṅi tamah ikaṅ vréko hati niré-jvala tara kumutug,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>hetunya aténiṅ alilaṅ kasiṅhanira tan hana pati-patihan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>muṅgviṅ gadanira huripiṅ musuh kahiḍəpanyan iṅiliṅ-iliṅan. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 414 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_64" n="64">
    2455 <lg xml:id="rt_64.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>maṅkat śryavantinātha haləp asinaṅ ikaṅ bhūṣaṇa bhra prabhanya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>muṅgviṅ asthya ruhur pat gaḍiṅ ika lumarap ratna réṅganya muncar,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>rvekaṅ catra kuniṅ lvir kanigara suməkar kusya raganya kumram,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>sə̄ṅniṅ cakra-taṅan lvir śaśadhara mavélu dipta sampun sinaṅliṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 415 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2460 <lg xml:id="rt_64.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>vadva néka praviro-ttama ri vurinira tuṅgalan taksa madrəs,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>kadga jyo-jvala mr̥tyu-njaya sama pinéniṅ santalanyé gra béjra,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>len tekaṅ paṇḍitaṅ daṇḍa musala ginéga sula len bindhi sala,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>vah riṅ mas bhūṣaṇanya réja paḍa tinatur lvir gunuṅ kancana bhra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 416 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_64.03" n="3">
    2465 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="47r"/><lb n="1"/> sakvehniṅ peka yodha ḍarata sukha matambéh paḍa siṅha nada,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>śabdanya hya umuṅ ghūrṇita kadi sinaṅéṅ svarga kagyat vatək hyaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>kumlab taṅ taṇḍa dumra kréti maṅalad-alad lvir hélarniṅ kagé-ndra,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>ginval taṅ bhéri hunyaṅ murava saha kala saṅka masraṅ maganti.</l><note>Stanza numbered 417 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.04" n="4">
    2470 <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>dudvaṅ sampun dinanan ana ri hiriṅ iran <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> pinik kavaṅanya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>sélvirniṅ ratna mulya bharananika tinémbaṅ gunanyéṅ raṇāṅga,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>katvaṅiṅ kala daṅstra-dbhuta curiganika lyus anaṅ asta lila,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>lantaṅ-lantaṅ vara-stra-rjja tuluka kuməḍap bhavananya tulis mas.</l><note>Stanza numbered 418 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.05" n="5">
    2475 <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>maṅkin harṣekana-mbéknira miyati rəgəpniṅ maha séna śakti,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>umvab taṅ krédha muṅgviṅ hati mapanas ikaṅ dhira maṅde kasiṅhan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>midər taṅ cakra himpər képér i taṅan ira ṅkériṅiṅ bhaskarāṅsu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>lvīryan kadya harəp jiva manaḍaha baṅun harṣa méṅis vajanya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 419 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.06" n="6">
    2480 <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>ṅkan lampah śrī kaliṅga dhipa ri vuri huvus maṅrasuk ratna cihna,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>mornaṅ mvaṅ bau rakṣa-rjja mukuṭa suména séṅniṅ cuda maninya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>śuddha lyus raja siṅha-mbara védhihanira mrik huvus gandha lépa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>sahya nuṅgaṅ siré-réṅga mani maya hinéniṅ maha taksya turna.</l><note>Stanza numbered 420 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.07" n="7">
    2485 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="47r"/><lb n="17"/>mottaṅ rodra prihiṅ praṅ marək i sira paḍa tuṅgalan kadga tikéna,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>yatna nampil gaja nindya maṅuliṅ inakusnya ṅrék asiṅha nada,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="47v"/><lb n="19"/>sambya ṅulvala kandha-dbhuta pinutérakən lvi tathit saṅghya masraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>intén kévala lumréṅ jaja karah atatur mvaṅ lajur séṅka-séṅlan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 421 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.08" n="8">
    2490 <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>len taṅ vadva ḍarat bhīṣaṇa paḍa kalalah mahyun skirtya riṅ praṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>kapva hya sumba-sumbarnya tau pinakajiva-ntaniṅ śatruśakti,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>patrém vahvan curik mvaṅ karatala ri taṅannya-rddha sampun minuṣṭi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>tuṅgalnyé-lah baṅun megha marək iṅ aruṇa vyaṅnyan anéka varṇa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 422 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.09" n="9">
    2495 <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>ndan vantən siṅha viréṅ raṇa pamaja nira-dhém haneṅ kéri tan sah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>dhira-nvan tus-tusniṅ rottama gana kula-kulanya dhikéṅ dharma yuddha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>malyala kadga pinrih kanaka tapu-tapunyéṅ hulu mvaṅ karah mas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>simpiṅ-simpiṅ kurugnya réja pati-patihan kambala bhra rinaṅki.</l><note>Stanza numbered 423 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.10" n="10">
    2500 <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>dhira-mbék śrī kaliṅga dhipa kadi vinarah saṅ təkapniṅ kaśaktin,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>jvalani tvas lumiriṅ sukha maṅiṅah-iṅah tan aneki tinaṅgél,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>mundhodho-kaṅ lipuṅ bhīṣaṇa kadi muburaṅ sapta patala yar ton,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>nitya rumbah dagiṅniṅ musuh aṅira-hira praṅ muké-sri narendra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 424 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.11" n="11">
    2505 <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>maṅkat srya-rjuna kadga taṅ paḍahi bhéri murava kala saṅka maṅgala,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>muṅgviṅ syandhana ratna saṅghya saha bhūṣaṇanira mani ratna bhāsvara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>nirmo-kaṅsuka karni kara suci vastranira kinédhapiṅ siva jyuti,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>malyulaṅ kr̥ta parmata-rjja kinaluṅ-kaluṅakəna haləp haneṅ gulu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 425 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.12" n="12">
    2510 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="48r"/><lb n="1"/>rvekaṅ catra huvus məkar mabuk-akundhur adhanuh anamar nisakara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>daṇḍanyeki su-varṇa saṅhyata sinaṅliṅiṅ aruṇa su-parna bhāsvara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>diptaṅ capa ané kivanira minuṣṭi təlas inabhi-mantra sasvata,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>naracanya siyuṅniṅ antaka mara nagihakəna ri jivaniṅ jagat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 426 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.13" n="13">
    2515 <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>rakryan saṅ mapatih siré-harəp aṅimbaṅi ri laku natréndra tan madoh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>mataṅga-njana matta vahana nira-dbhuta maruhur apūrva bhīṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>rundha karmani punja tiksna lumarap bhramita pinutér ujvalo-ttaṅan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>kasraṅ deni sénanikaṅ savit umuṅgvi jajanira maṇīndra kostubha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 427 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.14" n="14">
    2520 <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>vadva-néka diniṅ nanarpat aṅiriṅ saha turaga huvun bhinūṣaṇan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>kandhandanya sivit tatur paḍa vidag-dha tau sinara bhara riṅ musuh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>mvaṅ momo madha tanpa mulyani huripnya yasa jugaṅ hiniṣṭi-kéṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>mimpér parvata dhuma kétu panéṅérnya dasādisi mava tiniṅhalan,.</l><note>Stanza numbered 428 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.15" n="15">
    2525 <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>mvaṅ sakveh prabhu éhaya ṅiriṅ aṅimbaṅi ri suri ané hiriṅ nira,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>mévi-vāṅgaja réṅga ratna ratha vahana sira kadi éma parvata,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>saṅkəp sampun amusthi sañjata sama ṅinaki sikəp ika ndatan salah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>dudvaṅ tomara bhindhi vala sara cakra musala vara bajra hémani.</l><note>Stanza numbered 429 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.16" n="16">
    2530 <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>sasri varṇa para prabhūttama sabhūṣaṇanira kumadhap nira-ntara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>nimpér devata saṅhhya rupanira nahyaṅ arəja paḍa śaktya nindita,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>mrém tāditya su-baṅsu tapva miyatiṅ mukuṭakiraṇa hira sandhala,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>andhekiṅ bhuvana-ndha yan taya sabhūṣaṇanira paka suryaniṅ jagat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 430 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_64.17" n="17">
    2535 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="48v"/><lb n="21"/>buddhi śrī naranātha harṣa miyatiṅ para ratu paḍa vīra nu-srama,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>yadyan svarga vuvus nira-ki rarahén-ku kakavaśa manuṅkulo ryaku,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>maṅke pvan ari rama cūrṇa niyatanya paṅucap ira dhira tan salah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>lavan saṅ kavi rāga rtuka ané vurinira marək aṅavin laras. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 431 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_65" n="65">
    2540 <lg xml:id="rt_65.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>taṇḍa dhika madulur i vuntat atri gumuruh gagana tala pəpət,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>kothya balanireki bala ginégénya musala nisita, (?)</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>muntab dilahi layu-layunya kadrəsén aṅin gumivaṅ avalikan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>liṇḍuṅ bhuvana kapéləṅən təkapi kétuṅiṅ gubar amaji kapa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 432 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2545 <lg xml:id="rt_65.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>lampahni balanira samuha tan pagat apantha maruhu-ruhunan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>lvir guntur aṅaraman alas juraṅ gunuṅ hinambah alubut hinidék,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>gémpuṅ kayu-kayu kadi vagrah adbhuta sila tala kadi ginugah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>tég ghér svarani pakétébiṅ gaja sva ratha vinlég alég apəḍək.</l><note>Stanza numbered 433 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2550 <lg xml:id="rt_65.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>lvirniṅ kahala atisayaṅ maha-dbhuta juraṅ lvah adaləm agənət,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>tut lambuṅiṅ acala ri vindya parvata hiriṅnya təpi-təpi kidul,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>rug bhraṣṭa sikaranika kogah arddha gumivaṅ kṣititala kumətug,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>vuṅkal rémék apadu təṅahnya dulu məlek kandha gagana vəki sék.</l><note>Stanza numbered 434 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2555 <lg xml:id="rt_65.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>saṅhara kahiḍəpan i lampahiṅ bala samuha gumuruh asélur,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>lvirnya gni guméséṅana panca bhuta téṅéranya dumilah umurub,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="49r"/><lb n="1"/>kadganya nisita kadi mr̥tyu dhaṅstra lumarap kakiricik akilat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>nvaṅ lvir para ratu sata rudra rodra sakala-dbhuta kagiri-giri.</l><note>Stanza numbered 435 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2560 <lg xml:id="rt_65.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>byatīta lakunira ləpas aneki palagan katəmu təkap ira,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>vaṅkrahnya palagan avathaṅ papan kajulanah katəmu ləvas avuk,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>mvaṅ syandana tikəl apasandhi cakranika kéri kalilih apasah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>lénya-stika vavayah atap kapala kamukan trana vahu tumuvuh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 436 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2565 <lg xml:id="rt_65.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>deśa-dbhuta ri təpi-təpinya dharma riṅ husana masamun amukah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>śīrṇa gupura kahabalaṅ anyar<!-- hañar?--> katuvuhan kayu-kayu rumahab,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>bapranya lumajur aruhur sila tala binajra maputih aṅisis,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>kayvanya ana kari mavandhira-rjja jari paṅaya ya paḍa (maruhur) masulur.</l><note>Stanza numbered 437 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2570 <lg xml:id="rt_65.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>ṅkano kidukita ana poh mahanya kari ruksa ya huvus atunu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>kamvagan asəkar i natarnya maṅhébéki len patula maṅalasa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>vaṅkenya mahaṅir aṅisut ləvas pinaraniṅ səmut adulu-dulur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>lumpaṅnya ya ana magilaṅ-gilaṅ palésaṅanya ana alut adin.</l><note>Stanza numbered 438 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2575 <lg xml:id="rt_65.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>maṅkin lakunira lumurug ndatan ana vikalpa gumuruh abaruṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>sakvah para ratu paḍa garjjita ṅamah-amah saha bala masurak,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>agya ṅamuk aṅalapa jivaniṅ musuh amékana hulu riṅ ayun,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>mvaṅ deśa sika paravasan yateka rarahén géséṅana rabhasan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 439 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2580 <lg xml:id="rt_65.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="49v"/><lb n="19"/> sakveh saṅ atapa ri pamiṅgiriṅ gunuṅ arés mavédi giri-girin,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>kapva lulunan akətəran kabeh paḍa musir sikara masusupan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>sāsiṅ kahənu təkap ira-ki bhasmi ana deśa juraṅ alas ṅéṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>lvir sāgara balanira mombakan gaja rathanya ya maṅalun-alun.o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 440 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2585</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_66" n="66">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_66.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="49v"/><lb n="23"/>bhavisyati ləpas narendra anan aṅhinép sumélaṅ iṅ avan saha bala,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>ḍatəṅ sira rikaṅ təgal pabharatan samipanikaṅ asramāṅgəgər i sor,</l>
    2590 <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>banaspati tahənya kādbhuta képuh saraṅ ana kukap ragas katuléjég,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>édumbar adavat kagunturan ikaṅ sila tala matis dukut lamur akét.</l><note>Stanza numbered 441 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_66.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>patémvan ikanaṅ nadhi suci banynnya madrəs iki sapta tīrtha mapupul,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>gəgər tutugéniṅ maha giri kidulnya sapta kula parvata-dbhuta magə̄ṅ,</l>
    2595 <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>lébanya ana sévu yéjana dudug téké tapinikaṅ catur jalasidhi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>narendra mabhavah siré-rika para prabhūttama paḍa mrih akuvu-kuvu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 442 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_66.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>bala sraṅ arépét padhati ya tiniṅkah akrama huvus dinaan apagəh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>ikaṅ gaja paḍa ṅhrik asraṅa sasiṅha nada kuda śuddha sampun arasuk,</l>
    2600 <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>umuṅ təkapi śabdaniṅ murava bhéri sunda kala saṅka ghūrṇita nulup,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>svaranya kadi śabdaniṅ gélap aghāṣa sévu ya manambar adri kumupak.</l><note>Stanza numbered 443 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_66.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>paḍa vri malayu kénasnya sahaneṅ sukət kabarasat paḍa mrih anusup,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="50r"/><lb n="1"/>lavas vrésabha riṅ təgal-təgal apantha-pantha ana sévu kagyat slayu,</l>
    2605 <l n="c"><lb n="2"/>nusir gunuṅ alas anan masaoaran mareṅ lvah adaləm təgal-təgal adhas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="3"/>aneki kari tuṅgal adbhuta masiṅha nada təhər aṅdapur tar atakut.</l><note>Stanza numbered 444 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_66.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="4"/>narendra numulat kapuhan ati bhīṣaṇanya kadi ciṅha rodra magalak,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="5"/>siraṅ paraśurāma rakva maka drévya ctunika śakti dhira matéhén,</l>
    2610 <l n="c"><lb n="6"/>ya ctu naranātha umvub ikanaṅ panas hatinireki maṅkin abutéṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="7"/>ratag sahauniṅ bala ṅapusa śīghra yar téka vaseki sampun apagəh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 445 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_66.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="8"/>ikaṅ tapa-tapa-hvan avri malayu musir patapan arddha śīghra tumuluy,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="9"/>téka vara-varah satorasi manəmbah adhara ri jamadha gni samuyug,</l>
    2615 <l n="c"><lb n="10"/>ujarnya ana teki śatru téka manjarah vrécabha dasta ya ṅapa karih,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="11"/>nuvus hibék ikaṅ təgal pabharatan təkeṅ juraṅ alas gunuṅ vəki pénuh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 446 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_66.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="12"/>yateki vilasanya rakva suburekiṅ asrama ya cūrṇitan təkap ika,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="13"/>maṅadva kaparākraman malavané bhaṭāra guru havya teki uménéṅ,</l>
    2620 <l n="c"><lb n="14"/>apan bhisama bénti mati kula gotra saṅhulun apéki dhana ta husus,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="15"/>mapa kira-kireki lampaha bhaṭāra aysa juga tan prayatna riṅ ulah. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 447 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_67" n="67">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_67.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="16"/>yatna dandan siraṅ rama parasu ana riṅ syandhana lva bhīṣaṇa,</l>
    2625 <l n="b"><lb n="17"/>anpukiṅ yoga śīghrar téka hinaṅən kalaniṅ dharma yuddha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="50v"/><lb n="18"/>laṅkap sampun dinanan kavaca saha capiṅ hru təkeṅ taṅkulaknya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="19"/>kruraṅ aṅga avāgə̄ṅ jatha mukuṭa baṅun kala rodrāṅga kara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 448 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_67.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="20"/>maṅkin sahya rasuk bhūṣaṇa mani sapaninskaraniṅ déva saṅghya,</l>
    2630 <l n="b"><lb n="21"/>ndah rakva nugraha hyaṅ parama siva lavan sendikanaṅ kaśaktin,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="22"/>lon tekaṅ kundala bhra apaṭikā kadi vulan séṅnya riṅ bau lumraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="23"/>acédya-tya-dbhuta grahya sira ri ananiṅ sarvva santyo-pa kara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 449 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_67.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="24"/>rəp śuddha jñāna sarvva radhana kinénakən saṅhétiṅ mantra siddhi,</l>
    2635 <l n="b"><lb n="25"/>prāptaṅ gandharva vidhyadhara saha bala kosa dulur vahananya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="26"/>sar-sék lumréṅ bhuvah loka ṅamara bala kapvāṅrégap sañjatanya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="27"/>yaksa mvaṅ rakṣasa-dhém piśāca gana-gana bhuta détyāṅga saṅghya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 450 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_67.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="50v"/><lb n="28"/> ryāṅkatniṅ déva saṅghya nduluri laku niran rama sampun sénaddha,</l>
    2640 <l n="b"><lb n="29"/>saṅkəp muṅgviṅ gaja syandana turaga mavastra-rjja dévāṅsuka bhra,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="30"/>salvirniṅ mulya riṅ svarga ṅabharana niké-ndah taya-martya loka,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="31"/>mimpér vintaṅ sumunviṅ gagana kapuratak saṅśaya kveh matambéh. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 451 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_68" n="68">
    2645 <lg xml:id="rt_68.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="32"/>ṅkāneṅ harəp ira citraṅgadha mahavan sakatha sakadga,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="33"/>réṅganya kanaka sandhyanya kuməḍap avyaṅ gagana kasénvan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="34"/>vidyadhara maṅiriṅ pik-pikan ika suréṅ raṇa paḍa śakti,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="35"/>dhira nvam akula késiṅ sara pada téṅranya patavala bhra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 452 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_68.02" n="2">
    2650 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="51r"/><lb n="1"/> rotta dhika pamaja rvaṅ niki umapit muṅgviṅ hiriṅ ira-rpat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>ndan vanya musala konta kavaca tatur hira dhara capiṅnya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>matta jənu masəkar campaka tinajug muṅgvi gəlaṅan aśrī,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>sampun pinaha-sukaṅ bhoga surasa yéko-ttama madhu parka.</l><note>Stanza numbered 453 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_68.03" n="3">
    2655 <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>muṅgvi vuri sara gandharva pati siraṅ citraratha nimba,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>sarvva bharana muṅgviṅ sakatha hiniriṅ haya cada kaddhas,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>vadvanira maṅiriṅ lvir latu-latu sabhra kanaka sinandhaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>cakrar yudha pinatih bajra cakala kodaṇḍa sama sabhaṅsa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 454 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_68.04" n="4">
    2660 <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>gandharva pinuji suréṅ raṇa kalilipniṅ sura ripu śakti,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>tan sah ri sira rumakséṅ raṇa bhaya taṅ saṅ ndani vara yuddha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>téṅgranya jaladha kr̥ṣṇa-nda kinédhapiṅ sodhamani təpinya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>lvir sāgara pasaṅ astya-dbhuta pamépékmiṅ bala paḍa mahya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 455 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_68.05" n="5">
    2665 <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>vidyadhara taruṇa nvan rikita haneṅ kunjara saha konta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>ratnāṅga dhi lita avay-dhika vékaniṅ rotta sura su-rakṣa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>matambalan ikakar-svaṅ padha-padha tus-tusniṅ smara sura,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>déva-mbara védhihanyo pati-patihan bhūṣaṇa mani ratna. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 456 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    2670<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_69" n="69">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_69.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>ṅkāneṅ déksina ratna séna pinatih sahya ṅadəg riṅ liman,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>muṅgviṅ bama surat rajanya sépasaṅ riṅ dhira vīra nulus,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>vadvanya-dbhuta sévu taṅ mapalaga patrém curik saṅkopan,</l>
    2675 <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>téṅranyāṅsuka éma śuddha tinalisniṅ sandya kala kilat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 457 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_69.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="51v"/><lb n="21"/> ndan saṅ śrī vara citra séna pinakatuṅga graniṅ sañjata,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>lavan devata saṅghya sésinikanaṅ svarga ṅiriṅ bhīṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>laksa-laksa pireki tapva vilaṅiṅ vadvanika kveh dahat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>sarsék taṅ padhabur bhuvah svah shiṅan taryanta limpad ḍəḍət.</l><note>Stanza numbered 458 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2680 <lg xml:id="rt_69.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>sakvehiṅ gana bhuta rakṣasa lavan daitya ṅuhuh ghūrṇita,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>saṅ nandādinikaṅ haneṅ gagana dik pūrva papal bhīṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>tikana lva badamanya yo-nutitakən muṅgviṅ taṅan tan kara,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>śabdanya kupik ahyun anapaha téndhaniṅ musuh tar vaneh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 459 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    2685 <lg xml:id="rt_69.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>muṅgviṅ dakṣiṇa deśa bhuta gana yan riṅ śakti tan pépama,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>khyātiṅ rat vara mata arta jinurun anéka vadva dhika,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>avyaṅ bhavana tulya varṇanika maṅda katakutniṅ mulat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>kadganyeki padha-ti tikana təlas aṅhrét téṅgékiṅ dur-jana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 460 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_69.05" n="5">
    2690 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="51v"/><lb n="33"/> ṅkāneṅ paséima sirsa bhuta pinatih sahya-ti rodra-dbhuta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>lampahnya sru paḍa ḍarat vija-vijah śabdanya muṅgviṅ laṅit,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>lindhu taṅ bhuvané-lah arddha gumivaṅ guntur tikaṅ parvata,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>katrag-katrag hinambah ogah arémuk vuṅkal madadya héni.</l><note>Stanza numbered 461 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_69.06" n="6">
    2695 <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>parnah lor mahavan tasik jaladhara rampak paḍa bharava,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>vattaryādinikaṅ maha bala baṅun kala-ntaka ṅinḍarat,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>mékél romanika-ksi mulyar avélu kala gni sākṣāt murub,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="40"/>dhaṅstranya adu kundhalinya lumarap himpər jahitniṅ laṅit.</l><note>Stanza numbered 462 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_69.07" n="7">
    2700 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="52r"/><lb n="1"/> ndan saṅ śrī vara bhuta raja ri təṅah mundhéndha-kén tomara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>séndhuṅ bhīṣaṇa bayu bajra cara śīghra nindya tan popama,</l>
