    2705<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_70" n="70">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_70.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>śīghra praté-kanaṅ taksaka maṅalad-alad sapta jihvanya rodra,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>sarsék saṅke rikaṅ patéla mavilət akét lvija loka-dbhuta-dhém,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>sémbur-sémburnya lumra misani visanika lyus maha tiksma danta,</l>
    2710 <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>ṅak ṅak ṅak ṅak svaranya baṅun atanya-tanya ryuṅgvaniṅ śatruśakti.</l><note>Stanza numbered 464 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_70.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>sampun prāpteṅ təgal nandaka bhavana vatək vīra yodhan padandan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>sakvehniṅ yodha paḍa ṅibéki paya pa-tan kavruhan yojananya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>saṅkəp vidyadhara gandharva piśāca gana bhuta yaksāṅga daitya,</l>
    2715 <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>ndatan svaṅ apraṅa pan səḍəṅ amahudéṅan lvir təḍuhniṅ samudra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 465 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_70.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>ndan saṅ śrī rama medran rathanira miyatiṅ śatru sampun sénaddha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>yekan śīghran kacundhuk nr̥pati huvun adan mvaṅ vatək rhaya dhép,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>āścarya-mbak niraṅ rama parasu lumiyat saṅśaya tvas tumaṅgah,</l>
    2720 <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>yatna nantvé-vuvus santika mumépér atakvan siréṅ bhumi natha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 466 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_70.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>é saṅ yuddha dhara mvaṅ paran iku kita mataṅnya limpad haləp-ta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>rajanya-néka raja dbhuta kita ta kunəṅ toh varah ṅvaṅ təkapta,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="52v"/><lb n="19"/>lavan yan déva riṅ svarga tumurun harəp madva géṅniṅ kaśaktin,</l>
    2725 <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>marma tan visvasé ṅvaṅ gana-gana maṅalap drévyaniṅ bhiksu jati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 467 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_70.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>ndatan maṅko-lahanta bhuvana pati sada ṅrakṣaké-ayvaniṅ rat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>ndan havya sampé-yiṅ sādhu kétika kita tékya-mbékiṅ tuca jati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>yapvan saṅke harəpta praṅa maṅusira kirtya harəp dharma yuddha,</l>
    2730 <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>ndi rama-ntén mavédhyaṅ raṇa bhavana yadin devata tan kavédhya. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 468 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_71" n="70">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>néjar siraṅ paraśurāma maṅaṅkas-aṅkas,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>ndan srya-rjuneki sumahur saha dagdhaniṅ tvas,</l>
    2735 <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>é rama tiṅhali mukāṅku təkap-mu mojar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>avay haṅan raga-ragan-mu tatan vruhiṅ tvaṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 469 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>sojar-ku sarjava yateki réṅan təkapta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>hyaṅ hyaṅnikaṅ rya-nusa nagara tāku tan lan,</l>
    2740 <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>rajādi raja kula khayavan-ku śakti,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>aṅhiṅ panambhahanikaṅ bhuvana-ndha raja.</l><note>Stanza numbered 470 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.03" n="3"> <l n=""><pb edRef="#JK" n="52v"/><lb n="33"/> mvaṅ donku yan ḍataṅ iko kahanan-mu maṅké,</l>
    . <l n="j"><lb n="34"/>aptya praṅ aku maka balya riko céṅél-mu,</l>
    . <l n="k"><lb n="35"/>apan huvus kakavaseki hurip-mu deṅku,</l>
    2745 <l n="l"><lb n="40"/>yan tan mupa-ksama sumambah i pādukāṅku.</l><note>Stanza numbered 471 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="41"/>ndan yan lumaṅghyananika mvi-vuvus-ku yakti,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="42"/>téṅgék-mu yan prasakənaṅ isu tarjanāṅku,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="43"/>ndah yeka suṅgu ri taṅan-ku paran liyat-ko,</l>
    2750 <l n="d"><lb n="44"/>tan yeki mārgani hurip-mu mareṅ yama-ndha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 472 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="53r"/><lb n="1"/>é tuca éhaya kula prabhu hina śakti,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>lva-mbék vəkas-mu liyati ravi candra visnu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>sambat kadaṅ-mu hara dur-jana tuca jati,</l>
    2755 <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>laṅkap-ku yeki umaristha-kéné hurip-mu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 473 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>sakveh niké tuha-tuhanyu maha viśeṣa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>saṅ śrī narārya kr̥ta vīrya maha prabhava,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>ṅhiṅ sya-rjuneki ya manyampuri papa karma,</l>
    2760 <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>hetu-ṅku matyana ri ko yu mapa-mbéka-mva.</l><note>Stanza numbered 474 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>bhoh praṅ satāku hara bharghava havya mundur,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>śakti-ṅku yeki rumimah-rimah éṅ hurip-mu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>nahan sahur nr̥pati méjar (adava-davan) avada-vadan,</l>
    2765 <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>méṅgép tikaṅ dvaja makon bala yodha maṅgava.</l><note>Stanza numbered 475 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>śīghraṅ bala ruha-ruhan masikəp tumandaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>krépniṅ musuh ya tinujunya vinuk tinaṅgul,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>tog-tog kétug patakisiṅ palagan asuṅgat,</l>
    2770 <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>len taṅ silih suduk aṅənta ana-nduk amraṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 476 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>taṅkép tikaṅ praṅ asélur paḍa sura dhira,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>vidyadhara lvaṅ ika sévu matiṇḍih opép,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>len taṅ vatək ry anupa ginrék atambah alvaṅ,</l>
    2775 <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>bhutāṅga rakṣasa kubandha ya kéndhit alvaṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 477 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>ghor ghér umuṅ pasurakiṅ bala déva saṅghya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>muṅgviṅ gaja sva ratha parəṅ tumandaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>yatna ṅayat laras anéka huvus minantran,</l>
    2780 <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>bananya varṣa sama tan hana tan tumaṅgél.</l><note>Stanza numbered 478 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>maṅsa haneṅ dvirada éhaya séna śakti,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>maṅgul paḍa gada-gadan tinujunya kaṅgék,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>gandharva kinara bala sura-sura śakti,</l>
    2785 <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>kédék tinaṅkis hinirup sinuruṅ rinampak.</l><note>Stanza numbered 479 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.12" n="12">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>maṅkin katambah ikanaṅ lvaṅ anéka varṇa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>lvir parvata kunapa kétu valahakanya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>milyaṅ rah adbhuta ya sāgara tulya madrəs,</l>
    2790 <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>asvāṅga kunjara rathāṅga rémék karaṅnya.o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 480 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_71.13" n="13"> <l n=""><pb edRef="#JK" n="53v"/><lb n="33"/> uṅ-niṅ vīra masiṅha nada kumətər lvir béntaraṅ patala,</l>
    . <l n="j"><lb n="34"/>kumlab taṅ dvaja rakta sampun aṅadəg muṅgviṅ sabha maṇḍala,</l>
    . <l n="k"><lb n="35"/>tiṅkahniṅ raṇa yajña sastra ginəlar saṅ vīra siṅhéṅ raṇa,</l>
    . <l n="l"><lb n="36"/>hetunyan paḍa tan hana hat-i hurip yan matyana-matyana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 481 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.14" n="14">
    2795 <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>gandharva dhika daitya rakṣasa masa parəṅ rəgəp sañjata,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>kantar mvaṅ badamanya capa vinaték mévi-vu silih mukha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>taṇḍaṅnya mraṅ ikaṅ makandha tinakis riṅ bhindhi vala pagut,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="40"/>paṅga təṇḍas ikaṅ vaneh kəna sinapvan pan tasép taṅ vulat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 482 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.15" n="15">
    2800 <l n="a"><lb n="41"/>krodhaṅ rakṣasa timbul alvat aṅusi gadanya gaṅsal dhépa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="42"/>sép téṅgéknya pəgat cinakra vinalés taṇḍasnya sampun tiba,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="43"/>mimpér dhatu saka gulunya rudhirāṅlandhéṅ savaṅ pañcuran,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="44"/>kaṅgék riṅ vatu hira bajra katiba lvir uṅka pata-dbhuta.</l><note>Stanza numbered 483 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.16" n="16">
    2805 <l n="a"><lb n="45"/>len tekaṅ ana riṅ ratho ratha-rathan mvaṅ vīra vidyadhara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="46"/>midər kadga niké-taṅanya pinutér lagya salah sayaka,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="47"/>mantri éhaya vīra dhira maméniṅ kénta-ti tikana luṅid,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="48"/>ṅduk tekaṅ sura rotta pantəs agaliṅ maṅduk ya riṅ tomara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 484 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.17" n="17">
    2810 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="54r"/><lb n="1"/>yatna vīra sumiṅgah amrih aṅunus patrém végéd tan kara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>suraṅ sarathi dhira yāṅrurokakən dadya parək taṅ kuda,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>lumpatnya kalihan rathan silih usi lagya hurup sarathi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>krurāṅdagdha silih tujah paḍa vidagdha lvat ndatan pokihan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 485 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.18" n="18">
    2815 <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>sor tekaṅ sura rotta asta kasikəp jə̄ṅ karva sampun avis,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>jambakén taya riṅ ratha bhra sumirat ratnanya muṅgviṅ ulu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>rəñcəm tanpa bisa tiba kahabalaṅ saṅke ruhur syandana,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>mumbul rahnyasaké jajanya linud iṅ kénta pəjah kesisan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 486 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.19" n="19">
    2820 <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>avrég taṅ bala kothi laksa piyuta lvaṅ tan hana naṅgéli,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>bhrastaṅ rakṣasa kinara vri malayu kveh mati tapvan kanin,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>sandhaṅ-sandhaṅan arja siṅhəl akaluṅ len taṅ karah tiṅgalan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>gandhi mvaṅ palaga vataṅ kajulinah patrém curik saṅkəpan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 487 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.20" n="20">
    2825 <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>maṅkin śīrṇa vinuk tinut sinusunan de saṅ vatək éhaya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>hru śaktyé-nupas aṅ-huvus ləpas hinadyutéṅ sva mantra dhika,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>len tekaṅ tinuhuk dhinandha sinuduk dudvaṅ kénéṅ mārgana,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>akveh taṅ mati kédékan kapipitan révaṅ savétniṅ sésék.</l><note>Stanza numbered 488 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.21" n="21">
    2830 <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>bhraṣṭa siṅ mapulih ndatan ana polih gandharva viro-ttama,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>hetunya mrih avak paḍa hat-i huripnya vīra vidyadhara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>méṅgah-méṅgah aṅəntak-éntak alayu lagyan pəjah gə̄ṅ takut,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>deniṅ trésna magə̄ṅ mataṅyan alupéṅ dharmanya vīra brata.</l><note>Stanza numbered 489 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.22" n="22">
    2835 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="54v"/><lb n="21"/>saṅ ratnāṅgadha vīra dhira sira harṣan ton sahabniṅ musuh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>mavlan iṅ bala hénti mati pinusus deniṅ musuh śaktiman,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>molah taṅ dvaja éma gatra maṅutus vadva muk aṅrampaka,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>taṇḍaṅnya rurék asmu guntur apagut lavan vatək éhaya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 490 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.23" n="23">
    2840 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="54v"/><lb n="25"/>tandva praṅ kadi riṅ tulis kahiḍəpanyan vuntu nora ṅucap,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>goṅ kéndhaṅ dvani ghurni mari karəṅa de saṅ maha yuddha-ga,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>caṅ ciné céṅ kricikiṅ sara-san asilih taṅkis ana niṅgati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>ghak ghék ghér kétugiṅ paḍa gada-gadan gém taṅ pəjah kératan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 491 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.24" n="24">
    2845 <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>duk-duk cakra padho kabét suligi tan kéva jémur kéméṅan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>bala mvaṅ ala punja santali tuhun pandék sikəpnya rukét,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>kénta tomara bindhi vala téka paṅduknya silih duk marək,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>krurāṅdagdha silih gutuk céṅil olhnya-mék sirahniṅ musuh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 492 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.25" n="25">
    2850 <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>maṅsa saṅ sura rotta vīra tarana nuṅgviṅ gaja ṅadvakən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>naṅkin krédha tikaṅ bala praṅ apéluk malvaṅ anan māṅlvaṅi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>kondur taṅ bala éhaya lvaṅ hinidék sinlék minchan sinuk,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>mantri taṇḍa haneṅ gaja sva ratha kveh taṅ pəjah kambulan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 493 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.26" n="26">
    2855 <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>ndah ratnāṅgadha śīghra yar vlég ikanaṅ astya galak yé-nakus,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>yeka tandaṅ ira mutér gada-gada mépér juyukniṅ musuh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>syuh bhrasta kaparək rémuk pinalu təṇḍasny-eki tambis pəjah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="40"/>duduṅ mati sinandhuṅ iṅ dvirada matta ṅhruk səḍəṅ garvvita.</l><note>Stanza numbered 494 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_71.27" n="27">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="55r"/><lb n="1"/> abyuran bala éhaya vrég alayu laksaṅ pəjah katrésan,</l>
    2860 <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>mota taṅya polih rébah katalayah ayuh taṅ padhéman rusak,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>maṅkin dur-bala ginréh iṅ sara vara-stra ṅlud tibanya ṅéné,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>lvaṅnya tiṇḍih atap matambək i hiliniṅ rah baṅun jihmaga.</l><note>Stanza numbered 495 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_71.28" n="28">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>tandaṅniṅ sura séna maṅkin aparək tiṇḍihnya norāṅgalaṅ,</l>
    2865 <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>saṅ ratnāṅgadha dhira mémbéh i harəp yar ton sahabniṅ musuh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>lyus ṅgvan śrī kagadhé-ndra pinrih hinusirniṅ séna sénya layu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>hetunya lulunan baṅun gana dhinéniṅ banjan adrəs munus. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 496 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_72" n="71">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.01" n="1">
    2870 <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>ndan saṅ śrī magadha miyat siréṅ bala vrég,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>yatna-dan maṅadəg i réṅganiṅ dvipāṅga,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>saṅ ratnāṅgadha paraniṅ vulat pinandhéṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>tandva tandaṅ ika kaduk sinép tinaṅkis.</l><note>Stanza numbered 497 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.02" n="2">
    2875 <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>ryāṅsa śrī magadha lavan bala mrih apraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>kagyat taṅ sura bala tan vruhan tinampék,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>aglis siṅ gulu-gulu binvatan hinaṅgul,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>kédran saṅkanika huvus kabeh kavéṅka.</l><note>Stanza numbered 498 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.03" n="3">
    2880 <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>hetunyaṅ sura bala hénti tan hana vyat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>malvaṅ rakṣasa bala gana daitya saṅghya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>pinraṅ sinrég hinivuṅ iṅ makadga kandha,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>dudvé-kaṅ pəjah hiniras anan pinatrém.</l><note>Stanza numbered 499 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.04" n="4">
    2885 <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>saṅ ratnāṅgadha sinésér təkap narendra,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>tan vruh yan sira ri vurinya méh kaduṅkap,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>sə̄ṅérnyan miyati narendra yatna mundur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>sondurnyan pinalu niréṅ gadha-dbhutāgə̄ṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 500 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.05" n="5">
    2890 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="55v"/><lb n="25"/>rémpu réṅganika lavan dvirada kaṅgék,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>paksa niṅ-rvana nara ratha sép lumumpat,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>vruh ratnāṅgadha mésat iṅ nabasthala hya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>ləs luṅha nayat ira riṅ gaganar tuméṅha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 501 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.06" n="6">
    2895 <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>śīghra nambut i gaja vahananya masa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>paksanya puliha balanya sévu śīrṇa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>bhraṣṭaṅ bhuta gana-ganan pəjah rinchan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>hetunya bala rinuruk tinut rinampak.</l><note>Stanza numbered 502 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.07" n="7">
    2900 <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>tatkālanyan kahala sura-psara dhika lvaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>rəp moghaṅ vəṅi sumaput surup hyaṅ arka,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>śīghra praṅ masapih apan kuləm kamantyan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>sakveh saṅ malaga paḍa ṅusir pakuvan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 503 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.08" n="8">
    2905 <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>gandharva dhipati murud lava-lavan hya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>mvaṅ vidyadhara saha kinara sura kveh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>muṅsir raṅrərəban ika haləp subaddha,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="40"/>tambiṅniṅ lvah alas agə̄ṅ gunuṅ sumaṇḍiṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 504 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.09" n="9">
    2910 <l n="a"><lb n="41"/>saṅ śrī rama parasu riṅ təṅah rinaksa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="42"/>deniṅ rakṣasa vara bhuta daitya raja,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="43"/>sabniṅ vandira vata vr̥kṣa shé atimbun,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="44"/>kṣetra gə̄ṅ ya pinarékan vatəs kulumpaṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 505 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.10" n="10">
    2915 <l n="a"><lb n="45"/>lavan saṅ prabhu sahaneki kapva mundur,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="46"/>sakvehnya bala makukud kabeh hinajnyan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="47"/>sampun prāpta sira haneṅ daləm pakuvan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="48"/>saṅkəp vahana gaja réṅga vus pralabda.</l><note>Stanza numbered 506 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.11" n="11">
    2920 <l n="a"><lb n="49"/>tiṅkah saṅ makuvu vidagdha riṅ kalaṅvan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="50"/>tanjuṅ lan asana vuṅu rinék rinaṅki,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="51"/>abhra lvirnya kusuma parvatan saké doh,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="52"/>asraṅ mvaṅ karah akaluṅ susun pinanjér.</l><note>Stanza numbered 507 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_72.12" n="12">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="56r"/><lb n="1"/> graṅ-graṅ mrat dukut i natarnya kédék aṅlih,</l>
    2925 <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>miṅgək lvirnya kadi avan anyar<!-- hañar?--> kahambél,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>prāpta pvaṅ riris adulur gərəh tan aglis,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>lvir luhnya naṅis avédiṅ ulah tinaṅgél.</l><note>Stanza numbered 508 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.13" n="13">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>samapta prabhu ya rinaksa éṅ pakuvan,</l>
    2930 <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>ndan sakvehni balanira pupul ndatan sah,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>len tekaṅ gaja ratha tuṅgaṅan sinandhiṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>yatna-dan manaha-nahé-kulén cinindra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 509 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_72.14" n="14">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>ndan saṅ srya-rjuna ri təṅah təlas haneṅ jro,</l>
    2935 <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>lvir kéndran mara haləpiṅ pakuva-kuvan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>muntab séṅni layu-layunya kādbhuta bhra,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>géndhiṅ doṅ gubar abaruṅ dhinandha masraṅ. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 510 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_73" n="72">
    .<lg xml:id="rt_73.01" n="1">
    2940 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="56r"/><lb n="13"/>sahana para prabhūttama paḍa mrih anaṅkil adhém,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>mucap i kaśaktiniṅ musuh ri deyani maṅlagana,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>mavətu vivéké siṅ rahata tiṅkahaniṅ malaga,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>siṅ ahayu kapva yogya gəlarən pinilih rinasan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 511 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.02" n="2">
    2945 <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>kunaṅ iki deniṅ aṅlagana teki musuhta hələm,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>miyat i répatnya tindak ika havya vavaṅ lumurug,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>yadin aharəp marāṅragasa yatna kita sikəpa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>laru-larun iṅ danar yata paḍanya yan aṅrabhasa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 512 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.03" n="3">
    2950 <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>kunaṅ iki de paṭik aji madan-dana vīra bala,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>pakékés haneṅ gəgər juga padhé-syana séna pati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>niyata lurugnya yeki ciri védya kitat alaga,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>alap i vurinya yar pəgati havya vinéh adana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 513 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.04" n="4">
    2955 <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>géséṅi pakuva-kuvanika ayva hinopa-déhén,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>niyata ya kagyat apraṅ i harəp yadiyar liyata,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>saləsəka teki tambéh i harəp juga vuk sélévég,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>usak-asik iṅ panah vatək ataksya téka ṅavita.</l><note>Stanza numbered 514 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.05" n="5">
    2960 <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>nara pari yāṅga rajya sumilih sira majar-ajar.</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>tan ulahaniṅ ksinatriya kétaṅ para cidra adé,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>yadiyana riṅ musuh tan ika sadhaniṅ maménaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>si madadaho kasatyan iṅ ayuddha matoha hurip.</l><note>Stanza numbered 515 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.06" n="6">
    2965 <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>midhépi paṭik narendra kéta deniṅ ayuddha hələm,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/> sa-kaharəpiṅ musuh ya juga taṅképa tulya bala,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>yadi pəjaha pva tāṅvaṅ aṅusir siva pada hələm,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>ṅuni-ṅuni yan musuhta pəjah arddha yasanta magə̄ṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 516 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.07" n="7">
    2970 <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>nr̥pati adé vuvus aji kuraṅ naya tar pa-bisa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>yadin iki śatru hina bala ayva kété-man-iman,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>musuh apa teki saṅ paraśurāma vidagdha tuvi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="40"/>mataṅ ika yogya tar vinaya yeki délén sakaréṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 517 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.08" n="8">
    2975 <l n="a"><lb n="41"/>huvus i katəmvaniṅ naya viśeṣa lalakva-kéna,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="42"/>apagəha riṅ kasatyan ati dhira ya tar suruda,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="43"/>pəjaha ri madhayiṅ rané sabhāgya kétéka huvus,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="44"/>niyata tayaṅ vivada juga tar sinésél cinalan.o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 518 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.09" n="9">
    2980 <l n="a"><lb n="45"/>néjar nira-hém prabhu vīra yodha,</l>
    . <l n="b">sampun mateki luvaran kamantyan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="46"/>apan laluṅ masa pilih ḍavuh rva,</l>
    . <l n="d">śīghra mulih kapva madudvan uṅgvan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 519 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.10" n="10">
    2985 <l n="a"><lb n="47"/>saṅ hyaṅ vulan sampun ava sateja,</l>
    . <l n="b">śobhan sumunviṅ raṇa bhumi madhya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="48"/>kadya vəlas tiṅkah iréṅ paratra,</l>
    . <l n="d">prāptaṅ hébun lagya naṅis tan ampét.</l><note>Stanza numbered 520 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.11" n="11">
    2990 <l n="a"><lb n="49"/>mandra kilat lvir kəḍapiṅ katiksnan,</l>
    . <l n="b">len taṅ gərəh ləṅləṅ asamba-sambat,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="50"/>marma nirén hisni ririsnikaṅ luh,</l>
    . <l n="d">lagya nibé saṅ pəjah iṅ palugvan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 521 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.12" n="12">
    2995 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="57r"/><lb n="1"/> hisnya péṅdé huripiṅ kaoṅan,</l>
    . <l n="b">vantən sisip ṅgaya kaninya makveh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="2"/> dudvāṅga mor iṅ mati tan vri ratnya,</l>
    . <l n="d">maṅke kuləm hetunika mrih adan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 522 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.13" n="13">
    3000 <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>lampahnika ṅin-kin aṅuṅgut-uṅgut,</l>
    . <l n="b">ṅkāne pupu trus tani rahnya lumra,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/> lén taṅ rumaṅkaṅ matékén curiknya,</l>
    . <l n="d">dudva maṅaṅsar maṅusir pakuvan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 523 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.14" n="14">
    3005 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="57r"/><lb n="5"/>ndah vantən aṅrəṅan alap kəna mrat,</l>
    . <l n="b">saṅsāra tapvan mati tan vruh olah,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="6"/>asrét karuṅviṅ jaja denya mojar,</l>
    . <l n="d">amlas sih aminta linudan anəmbah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 524 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.15" n="15">
    3010 <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>kavəlas harəp(taṅ)taṅ kəna méh paratra,</l>
    . <l n="b">mavrih asémbat ri anak rabinya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/> téṅgéknika-sat paṅucapnika jro,</l>
    . <l n="d">dudva kaséran anan anjaluk vé.</l><note>Stanza numbered 525 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.16" n="16">
    3015 <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>len taṅ pilih taṇḍa anéki gusti,</l>
    . <l n="b">cihneki jajanya karah kaluṅnya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="10"/>marma umémban ri taṅanya kéri,</l>
    . <l n="d">manék rumuṅku matékén galahnya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 526 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_73.17" n="17">
    3020 <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>saṅsāra tekaṅ manusup kəna trus,</l>
    . <l n="b">saṅké harəpnya hurip éki tan len,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>tan vruhnya ri sastra raṇāṅga yajña,</l>
    . <l n="d">hetunya trésna-huripiṅ dadi vaṅ. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 527 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_74" n="73">
    3025 <lg xml:id="rt_74.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>tis-tis masa pilih ḍavuh pitu tikaṅ tan anāṅucap-ucap rinəṅvakən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>rəp mampəh pasuraknikaṅ bala samuha gumuruh aparəṅvan iṅ laṅit,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>géndhiṅ reñjiṅ ateki mari karəṅa svaṅ atalu-talu pimna lor kidul,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>paṅhrikniṅ gaja matta ghurna mayatiṅ layu-layu hiniḍəp musuh ḍataṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 528 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3030 <lg xml:id="rt_74.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>ambəkniṅ bala vīra dhira səḍəṅ amrih aharəp i jayanya riṅ musuh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>ndatan mrém sakéjap lana ṅaṅən-aṅən ryulahanika hələm yan apsaṅa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>len taṅ luṅha mahas ma-déva saranāṅrasuk i karah ika sikəp vataṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>dhira hyaṅ-hyaṅ i maddhyaniṅ raṇa suméva ri taruṇa bhaṭāra rudraka.</l><note>Stanza numbered 529 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3035 <lg xml:id="rt_74.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>akveh bhavanikan ana mupulakən kunapa təlas atap tinindhihan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>jnyané-ka tva hiḍəpnya rudra sakala-tmaka riya masarira sadhaka,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>névédyanya sirah sabhūṣaṇanika hrédaya kamala nétra dhipana,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>matta-narpana sonita drava mapatra kara tala masuddhi lélupa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 530 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3040 <lg xml:id="rt_74.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>ri vitniiṅ kula vr̥kṣa yé-napusakənya maṅadəg akaluṅ karah tutur,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>maṅka kara mateki yan rinasukanya raṅin ika lavan curik siṅi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>minyaṅnya hiniḍəp lavanyan arəpat sinahasanika tan hana ṅavér,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>pinaṅranyeki ḍinəṇḍa dhira sinasébnya ana kadi manarjanéṅ musuh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 531 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3045 <lg xml:id="rt_74.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>dhira vīra marambaṅan ri tələṅiṅ jaladhi rudhira bhīṣaṇa daləm,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>namvanyeki raṅin vélahnya tévəkiṅ béjah aṅamuk i maddhyaniṅ raṇa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>kombak ri drəs iké harusnya manikəl-nikəl aṅipak-ipak səḍəṅ pasaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>kasrék riṅ gaja réṅga durgama karaṅnya mariṅi-riṅi kadga tomara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 532 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3050 <lg xml:id="rt_74.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>len taṅ vīra suméṅka riṅ kunapa parvata aruhur atīta bhīṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>ṅhiṅ yan teki tinut ginégvanika muṅsir inikaranikaṅ maha giri,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>rəp yékan sumaput limutnya kutugiṅ dvaja manavəṅi tejaniṅ sasi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="1"/><pb edRef="#JK" n="58r"/>guntur rya-granikaṅ sava-dri gugah ogah i sikaranika prakampita.</l><note>Stanza numbered 533 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3055 <lg xml:id="rt_74.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>antyanteki haləpnikaṅ raṇa sabha-dbhuta tuhu-tuhu durga maṇḍala,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>sék taṅ bhuta piśāca maglar aṅinum rah aṅigél avéra-véra dava,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>matta ṅundha céṅél manémpal amukaṅ-mukaṅ anucup usus mabhīṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>dudvaṅ marja kinampi-kampilaka len maṅagas-agas amansana pupu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 534 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3060 <lg xml:id="rt_74.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>tatkāla para vīra maṅhyaṅ irikaṅ raṇa bhavana sudhīra nis-cala,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>lumra kambaṅ ura sakeṅ gagana dhupa mavaṅi saha gandha lepana,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>uṅ uṅ-kara umuṅ maṅastava anan ulu-ulu juga suṅsaṅ iṅ laṅit,</l>

    3065 <lg xml:id="rt_74.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="58r"/><lb n="10"/>byatīta gati saṅ vatak ry anupa teki hanéṅakəna tan ya varṇanən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>eñjiṅ masa pahso iraṅ paraśurāma saha bala samuha tan kuraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>mvaṅ citrāṅgadha citra séna saha kinnara gana-gana bhata rakṣasa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>gadharvsa dhipa vīra citra ratna taksaka ana vara daitya danava.</l><note>Stanza numbered 536 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3070 <lg xml:id="rt_74.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>saṅ ratnāṅgadha ratna séna mavuvus sucapakən i kaśaktiniṅ musuh,</l>

    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>antyanteki maha prabhavani musuhta sakala kadi mr̥tyu yar hiḍəp,</l>

    3075 <lg xml:id="rt_74.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>saṅksepanya mateki yatna juga saṅhulun apagəha riṅ maya dhika,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="58v"/><lb n="19"/>lavan byubasi maṅlavan-lavan adé riya mapa karika nuṅ énaka,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>nda yaka gavéyénta havya makabét rasa-rasana marapvan andana,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>sugyan teki ya mapraṅ aṅrép-harəpan amarépakana yaki gə̄ṅ tahan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 538 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3080 <lg xml:id="rt_74.12" n="12">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>nojar saṅ sura rotta teki sumahur ta sira paraśurāma garjjita,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>antyanteki vuvusta yogya bapa denta tumaha-taha śaktiniṅ musuh,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>padma byuha ṅaranya yogya gəlarənta saha bala yateka ayuvana,</l>

    3085 <lg xml:id="rt_74.13" n="13">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>saṅ citrāṅadha citra séna kita teku bapa sinara bharaniṅ hulan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>tiṅkah saṅ sura séna rakṣasa piśāca bhujaṅa ana daitya danava,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>len taṅ vahana gaja réṅga kuda gaddhabha rasukana yadha saṅkapan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>rapvan tanpa patuṅyaniṅ raṇa sabha maka pagada-gada parākrama.</l><note>Stanza numbered 540 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3090 <lg xml:id="rt_74.14" n="14">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>ginval taṅ kala bhéri ghūrṇita ratag sahana-ananikaṅ bala sura,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>śīghra ndandan atiṅkah arpat ikanaṅ sara gana saha bhūṣaṇa haləp,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>sampun byuhanireki durga tara padma vikasita ṅaranya dig-jatya,</l>

    3095<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_75" n="74">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_75.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="34"/>luṅhaṅ kala bhavisya vahu suména hyaṅ surya tan kavaran,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="35"/>sakveh saṅ prabhu éhaya-rpat atihaṅ vahva sikəp tuṅgaṅan.</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="36"/>maṅkin mava katon haləpni pajégiṅ(satru)ti durga kréti, / satrva</l>
    3100 <l n="d"><lb n="37"/>éta śrī naranātha mojar i siraṅ mantrya dhikoṅ hiṅgita.</l><note>Stanza numbered 542 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_75.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="59r"/><lb n="1"/> é. rakryan mapatih lihat mara kété géniṅ musuh kādbhuta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>salvaniṅ raṇa bhumi tapva hibékan sarsék ndatan pakihan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>lavan ndi ṅgvan ikaṅ pravīra sura gandharva-psara nindita,</l>

    3105 <lg xml:id="rt_75.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>sojar śrī naranātha siṅgih ikin ojarta maha durgana,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>padma byuha ṅaranya yeki vəkasiṅ durga-hya mevəh téman,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>hoayé-kaṅ kadi méru parvata rəməṅ klabniṅ dvajāṅkén hima,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>koṅgva saṅ sura citra séna dala pūrva kveh balanya pupul.</l><note>Stanza numbered 544 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3110 <lg xml:id="rt_75.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>muṅgviṅ dakṣiṇa ratna séna savatəknya-dhém təlas saṅgraha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>himpər sāgara mombakan gaja rathanya lumba-lumba dulur,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>umréṅ uṅnya masiṅha nada gumuruh ryak tulya sampun pasaṅ,</l>

    3115 <lg xml:id="rt_75.05" n="5"> <l n="i"><pb edRef="#JK" n="59r"/><lb n="13"/>saṅ citrāṅgadha kilyan arpat asikəp lvir siṅha muṅgviṅ alas,</l>
    . <l n="j"><lb n="14"/>durga-péki rənəb sukət mara təkapniṅ krép nikéṅ sañjata,</l>

    . <lg xml:id="rt_75.06" n="6">
    3120 <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>honyé-aṅ dhadét andhakara təpi lor lvir varṣa saṅkeṅ adoh,</l>

    . <lg xml:id="rt_75.07" n="7">

    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>yaksa avaṅ ana bhuta naga tinitah daṇḍanya dhirgga kréti,</l>

    . <lg xml:id="rt_75.08" n="8">
    3130 <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>ṅkāneṅ kasara rama bharggava sré-ka-granya muṅgviṅ təṅah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>honyé-kaṅ kadi méru parvata sinaṅliṅ dipta mabhra sinaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>deniṅ bhūṣaṇa ratna bhavana lasan séṅniṅ dhadhap ta ulap,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>koṅgvan saṅ sura raja citra ratha rapvan sah mara ṅimbaṅi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 549 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_75.09" n="9">
    3135 <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>saṅksepanya matéka yatna juga saṅ śrī bhumi nātha praṅa,</l>

    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>udah yan catra yan arddha candra pilihanta siṅ samāṅyogyana,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>rapvan śīghra matiṅka-tiṅkah vatak rajanya séna dhika. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 550 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_76" n="75">
    3140 <lg xml:id="rt_76.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>nojar śrī batha lagya nahuri haturi saṅ nītiman vura mantrī,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>bakryan ṅhiṅ sadhya nir-bhana yatika gəlarən byahaniṅ maṅlaana,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>sakvehniṅ séna-sénya-dbguta yat vaṅanén sthula rupāṅgakara,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>ndan yan sampūrṇa shya-taṅan asuku milih siṅ vənaṅ yo-ttamāṅga.</l><note>Stanza numbered 551 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3145 <lg xml:id="rt_76.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>lavan samanta raja-dbhuta tuduhana toṅgvanya siṅ sara pétan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>yāṅkén dvara pagəh kādbhuta tutupana riṅ peka yodha harəpnya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>rapvan tuṅgal pagəhniṅ hati huvus atasak tikénaniṅ dhira maṅgəh,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="60r"/><lb n="1"/>an ṅvaṅ muṅgvé-taṅahniṅ hrédaya kavala yāṅkén maha prabha saddha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 552 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3150 <lg xml:id="rt_76.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>nojar śrī bhumi nātha krama saṅ hinujaran vruh maha prajñā ri-ṅdé,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>śīghra dan-dan tiniṅkah sahana-ananikan graja samantha mantrī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>saṅkəp sampun təkeṅ syandana turaga dinanan paḍa tiṅkah arpat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>goṅ kéndhaṅ bhéri ginval murava saha kalāṅkéni śabdanya usvaṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 553 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3155 <lg xml:id="rt_76.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>sampun taṅ byuha sampūrṇa sahana umadhaṅ kapva dum deśa mahya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>lagya néṅga təgal nandaka shavana dhédhép lvir téduhniṅ samudra,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>vijyut prajvalité-ṅambara tala kumédhép dhuma yoninya kégu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>ghér kumvaṅ śabda ghurnaṅ amah-amah (arasuk asurak lvir patərniṅ bahitra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 554 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3160 <lg xml:id="rt_76.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>sampun kapvāṅrəgəp sañjata sananikaṅ peka yodhāṅkas-aṅkas,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>tandva tindhak <app><lem type="norm">tumandaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">tumandhaṅ</rdg></app> mapəgakən i pamukaniṅ maha sura séna,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>śīghra taṅkép mara praṅ séhéṅ apagut atambéh silih raṅki mapraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>gut-gutén tar ana vyat vijah anuju anāṅduk tayéṅ bhindhi vala.</l><note>Stanza numbered 555 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3165 <lg xml:id="rt_76.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="60r"/><lb n="14"/>vira praṅ vīra maṅduk ana mati sinuduk riṅ tuhuk taṅ kəna trus,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>kéndhit kaṅék sinundhuṅ kahala pinulihan kédékan tau vriṅ ratnya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>kontal kontit kabuṅcaṅ uara mati tinékék rakṣasa lvaṅ paḍa lvaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>puṅgél paṅgél céṅélnya ana kəna sinavat riṅ maha kandha tiksna.</l><note>Stanza numbered 556 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3170 <lg xml:id="rt_76.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>len tekaṅ gara suréṅ ratha maratha masa sarathinya-ti sara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>krura ménthaṅ laras maṅhudani sara varāṅde layakniṅ bala vrég,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>dhiraṅ gandharva vidyadhara bala mapulih kothi laksa-dbhuta-dhém,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="60v"/><lb n="21"/>himpər guntur sakeṅ adri sikara gusuruh vahananya ṅgaluntaṅ. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 557 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3175</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_77" n="76">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_77.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>ramya prank aparək arukék silih grék amulih-mulihi pinuliha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>muṅgviṅ ratha maratha-rathan vatək makuda saṅghya ta makuda-kudan,</l>
    3180 <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>vidyadhara maliman aṅundha tomara paḍa dhika bala mapagut,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>kvehnyaṅ pəjah atisaya kothi laksa gaja réṅga turaga marémék.</l><note>Stanza numbered 558 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_77.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>lvir sapta bhuvana sadhéṅ agni dagdha sakala praṅ atugar asélur,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>kombak jaladhi masalikan prakampa kumətər kṣititala gumivaṅ,</l>
    3185 <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>dhyam taṅ bhuvana kapiliṅén takapni papupuhnikaṅ amara bala,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>sarsék makin asusun matambah aṅlvaṅi ana ṅuluyi gaja pati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 559 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_77.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>samantara bala kala sévu laksa oéjah atri gumuruh alayu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>ginrék sinélék inidukiṅ gaja sva ratha kothi sagala sumahab,</l>
    3190 <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>vuntviṅ gagana takapi sayakanya lumépas kakiricik akilat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>len taṅ musala vésika bajra cakra kadi varṣa makicihan atip.</l><note>Stanza numbered 560 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_77.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="34"/>san śrī magadha pati ané rikaṅ dvirada matta saha bala sasa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="35"/>brahma-stra ya pinasaṅ iré gada-dbhuta saha radhana saha vidhi,</l>
    3195 <l n="c"><lb n="36"/>tambar surub aṅarab-arab ané taṅan ireki pinutér aṅépér,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="37"/>tandvaṅ géséṅi musuh asiṅ masa kahala bap magaja ratha géséṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 561 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_77.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="38"/>vidyadhara gagana kagéman svri malayu mavédi giri-girih,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="39"/>abyaran alulunan anéka rasasa piśāca bhujaga mahunu,</l>
    3200 <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="61r"/><lb n="1"/>maṅkin balanira suméhab ana-nduk anuduk ana vijah anuhuk,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>len taṅ sara vara nisité-nyatnya lumépas parəṅ arunyu-runyu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 562 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_77.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>hetunya ṅamara bala puh luyuk pəjah anéka ana kəna sisip,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>len taṅ kudanika kataran vatək makuda cis curi raṇa malayu,</l>
    3205 <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>nora pulih arés i kéśaktiniṅ musuh asiṅ ya mapulih anasa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>luṅha mrih anusup anikəl galahnya kari len palaga ana curik.</l><note>Stanza numbered 563 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_77.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>ranāṅgadha sala bala kothi laksa saha vahananira mapulih,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>dhira tara mapaṅ i pamuk niraṅ magadha raja kdi pasu pati,</l>
    3210 <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>sambartaka pamadhén iré-rikaṅ sakala pavaka səḍəṅ umurub,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>bar rép səḍəṅ apahidéṅan sireki paḍa dhira musala gnéga.</l><note>Stanza numbered 564 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_77.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>ratnāṅgadha pinalu vicitra nénda tuhu dhira marurék aparək,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>é saṅ magadha pati lihat mateki ri taṅan-ku musala nisita,</l>
    3215 <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>yeka muburakəna hurip-nu yeki tariman hara ya paha-lavén,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>vah ghraṅ mahaduk inakisiṅ gada-dbhuta tikəl ri təṅah apatélu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 565 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_77.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="61r"/><lb n="15"/>saṅ śrī magadha pati tumindhi maṅkin aparək vési gada pinutér,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>ratnāṅgadha kapari-bhavan lumiṅsir aṅunus kr̥tala pinatitis,</l>
    3220 <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>sə̄ṅérnya sinavat i hiriṅ gada-dbhuta luput sinapu sinahasa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>yekan kahala gajah ikan pəgat tulaléyanya kahava kahabét.</l><note>Stanza numbered 566 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_77.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>tadaṅnya maṅamuk aṅusir manémbur anuruṅ rudhira ya sumirat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>ratnāṅgadha maṅadəg i réṅganiṅ dvirada saha kratala ri taṅan,</l>
    3225 <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="61v"/><lb n="21"/>krodha ṅivud irika narendra yar kaputuṅan kasaləsək aparək,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>tandva nujah i jaja narendra śīghra rudhira drəs i jaja mélébék.</l><note>Stanza numbered 567 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_77.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/> yatna nadəg irika narendra mamrih atahən kadi liman avéra,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>vidyadhara pinalu rémak siréhnya mukuṭanya sumirat arémuk,</l>
    3230 <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>saṅ śrī magadha katanéhan sireki sna riṅ dvirada paḍa pəjah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>hvaṅ vahananira ya pəjah silih tujah anéki paḍa mapulihan. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 568 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_78" n="77">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.01" n="1">
    3235 <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>sampun pəjah nérpati kalih anéka tāṅlvaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>maṅkin tikaṅ bala paḍa mrih araṅkit apraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>yar ton pəjah tuha nikéṅ raṇa bhumi madhya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>hetuaya tan hana védiṅ pati tan tinaha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 569 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.02" n="2">
    3240 <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>saṅ ratna séna lumiyat ri kakanya cūrṇa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>krédha ṅatag bala sakothi parəṅ tumandaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>mundhondha témara masa ana riṅ dvipāṅga,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>lvir andhakara sumaput kutugiṅ dvaja krép.</l><note>Stanza numbered 570 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.03" n="3">
    3245 <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>tandva musuh yata vinuknya rébah bubak sél,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>lvir vah gunuṅ lumuruk adbhuta maṅkin adrəs,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>vankénya tuṅgaṅan anéka rathanya śīrṇa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>vaṅkenikaṅ pəjah atémbéh atip ya kasrék.</l><note>Stanza numbered 571 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.04" n="4">
    3250 <l n="a"><lb n="39"/>len taṅ kuda ndémakamandhém avanti-vanti,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="40"/>kandha rva tiksna ginégénya vidagdha mapraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="41"/>vadva vatək ratu bibak gumivaṅ katandhuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="42"/>gémpuṅ sayojana kagimpuṅ iké təpinya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 572 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.05" n="5">
    3255 <l n="a"><lb n="43"/>krépniṅ liman ya tinujunya bubar minéhan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="44"/>saṅ ratna séna kumucup maparək tumindhi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="45"/>lavan balanya ri harəp yata paṅhadhanya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="62r"/><lb n="1"/>srya-nagga nātha kadunuṅ paraniṅ tumampil.</l><note>Stanza numbered 573 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.06" n="6">
    3260 <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>maṅsa haneṅ ratha narendra lavan balanya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>yatna ṅayat laras irar matisaya kasnya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>mévi-vu taṅ hru lumépas ya sahéndikanya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>sampartavarsa ya dulurnya parəṅ tumampuh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 574 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.07" n="7">
    3265 <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>pro-dbhuta taṅ gélap anambar aṅéka deśa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>megha taghora sumaput mətu saṅkariṅ hru,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>nvaṅ cakra punja masusun vinaliṅnya śakti,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>bhraṣṭa musuh pəjah anéka vatak aura lvaṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 575 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.08" n="8">
    3270 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="62r"/><lb n="10"/>daityādi rakṣasa pəjah vulaṅun kagéman,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>tan vruh patuṅgalani rovaṅ ika-dbhuta praṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>bhch mah musuh ta kariko liṅ ika téka mraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>vétniṅ pətəṅ ḍəḍət i madhyanikaṅ raṇāṅga.</l><note>Stanza numbered 576 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.09" n="9">
    3275 <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>kavran sudhīra matakis sura ratna séna,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>sayva-ti ghora hinasésa niréṅ samādhi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>tap ghér nijil taṅ anila-débhuta sa-prahara,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>bar rép nda śīghra malilaṅ raṇa bhumi madhya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 577 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.10" n="10">
    3280 <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>yekan paḍa tisaya śakti maha prabhava,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>sampun prayatna aji vinlég ikaṅ ratha drés,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>vidyadhara ṅédog aṅundha ri témaranya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>paksa nduka nr̥pati yar pinégat niréṅ hru.</l><note>Stanza numbered 578 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.11" n="11">
    3285 <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>krodha ṅalap lipuṅ ika mlégi vahananya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>tandaṅnya māṅduk i narendra luput linésan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>dhira su-sarathi marək umabét kudanya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>ndah śīghra sakṣaṇa sumiṅgah apan sidagdha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 579 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.12" n="12">
    3290 <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>nankin sarosa sura rotta malap gadanya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>asthinya yé-muliṅakənya marək tumandaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>gundhuk narendra punupuhnya luput binajra,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>tamdva ṅayat laras ira matitis gulunya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 580 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_78.13" n="13">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="62v"/><lb n="30"/> é. ratna séna liyat iki panah-ku dibya,</l>
    3295 <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>vidyadhara-ataka ṅaranya maha prabhava,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>yatna kamuṅ sura liyat ya ri mārganāṅku</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>ndak ton pajah-mu hara koṅ sura denikaṅ hru.</l><note>Stanza numbered 581 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.14" n="14">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="34"/>śīghran ləpasnya kumucup kadi mr̥tyu jihva,</l>
    3300 <l n="b"><lb n="35"/>téṅgéknikaṅ sura pəgat katuluy gadanya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="36"/>ndatan pas-sara pajah avri tikaṅ bala vrég,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="37"/>mvaṅ vahananya ya linudnira riṅ vara-stra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 582 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_78.15" n="15">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="38"/>tandaṅ nirāṅləpasi capala sura malvaṅ,</l>
    3305 <l n="b"><lb n="39"/>mévi-su kinmara pəjah bala daitya saṅghya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="40"/>sampun larut layu-layunya rébah katiṅgal,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="41"/>nora pulih saṅ inusir malayu padhaaṅlih. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 583 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_79" n="78">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_79.01" n="1">
    3310 <l n="a"><lb n="42"/>saṅ citrāṅgadha dhira air-bhaya masa yatna ṅgéga sañjata,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="43"/>muṅgviṅ réṅganikaṅ dvipāṅga maruhur mabhra ṅrasuk bhūṣaṇa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="44"/>kothyaṅ-kothi balanyan atri gumuruh maitra ṅuvuh katara,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="45"/>guntur taṅ himavan prakampa kumətər lyab vé aikaṅ sāgara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 584 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_79.02" n="2">
    3315 <l n="a"><lb n="46"/>śīghra praṅ marurék masuṅgut i harəp maṇḍəg tikaṅ praṅ layu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="47"/>saṅ citrāṅgadha yo mayat laras ira sampunya pūrṇa vélu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="48"/>sék balanya riṅ antarala kumisik cap céb tibanya néṅé,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="49"/>hetunya vrég ikaṅ musuh katalayah kaṅgék vatək éhaya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 585 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_79.03" n="3"> <l n=""><pb edRef="#JK" n="62v"/><lb n="50"/> srya-vaṅga dhipa tar vru yan sinusunan karya-njəlag kesisan,</l>
    . <l n="j"><lb n="51"/>maṅkin sinrég hinambulan kinucupan dhira ṅadəg riṅ ratha,</l>
    3320 <l n="k"><pb edRef="#JK" n="63r"/><lb n="1"/>vruh (saṅ) citrāṅgadha bana śakti ginégénya mrih maménthaṅ laras,</l>
    . <l n="l"><lb n="2"/>matya-céb pyah iraṅ narādhipati tan liṅgar tujunya ṅéné.</l><note>Stanza numbered 586 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_79.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>ṅkāneṅ syandana ratna saṅghya katibāṅléndha naraéndra pəjah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>vastra mlés təkapiṅ rah adbhuta hilinya mvas təkeṅ bhūṣaṇa,</l>
    3325 <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>śīrṇaṅ ratna kaluṅ-kaluṅnira təkapniṅ hru umuṅgviṅ jaja,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>satya sarathi hantu len kuda lavan vadva dhika kveh pəjah. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 587 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_80" n="79">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_80.01" n="1">
    3330 <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>tandaṅ srya-vani nātha mapagakən i pamuk citrāṅgadha sira,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>lavan vadva dulur sahya makarah akaluṅ dudvaṅ sipi-sipiṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>makus taṅ vīra muṅgviṅ kuda yaṅ kinuduran kapvaṅ ana védi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>len taṅ muṅgviṅ gaja syandana musala gada kodaṇḍa pinéniṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 588 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_80.02" n="2">
    3335 <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>yaksa mvaṅ kinnara lvaṅ kahala tinəḍunan kagyat silih hidék,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>len taṅ gandharva muṅgviṅ sakatha sama-sama ménthaṅ dhanuh adan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>hrunya taptar giṇeṅ tvas vinuk hinubat-habit riṅ daṇḍa sinuruṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>abyuran kéndhit alvaṅ ana mati tinujabniṅ kunjara masa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 589 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_80.03" n="3">
    3340 <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>vinlég taṅ kunjara glis narapati lumurug lvir guntur aṅalah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>ṅgvan saṅ citrāṅgadha-pan kadi gəgər hinusirniṅ peka malayu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>yatna ménhaṅ larasnya ṅucupi sara vara-stra néka lumépas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>tampuhnya drəs umuṅ riṅ gagana malad-alad naga kréti sara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 590 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_80.04" n="4">
    3345 <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>pro-dbhutaṅ taksya dibya-stra ya mətu ri taṅan srya-vanti luvépas,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>rəp bhraṣṭaṅ bala dhaṅstra ana pəgat anana rampuṅ mapatiga,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>krodha citrāṅgadha ṅimbhi sara nisita krép lvir laru-larun,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="63v"/><lb n="22"/>kabvaṅ nda gagané-ka myati tinakis iréṅ sinrugra sinavat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 591 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_80.05" n="5">
    3350 <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>midər taṅ cakra himpər śaśadhara ri taṅan srya-vanti pinutér,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>mdatan vyartan ləpasnyan pinati pinatitis citraṅgadha sinép,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>tandva rampuṅ dhanuhnyan luluyi gulu pəgat rah rédra kumucur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>lavan dantinya sampun pəjah hinapa karih riṅ bajra tumaném.</l><note>Stanza numbered 592 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_80.06" n="6">
    3355 <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>tandva-lah taṅ vatək rama parasu kapugut lvir héntya kahili,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>tandaṅ saṅ cétra séna pulih amava laras muṅgviṅ ratha mani,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>mandég len vīra séna-dbhuta makikiricik dhanvanya maluṅgid,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>tan péndah paravvata-van səḍəṅ atunu murub mabhra layu-layu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 593 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_80.07" n="7">
    3360 <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>śīghra ménthaṅ dhanuh srya-psara pati lumépas taṅ mārgana sésék,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>maṅgəh srya-vanti nātha kinurucuk hinirup deniṅ sura bala,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>tan pantyaṅ bajra saṅke taṅan ira madulur cakra nda lumapas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>rampal rampuṅ céṅélnyaṅ sura bala tinétah madhég mamulihi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 594 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_80.08" n="8">
    3365 <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>təkvan saṅ ratna séna ṅabéti kuda niran gumrit ratha nira,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>hetunyaṅ mr̥tyu dhaṅstra-dbhuta pamanah iré-saṅ śrī narapati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>ndatan vyarta ṅéné prana nr̥pati katiba riṅ réṅga gumiliṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>matta ṅhruk taṅ gaja nindita ana pinanah kumbanya tinujah. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 595 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_81" n="80">
    3370 <lg xml:id="rt_81.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="63r"/><lb n="39"/>anantara pəjah narendra tumibaṅ riris kadi diné patərnya makətər,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="40"/>bhaṭāra savita kucém kalamukan baṅun mavəlasé-pəjah kasih harəp,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="41"/>umuṅ r̥ṣi généṅ ruhur maṅabhivada saṅ pəjah i madhyaniṅ pabharatan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="42"/>səkara jənu samamburat mavaṅi dhupa kasturi miṅgiṅ pamusita nira.</l><note>Stanza numbered 596 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3375 <lg xml:id="rt_81.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="43"/>samantara tikaṅ praṅ adbhuta layu vatak ry anupa kéndhit alvaṅ anana,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="64r"/><lb n="1"/>karah kaluṅ ané katiṅgaln ika vataṅ papan atip tatan khuniṅa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="2"/>masa nr̥pati siṅhala-dbhuta maṅuṇḍa kosta kadi siṅha rédra magalak,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="3"/>lavan bala sakothi laksa parəṅ aṅ-démak musuh asiṅ tumandaṅ hinidék.</l><note>Stanza numbered 597 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3380 <lg xml:id="rt_81.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="4"/>ratna tisaya madrəs aṅ-kuda mano-java-dbhuta lakunya bayu sakala,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="5"/>yateka mamusuh bala sura pəjah kacakra taya riṅ drésiṅ ratha masa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="6"/>anan sinéséb iṅ gaja jinahitakən éṅ musala bindhi vala suligi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="7"/>nara-psara luyuk davut pravara citra séa juga tan tumut kapalayu.</l><note>Stanza numbered 598 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3385 <lg xml:id="rt_81.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="8"/>sudhīra maṅadəg siréṅ ratha ri pavrégiṅ bala dhanuh niré-nayatakən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="9"/>pracaṇḍa vara banjana ṅaranya ṅastra lumépas saké taṅan ira,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="10"/>mijil taṅ anila-gni riṅ gagana taṅ géséṅi śatru bhasma matunu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="11"/>su-dhipta badhava gni talya səḍəṅ iṅ maha pralayabhīṣaṇa ṅabar-abar.</l><note>Stanza numbered 599 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3390 <lg xml:id="rt_81.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="12"/>prayatna aji siṅhala mutérakən gada tisaya śakti madrəs i taṅan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="13"/>jala radhana yoga saṅhita varastra yeka pinasaṅ nira-dbhuta dahat,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="14"/>nda śīghra umili taṅ adbhuta di sāgara ṅavaṅ-svaṅ saké taṅan ira,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="15"/>nda sakṣaṇa padhém taṅ agni malilaṅ tikaṅ pabharatan mava praṅ apagut.</l><note>Stanza numbered 600 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_81.06" n="6">
    3395 <l n="a"><lb n="16"/> tumandaṅ aṅunus kr̥tala sura citra séna sahasé-narendra manujah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="64v"/><lb n="17"/>namiṅ-rva ana piṅ tiga linuputan vidagdha aji tan vavaṅ sira malés,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="18"/>kacidra ya dhinéṅdha riṅ gada lumumpat iṅ gagana kagyat amrih alayu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="19"/>rathanya mani cūrṇa dhuli təmahana sarathi pəjah lavan kuda rémuk.</l><note>Stanza numbered 601 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_81.07" n="7">
    3400 <l n="a"><lb n="20"/>masa pravara citra séna ana riṅ nabhastala téka mrih anduk aṅusi ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="21"/>miyat nr̥pati méndha manduk irikaṅ gada-dbhuta ṅéné daṇḍanya katiba,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="22"/>suémṅka rudhiranya madrəs anélés pata-bhra sumirét mareṅ muka sabaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="23"/>savanya magilaṅ-gilaṅ ri təṅahiṅ raṇāṅgana sabhūṣaṇanya dumilah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 602 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_81.08" n="8">
    3405 <l n="a"><lb n="24"/>ndataṅva sura raja citra ratha sahya riṅ sakatha ratna madrəs umasa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="25"/>pravīra satha kothi laksa vara daitya danava bhujaga bhuta maṅiriṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="26"/>sur-rakṣasa su-rakṣa sura-sura rotta saṅghyat akarah-karahnya kumisik,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="27"/>dvajanya umabét baṅun jalandha ghér gərəhnya gubar andhikara sumaput.</l><note>Stanza numbered 603 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_81.09" n="9">
    3410 <l n="a"><lb n="28"/>tumandaṅ apagut bala nr̥pati siṅhala lvaṅ apa tar surud rinabhasa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="29"/>nara dhipa makin tumindhih amupuh siréṅ gada-gada-ti ghora maṅivuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="30"/>bala sura bibék katundhuṅ alayu musi ri kahanan sura-psara pati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="31"/>anan kadi sila-dri maṅgəh inusinikaṅ gana matimbun iṅ drésiṅ aṅin. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 604 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_82" n="81">
    3415 <lg xml:id="rt_82.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="32"/>gandharva pati siraṅ citra ratha maméntaṅ dhanuh ati śakti,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="33"/>sarvva yudha kumucup sayakanira divya-stra nisita turna,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="65r"/><lb n="1"/>saṅ śrī narapati kévran tinuju siréṅ mr̥tyu sakala tiksna,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>trus pyah nr̥pati kénéṅ mārgana katiba riṅ sakatha luméndhéṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 605 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3420 <lg xml:id="rt_82.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="65r"/><lb n="3"/>tandaṅ nr̥pati kaliṅga dhipa lumurug tan hana ya tinaṅgél,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>mundhondha musala muṅgviṅ ratha kanaka bhra mepuhi kasiṅhan, </l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>len taṅ vatək akuda dhém bala ana muṅgviṅ gaja pati maṅsa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>sahyua ruhu-ruhunan moliha musuh aṅhiṅ punagi nikéṅ tvas.</l><note>Stanza numbered 606 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3425 <lg xml:id="rt_82.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>bhrésthaṅ musuh hinavurnyé-nirup i təṅahniṅ raṇa bhavana hya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>konta musala tuhuk bajra ya pinaniniṅ bala sédhaṅ apraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>krodha ṅamuk anuja hriṅ karatala manduk ana ya mapatém,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>len taṅ pəjah hinidékniṅ gaja atumaṅ taṅ bala paḍa malvaṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 607 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3430 <lg xml:id="rt_82.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>gandharva pati manambut gada vési muṣṭinya kanaka tipta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>saṅ śrī nr̥pati kaliṅga dhipa dinunuṅnyaṅ raṇa paḍa maṅsa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>tandva magut amupuh lvir galap ataruṅ riṅ gagana guméntér,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>ghraṅ thar ana panakisniṅ gada mətu bahnya latu-latu lumra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 608 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3435 <lg xml:id="rt_82.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>tapvan ana kasilib saṅ rva səḍəṅ avu mapraṅ apalu tar lvaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/> kapva mrih arébutaṅ svarga silih usi dhira paḍa vidagdha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>déva-rsi gana umuṅ riṅ gagana siraṅ <app><lem type="norm">nārada</lem><rdg wit="#JK">naradha</rdg></app> maka mukya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>mahya umun asurak ghurna paḍa maṅadva/kupik atri. / késa</l><note>Stanza numbered 609 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3440 <lg xml:id="rt_82.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>kapva réja paḍa midər sakathanira drəs ana kadi putéran,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>manduk narapati riṅ kosta capala kabvaṅ tinakis hinaṅgul,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>yakan kahala dhinéndhéṅ gada vinalés sigréṅ hinivud aṅlih,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="65v"/><lb n="22"/>bhraṣṭaṅ ratha kataluy śrī nr̥pati pəjah mvaṅ bala paḍa kaprém. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 610 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    3445<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_83" n="82">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_83.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>mankin dur-bala tékanaṅ bala kavés kabvaṅ vatək éhaya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>yar ton durgamaniṅ təgal pabharatan schniṅ kadga yomaya.</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>mvaṅ lvaniṅ rudhira-rnava drəs ahurus mvaṅ préta séla ruhur,</l>
    3450 <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>abyuran lumébu manabraṅi amirṅkal gunuṅ kénapa</l><note>Stanza numbered 611 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_83.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>gandharva dhipa dhira maṅkin aṅamuk yar ton luyukniṅ musuh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>yaksa mvaṅ bala déva saṅghya sumahab kapvāṅrəgəp sañjata,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>ryu-ṅgvan śrī nrépa karta vīrya dinunuṅ gandharva séna dhika,</l>
    3455 <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>maṅkin madrəs iké lakunya kumucup bananya tanpa-ntara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 612 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_83.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>dhira srya-rjuna garjjitan lumiyat iṅ śatru dhika mah gunuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>molah taṅ dvaja rukma kumlab aṅutus rajanya viro-ttama,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>rakryan saṅ napatih siré-harəp adan muṅgviṅ haja mindita,</l>
    3460 <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>tiṅkahniṅ raṇa yajña sastra ginəlar sampūrṇa śīghra masa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 613 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_83.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>grit grit grit dvaniniṅ ratha drəs umasa samanta yodha prabhu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>len tekaṅ ana riṅ dvipé-narak-araniṅ pék mahya surak,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>bhéri svaṅ gubar aprati-dvani dhinédha sraṅ svaranya tugur,</l>
    3465 <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>agrak taṅ bhuvana-ndha kondha kumətər guntur tikaṅ parvata.</l><note>Stanza numbered 614 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_83.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="39"/>maṇḍəg taṅ bala yodha maṅga apagut māṅsa tikaṅ praṅ layu,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="40"/>tandaṅ saṅ mapatih cumundhuk i siraṅ géndharvua séna dhika,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="66r"/><lb n="1"/>krépniṅ syandana len gaja sva ya vinuk sarsék dhinandhéṅ gada,</l>
    3470 <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>gandharva dhipa len bala dhika pəjah mavréṅ vatək bharggava.</l><note>Stanza numbered 615 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_83.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="66r"/><lb n="3"/>samanta prabhu vīra maṅkn asusun sarsék tamindhih marək,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>hrunya-tap kadi megha saṅghya lumépas brahma-ndha kandhét pəpət,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>mambək taṅ rudhira-rnava ṅébék apan kvehniṅ pəjah kératan,</l>
    3475 <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>hetunyaṅ bala yodha ramya cacaban riṅ rah maṅuṅsir hurip. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 616 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_84" n="83">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_84.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>grit kumvaṅ syandana sriya-rjuna lumurug inadyata madrəs lakunya,</l>
    3480 <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>sakvehniṅ raja samamta kumucup i harəp lagya méntaṅ larasnya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>śīghra sundhuk sira rama parasu parniṅ sarvva divya-stra tiksna,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>himpər krépniṅ hudan sayakanika tumiba tan hana vyat kabuncaṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 617 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_84.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>dhiré-ka-mbék niraṅ bharggava mihti sayabniṅ musuh raja saṅghya,</l>
    3485 <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>maṅkin ahya jəlag lvir tuhina giri tinubniṅ ghana kandhél akrép,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>sak tekaṅ byuha padma-sta dalanika kuvus bhraṣṭa daṇḍanya rampuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/> ndan aṅhin késaranya aṅgəgər asəmu pucakniṅ guniṅ kancana bhra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 618 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_84.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>lavan sakveh vatak éhaya kula umarəp raja samanta mantrī,</l>
    3490 <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>hispér déva-rsi saṅghya jaya-jaya maṅsir vada bhaktya-pa kara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>bhananya krép tumampuh ri sira kadi səkara mrak huvus gandha lépa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>uṅ uṅnya siṅha nada-dbhuta kaharan aṅucarana mantra mala.</l><note>Stanza numbered 619 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_84.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="66v"/><lb n="19"/> krodhé-ka-mbék niraṅ rama parasu maṅayat laṅkap styanta bhinna,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>naracanyeki saṅhara tumihaṅ hinadi-stana jiva-nta riṅ rat,</l>
    3495 <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>nda yékan śīghra sampun kr̥ta vara lumépas mr̥tyu tulyanya madrəs,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>matus taṅ raja samanta ya pəjah anana dvas tikaṅ vahananya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 620 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_84.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>lāvan rakryan sumantri sira pəjah i harəp śrī maha bhumi natha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>mādəg taṅ krédha muṅgviṅ hatinira kumutug jvalitekiṅ kaḍiran,</l>
    3500 <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>tan péndah sapta suryé-ṅudaya giri sira hyun sumaṅhara kaṅ rat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>dīptekaṅ bhūṣaṇa bhra mukuṭakiraṇa saṅnyaṅ bhuvah pada lumra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 621 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_84.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>yekan tandaṅ narārya-rjuna mucap i siraṅ rama hé yatna-yatna,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>ndah mah sarvva-stra saṅkīrṇa ṅaran iki liyat bharggavé-mārganāṅku,</l>
    3505 <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>tandva tampuhnya sə̄k taṅ gagana pinapag iṅ bayu saṅhara madrəs,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>kédér kabvaṅ mareṅ sāgara anan anibéṅ mina lémbvara cūrṇa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 622 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_84.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>umvab taṅ sagarāṅde bhramita sahananiṅ sindu saṅhara mopék,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>kabvaṅ kombul karanya-dbhuta ana kadavut kaknya len baṅkahénya,</l>
    3510 <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>lindhu taṅ bhumi katrag kahava ri səḍəṅiṅ yuddha madvan kaśaktin,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>usna svarga péga rvirnya mahas alulunan saṅ vatək déva saṅghya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 623 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_84.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>tapsan mampəh tikaṅ bana lumépas adhulur bajra konta-ti sara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>car car ca car sdatan pamyati juga ri siraṅ rama sakvehnya bhasma,</l>
    3515 <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>nimpér timpuhnikaṅ varṣa riṅ upala giri-ndra drəs avah guméntér,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="67r"/><lb n="1"/>bhrasthekiṅ bajra saṅkīrṇa sahana tumiba ryāṅga saṅ jémadha gni.</l><note>Stanza numbered 624 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_84.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>rug bhraṣṭaṅ déva saṅghyan kahava təkap ikaṅ bana makrép tumampuh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>yaksa mvaṅ rakṣasa-dhém paḍa pəjah ananaṅ bhuta tan lvir avaknya,</l>
    3520 <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>len téṅ gandharva vidyadhara kadi tinumaṅ taṅ pəjah shé matiṇḍih,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>len taṅ muṅgviṅ gajanya ratha rémuk atəmah duli sanucūrṇa bhasma.</l><note>Stanza numbered 625 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_84.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="67r"/><lb n="6"/>kvéb taṅ luṅha ṅuṅsi svarga makukud alayu katrésan tan vriṅ ratnya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>kagrət ginlis tinutan panah hinusak-ssik ayuh tikaṅ svarga cūrṇa,</l>
    3525 <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>vuntuṅ akasa kīrṇaṅ sava maka télébuk lvir hudan vaṅke agréh,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>yekan kévran siraṅ rama parasu lumihat śakti saṅ karta vīrya. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 626 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_85" n="84">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_85.01" n="1">
    3530 <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>hetunyan timira-adhakara pamalés śrī pama nir saṅśaya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>len tékan hala punja saṅhita ṅaranya-néka sampun lapas,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>rəp śīghraṅ pətəṅ anjana calasa maṅde vibhramekiṅ jagat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>lavan tampuh ikaṅ vara-stra tumiba drəs lvir hudan sayaka.</l><note>Stanza numbered 627 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_85.02" n="2">
    3535 <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>yatna srya-rjuna yoga sandhi kinéna-kén riṅ dhanuhnyé-nayat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>hrunyaṅ dva dasa surya saṅghya madulur mvaṅ bayu bajra-dbhuta,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>ghér bhar bhér malilaṅ tikaṅ bhuvana rug bhraṣṭaṅ témpo parvata,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>dvasta-kaṅ halabajra śīrṇa təkapiṅ drésniṅ maha banjana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 628 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_85.03" n="3">
    3540 <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>maṅkin krédha sira tri vikrama maha mūrtyāṅjəlag sobhita,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>himpər parvata néru śr̥ṅga dumilah taṅ bhava nalāṅkr̥ta,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="67r"/><lb n="20"/>parpatniṅ bhuvana-ndha pūrṇa kumaluṅ taṅ megha raktéṅ jaja,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>sévyāṅasta maha prabhava ya lumuṅ kapvāṅrəgəp sañjata.</l><note>Stanza numbered 629 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_85.04" n="4">
    3545 <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>balla mvaṅ musala trisula bhara coli bajra cakra yudha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>sumyuknya-rddha parəṅ tumampuh irika krak srya-rjuna ṅadvakən,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>ayéy bharggava dustha mah lihat iké śakti-ṅku tan pépama,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>bhraṣṭa syuh niyatanya cūrṇita təkapniṅ sarvva dhanva-dbhuta.</l><note>Stanza numbered 630 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_85.05" n="5">
    3550 <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>yékāṅdagdha manah niraṅ prasu rama tyanta riṅ adbhuta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>rəp rudra radhanaṅ samādhi rinəgəp kémpén minuṣṭiṅ hiḍəp,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>pér rat rok sumapaut bhaṭāra maka rūpa sthula ghora kréti,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>vunvaṅ andha huvus mamindha ri sirekiṅ sarvva tato-dhréta.</l><note>Stanza numbered 631 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_85.06" n="6">
    3555 <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>vr̥ddhaṅ déha maha-ti ghora hibékan taṅ dik vidik maṇḍala,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>nivréttyādi huvus kakusa mahiṅan santyanta vvtniṅ ruhar,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>panca-sya-dbhuta piṅga késa dumilah taṅ tyaksa saryo-pana,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>pro-dbhutaṅ dasa astha yeka yéka huméga kondaṇḍa-daṇḍa kréti.</l><note>Stanza numbered 632 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_85.07" n="7">
    3560 <l n="a"><lb n="34"/>dhira srya-rjuna maṅkin ujvala sira-nton śakti saṅ bharggava,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="35"/>brahmo-tpati ṅaraṅaṅ astra lumépas bhor bhar sumunviṅ laṅit,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="36"/>tampuhnya-dbhuta riṅ sva deśahanira himpər kostubhalaṅ kr̥ta,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="37"/>maṅkin sobhita jamadha gni təkapiṅ brahma-stra téjo maya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 633 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_85.08" n="8">
    3565 <l n="a"><lb n="38"/>saṅhara dhvani siṅha nadanira ghurna sapta bhumya maya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="39"/>é koṅ kasmala karta vīrya lihat ikiṅ bharggava nindita,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="68r"/><lb n="1"/>ndak ton teki pəjah rika yuh bhara ko rajanya raja dhika,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>ləṅkap-kvi-ki ya mārga mun muliha riṅ yama-ndha yékin vulat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 634 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_85.09" n="9">
    3570 <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>sampurneki dhanuhnira paha vélu bananya tiksno-ttama,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>tatvanyeki siyuṅ bhaṭāra parama nandan səḍəṅ garvvia,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>ykan siddhi sara təmah parasu tiksna granya méṅis miṅié,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>yeka mugraha saṅ hyaṅ īśvara dulurniṅ kundhala mvaṅ kurug.</l><note>Stanza numbered 635 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_85.10" n="10">
    3575 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="68r"/><lb n="7"/> ndatandvé-k ləpasnya śīghra kumucup lvir mr̥tyu sākṣāt murub,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>tampuhanyeki ri saṅ varéndra tumaném taṅ hru tumuṅgviṅ jaja,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>ndatan vyartha pəjah sireki gumuliṅ riṅ réṅga ratno-jvala,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>rəp śīghran sumaput sva rupanira himpər kama murittya-tmaka.</l><note>Stanza numbered 636 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_85.11" n="11">
    3580 <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>mabhraṅ ratna kaluṅ-kaluṅnira təkapniṅ rah baṅun rantaga,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>mlés taṅ véstra kasiṅsətan rudhira śīrṇaṅ éma gatra drava,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>len taṅ nopura bau rakṣaka kaluṅ susauh lavan pataka,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>avnés taṅ muka gatra dipta ta sumunviṅurna muṅgviṅ rai. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 637 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_86" n="85">
    3585 <lg xml:id="rt_86.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>ri pəjah iraṅ narendra ana teja katon asinaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>saha səkar arja riṅ gagana mér aṅépés sumahur,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>maréṅgi tétégnikaṅ bhuvana teki baṅun kalaran,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>lumiyat i saṅ pəjah yva magulaṅ-gulaṅ iṅ palagan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 638 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3590 <lg xml:id="rt_86.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>sahaja sirém hyaṅ arka kadi mavlas i saṅ nr̥pati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>jaladha sasiṅjaṅ arja ya sacavéli tékāṅrurubi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>tinaṅisan iṅ gərəh jarumaniṅ rərəb aṅluh atis,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="68v"/><lb n="22"/>hiriti pasamba-sambati patərnya baṅun séségén.</l><note>Stanza numbered 639 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3595 <lg xml:id="rt_86.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>avicaritan mateki gati saṅ pəjah iṅ palagan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>tucapa tikaṅ vatək ry anupa mévi-vu laksa pəjah,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>hana mara sésaniṅ mati maṅusir alas manusup,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>parəṅ alayu paḍa mrih i hurupnya lali matuhan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 640 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3600 <lg xml:id="rt_86.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>hana manikəl vataṅnya palaganya tiniṅgalakən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>hana manukup karah kaluṅ ahambuluṅan masusun,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>ravisi raṅinya yeka iinarutnya sinumpétakən,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>sakari vədinya tutén ika hetunika susupan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 641 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3605 <lg xml:id="rt_86.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>hana lutusiṅ gəgər tutuganiṅ giri durga mavan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>avan ikanaṅ bala mrih alayu maṅusir nagara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>ḍatəṅ avarah-varah ri kahilaṅnira saṅ lumurug,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>ri pəjah iraṅ para prabhu təlas karuhun nr̥pati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 642 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3610 <lg xml:id="rt_86.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>kadi siniram tikaṅ ry anupa rajya kagéman arés,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>makin avuvuh tikaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> avarah ri hilaṅ nr̥pati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>katəka-téka daləm puri katundha-tundha taṅ ujar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>sahaja ginopita-ki pinahavasakən pinépér. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 643 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3615</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_87" n="86">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="39"/>ndan saṅ śrī parameśvari manému suṅkava manahén i sokaniṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="40"/>ṅuni rakva təvək narendra laris aṅlurug irika ya tambéyiṅ rimaṅ,</l>
    3620 <l n="c"><lb n="41"/>taṅ tuṅgal rva nimittaniṅ turida saṅśaya manuluyi tiksnaniṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="42"/>sih lavan kətəriṅ tvas andhuni téli-talin ira ri narendra tan vaneh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 644 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="43"/>marāṅrés hatiniṅ marək-marək arés yva ri sira kadi kanya suṅsuta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="69r"/><lb n="1"/>sāsiṅ kasih ireki tapva kasalah mari pinakaalilyaniṅ hati,</l>
