    3625 <l n="c"><lb n="2"/>lavan padapa sumpiṅ arja rinujit-rujit ira pamavan panas hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="3"/>vyartha puṣpa ané kisapvanira mogha kahava téka saṅkaniṅ purik.</l><note>Stanza numbered 645 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="69r"/><lb n="4"/> lavan hyasnira teki tan hinuniṅa kusuti gəluṅ iran mareṅ mukha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="5"/>nir don taṅ vaṅinin pupur tinidha pucsa ri pipinira tan sinanmata,</l>
    3630 <l n="c"><lb n="6"/>sə̄ṅ-séṅniṅ laṭi matra śīrṇa binibik-bibikan ira ri landhépiṅ kuku,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="7"/>mantén teki hirəṅ sipatnira dinéh-skén i luh ira śaktiniṅ taṅis.</l><note>Stanza numbered 646 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="8"/>himpər kartika rum niran vinulatan ləṅəṅi raras ira maṅun laṅa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="9"/>rém-rémniṅ turida naput-naputi tiksnani manah ira saṅkaniṅ taṅis,</l>
    3635 <l n="c"><lb n="10"/>amvas matra tibaṅ luh adrəs siniram pupur i pipi kékéṅ salaṅ-salaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="11"/>vahva sinvan aluṅ raras hatinira səmi turida marambahn lulut.</l><note>Stanza numbered 647 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="12"/>sokāṅlih gumuliṅ anan pavuṅu tan vriṅ ulaha maṅésah vimurcitta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="13"/>suṅsut-suṅsut iran amogha téka tampa karana tikəliṅ halis siṅi,</l>
    3640 <l n="c"><lb n="14"/>tég nyér tvasnira teki majar i géṅiṅ lara ḍatəṅ adulur puték hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="15"/>tandva vratta ya vaspada jar itəlasnya pati pəjah i madhyaniṅ raṇa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 648 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="16"/>pakrakniṅ sakadhatvan atri katamaṅyat asəmu gərəhiṅ labuh kapat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="17"/>lagya nambatakən laranya atépak jaja ana matétél-tétél hati,</l>
    3645 <l n="c"><lb n="18"/>nurcca śrī paramé svari kapati vétai laranira nékél téké hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="19"/>maṅkin teki marambahan panaṅisiṅ kaka-kaka sahaneṅ daləm purī.</l><note>Stanza numbered 649 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_87.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="69v"/><lb n="20"/> ndatan vruh sira teki yan tinaṅisan gupté aṅelih alurva madapa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="21"/>tan kava lukariṅ gəluṅ murarak arja kadi jalandha tapvaniṅ riris,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="22"/>sakvahniṅ paricārikā naṅis asambat hinya kaka paḍa sraṅ aṅrubuṅ,</l>
    3650 <l n="d"><lb n="23"/>luhniṅ strī sakadhatvan adrəs atəmah vah amalapar i himbaṅiṅ pipi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 650 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="24"/>nda vahsa tutur aṅlilir sira ana panaṅis apəga tan ané-naka,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="25"/>aṅhiṅ matya jugeki rakva tumuté aji pəjah atiniṣṭiniṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="26"/>nahan hetunira vrih aṅdadak adan tumutura ri narendra riṅ raṇa,</l>
    3655 <l n="d"><lb n="27"/>mvaṅ smvéhnika saṅ mamarvani karasikanira tumuté-nareśvarī.</l><note>Stanza numbered 651 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="28"/>sampun muṅgah atuṅgalan ratha təlas pinaharəja pinik bhinūṣaṇan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="29"/>lavan strī sadaləm puri-ki maṅiriṅ ri sira puyaṅ hinya sraṅ andulur,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="30"/>tuṅgal tan sah apavahan varék anémbaṅ i sira pinakesiniṅ purī,</l>
    3660 <l n="d"><lb n="31"/>aṅhiṅ kasih ira ki ratna kusumāṅsa raras ika paparvaniṅ ratih.</l><note>Stanza numbered 652 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="32"/>strīṅiṅ sevaka teki tapva paḍa bhakti ri sira maṅiriṅ yathākrama,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="33"/>vdan rakveki huvus ruməṅva kahilaṅsi panuluyanika mriṅhiṅ raṇa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="34"/>vétniṅ bhakti su-satya matya kaharəpnya ri pəjahi sénéṅnya tan vaneh,</l>
    3665 <l n="d"><lb n="35"/>patrém teki huvus kinundhaṅ ika sopananika pajahéṅ raṇāṅgana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 653 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="36"/>sampun śīghra bhavisya lampah ira teki dinuluriṅ raras r̥ṣiṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="37"/>tan varṇan sira riṅ avan baṅun acaṅkrama madulur atun-tun iṅ hənu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="38"/>kéṅaṅ taṅ raṇa bhumi dipta kuményar təkapiṅ aruṅ mabhra kamukan,</l>
    3670 <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="70r"/><lb n="1"/>śīrṇa sédga mani-andra capa kuméndhap yva masəmu ləṅəṅiṅ pasir vukir.</l><note>Stanza numbered 654 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.12" n="12">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>ṅkāne piṅgir ikaṅ karaṅ liman atun-tuna asəmu pinarantyaiṅ limut,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>deniṅ téṅran anéka varṇa məlek i drésiṅ anila ya mombak-ombakan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>himpər padpa kumlab arja ravisiṅ raṅin amirah aṅambva-kén laṅa,</l>
    3675 <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>siṅhəl mvaṅ karah arja mabhra sasəkarniṅ asana məkar anjrah iṅ kapat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 655 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.13" n="13">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="70r"/><lb n="6"/>ləṅləṅ tapva tiniṅhalan ratha sabhūṣaṇi təṅah alaṅa samar-samar,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>duṅhus-duṅhus ika-sva durga makaranya curiga vara bajra tomara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>simpiṅ-simpiṅ anéka manjrah i pasirnya palaga mapasuṅ curik siṅi,</l>
    3680 <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>len taṅ pandhi vataṅ papanya ya sapaṇḍan asidéha ri tiṅhasiṅ karaṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 656 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_87.14" n="14">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>samanta prambhu kaprém iṅ/rathanira saha bhūṣaṇa haləp, /rana ané</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>tan péndah kavi ləṅləṅ amrih aṅituṅ kaéṅéṅan aṅapus palémbaṅa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>dudva bhava masamparan taṅan anaṅga véhaṅ ira sumundhaṅ aṅliga,</l>
    3685 <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>lalya liṅgih anéka pantəs aṅisapva karas aṅikiraṅ tanah siṅi. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 657 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_88" n="87">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>maṅke prāpta téka nareśvarīṅ palugvan,</l>
    3690 <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>sakveh saṅ prabhu kahalintaṅan kalalvan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>ryuṅgvan śrī nr̥pati juga turuṅ kapaṅguh,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>marmāṅde taṅis asəkəl anan pasambat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 658 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>méh prapté-kahana niraṅ narendra kaprém,</l>
    3695 <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>maṅkin taṅ lvaṅ atip atiṇḍih apramana,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>mantri taṇḍa pəjah anéka satya bhakti,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="70v"/><lb n="21"/>yékāṅlud tényuhi manah niran tumiṅhal.</l><note>Stanza numbered 659 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>len tekaṅ pajah i hiriṅ narendra makvah,</l>
    3700 <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>ghroṅ-ghroṅ matta turida pik-pik rinaṅki,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>cihnanyeki ana karah kaluṅnya sékép,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>mvaṅ siṅhəl kiti-kitiranya kadbhvta-bhra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 660 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>vantən teki karahatan təlas paratra,</l>
    3705 <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>sura nvan lituhayu padma raja rupa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>ndan rakveki paṅalasan kasih gatinya,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>mabhraṅ ratna kanaka saravva bhūṣaṇanya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 661 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>ndan saṅ śrī nr̥pati anoṅ rathāṅga ratna,</l>
    3710 <l n="b"><lb n="31"/>kadya-arém juga sira yan pajah luméndha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="32"/>tan sah kasih ira mateki rāga étu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="33"/>ndah yékan pəjah i dagan varéndra tan sah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 662 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="34"/>kumlab taṅ layu-layu éma gatra mabhra,</l>
    3715 <l n="b"><lb n="35"/>nadyāṅgya-kén i laris saṅ mareṅ palugvan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="36"/>nda kadya-varah-sarahé-yunéṅ narendra,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="37"/>vétniṅ tan vənaṅ apasah yadin paratra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 663 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="38"/>yeka-nyuh tvas ira nareśvarīn tumiṅhal,</l>
    3720 <l n="b"><lb n="39"/>ndan riṅ sakṣaṇa tumarun sakeṅ ratha-gya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="40"/>sakniṅ kén gəluṅ amuré lukar hinaṅgul,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="41"/>résniṅ tvas mavətu taṅis lana giṇeṅ tvas.</l><note>Stanza numbered 664 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="42"/>nda yékan ḍatəṅ amékul airé-narendra,</l>
    3725 <l n="b"><lb n="43"/>ahénék tan vənaṅ aṅucap lana-péga-tvas,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="44"/>aṅhiṅ luhnira juga aityanadrəs amvas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="45"/>amlés ryāṅga aji sinuṅkəman sudevī.</l><note>Stanza numbered 665 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="70v"/><lb n="46"/> lagya masvasi muka saṅ səḍəṅ paratra,</l>
    3730 <l n="b"><lb n="47"/>marma mrih umusap-usap anan liniṅ-liṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="48"/>méṅis traṅ vaja kadi harṣa yan panuṅsuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="71r"/><lb n="1"/>kadya véha səpah amista sésiniṅ kén.</l><note>Stanza numbered 666 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>ndan kadya ṅucapa siré-ḍatəṅ saṅ antén,</l>
    3735 <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>induṅ tiṅhalana kakanta toh təkapta,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>tiṅhal hérén i ḍatəṅanta taku tan len,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>rum rakryan juga suməlap ané hatiṅku.</l><note>Stanza numbered 667 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>maṅke pvan téka kita toh mapé-lahāṅkva,</l>
    3740 <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>géṅ trésné-rarasi ajəṅta lot matuṅgu,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>ndon kiṅ-kiṅ turida lavan təṅahta mambət,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>susva hrit vaṅini pipinta kénéṅi-ṅvaṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 668 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.12" n="12">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>nda tapvan varəg i ajəṅta riṅ paturvan,</l>
    3745 <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>ndak ton-ton tikəli alista riṅ kacapvan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>pantén yan cala-cala éva tan tékég tvas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>sér méraṅ təhər akiput linuṅsuran kén.</l><note>Stanza numbered 669 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.13" n="13">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>maṅke pva-ku bibi miyat riké ajəṅ-ta,</l>
    3750 <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>sə̄ṅsiṅ rāga ri hati tan vənaṅ vinastvan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>énak ṅvaṅ pəjah amisan riké-harəpta,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>pamvit-kvi-ki paha-lavén tuhanku taṅhér.</l><note>Stanza numbered 670 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_88.14" n="14">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>lvir maṅko-jra aji tapva yanvinarṇa,</l>
    3755 <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>yékāṅda taṅis asəkəl təhər masambat,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>hetunyaṅ sava ginugah-gugah tinaṅhi,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>kadyāṅruṅva sumahuré hiḍəp sudevī. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 671 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_89" n="88">
    3760 <lg xml:id="rt_89.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>é nathāṅku manéhta lihatana,</l>
    . <l n="b">prāpta manbah i jéṅta saha taṅis,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>suṅ-suṅ teki lulut-kvi-kita kaka,</l>
    . <l n="d">pak-pak teki taṅis-ku arih-arih.</l><note>Stanza numbered 672 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3765 <lg xml:id="rt_89.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="24"/>ah rakryan mapah hetuniṅ aviṅit,</l>
    . <l n="b">tanpāṅruṅvi-taṅis-ku kasih harəp,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>maṅko pva-mbékaniṅ pəjaha sagar,</l>
    . <l n="d">tan trésné rya-ku sihta puji-pujin.</l><note>Stanza numbered 673 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3770 <lg xml:id="rt_89.03" n="3"> <l n=""><pb edRef="#JK" n="71v"/><lb n="26"/> maṅke pvan ri hilaṅta mapa kunəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b">aṅhiṅ matya juga-naka ri hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>ton-tonta vəlas asih-ku tak kavəlas,</l>
    . <l n="d">marma-aṅkun laris aṅlugasa hurip.</l><note>Stanza numbered 674 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_89.04" n="4">
    3775 <l n="a"><lb n="28"/>sih-sih-kvi-kita tan kəna pinégat,</l>
    . <l n="b">siṅ sélahta yata nuluyi hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>pantəs yan téka cumbu kédi diné,</l>
    . <l n="d">sruh-vruh riṅ gitani hinarih-arih.</l><note>Stanza numbered 675 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_89.05" n="5">
    3780 <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>maṅke kupva kitan téka uménéṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b">dosāṅkvi-ki kakāṅku paran ika,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>ṅuni ṅgvanya sédhé-ṅku kakavaśa,</l>
    . <l n="d">tanpa ṅliṅ anukər védhi riṅ ulah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 676 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_89.06" n="6">
    3785 <l n="a"><lb n="32"/>antuk-ta-mi amarṇana turida,</l>
    . <l n="b">marmāṅdani tapih-ku vahu cucul,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>syuh sirneki jajanta kari ragət,</l>
    . <l n="d">bosan-ta-ki kakāṅku tan aharié. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 677 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    3790<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_90" n="89">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_90.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="34"/>ri sampuniṅ ulah matāṅku gupé aṅlih alupa luru tan ané-naka,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="35"/>ri paṅkvani bapāṅku tan sah anamar hinari-hari təhər sisuṅkéman,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="36"/>sabukta ana randi yeki panalinta ri mélasi tapih-ku kasrépan,</l>
    3795 <l n="d"><lb n="37"/>ujarta rinéṅén-ku yeka karanāṅkva-dan atutur i sandhiniṅ tapih.</l><note>Stanza numbered 678 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_90.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="71v"/><lb n="38"/> ri piṅrvaniṅ ulah kapiṅ tiga təlas vasa ri sarasaniṅ karasikan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="39"/>dudu savəṅi sih-ku saṅśaya matémbéh i kita kadi tambvaniṅ sasi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="40"/>ridhép-ku kaka sih tatan luvara késyana rasani vuvusta riṅ hulun,</l>
    3800 <l n="d"><lb n="41"/>si tan saha sakeṅ kisapvan amisésana səpah i vajanta tan kalen.</l><note>Stanza numbered 679 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_90.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="42"/>ujarta yatika kinubda ri hatiṅku ya kinémit i raganiṅ hulun,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="43"/>lalu pvan hinahalta mithya ri pəjahta manalahasa sih-ku kasihan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="44"/>mataṅya kaka hér matāku tumuta yva pəjaha ri daganta tan sha,</l>
    3805 <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="72r"/><lb n="1"/>yadin layat amuksa-muksana sukha ṅvaṅ adulura mareṅ smara laya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 680 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_90.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>savétni géṅi trésnaniṅ ṅvaṅ i kita silih asih i daləm pasaṅgaman,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>pipi-ṅku juga tan vənaṅ sah i rarasta maṅaréki sumbya-suṅ səpah,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>susu-ṅkva rupit arja ménéṅi taṅanta sahaja namarantya-kén kuku,</l>
    3810 <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>təṅah-ku lupa riṅ tapih gupé aṅanti vəkasana ri yantyaniṅ gati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 681 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_90.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>lavan syapa tika purik-purik-anaṅkva mupih-upiha duhkhaniṅ hulun,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>syapé-ka paka jampya rāga ri səḍəṅku sinaputan i śaktiniṅ smara,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>kakaṅ-ku sira tan/vəlas aṅarya-kéna nalahasé-səḍəṅ rimaṅ, / vruhiṅ</l>
    3815 <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>pujin pva siti téka naṅhég lané-musiniṅ asarané nahén lulut. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 682 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_91" n="90">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_91.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>kaka aji riṅ apāṅganya ṅvaṅ yan silih asiha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>muvaha kadi polah-kvi jroniṅ jinəm araras,</l>
    3820 <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>manisi mata vajan-tat pojar yan-déṅa ri hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>amahayu lukariṅ kén yan sampun vəkasiṅ ulah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 683 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_91.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>yata mapuhara kiṅ-kiṅ kuṅ-kva manbéhi turida,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>maṅaṅən-aṅən i sihtéki ṅvaṅ mogha sinapihan,</l>
    3825 <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>pira karika lavasniṅ tan tiṅhal kadi savulan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>tvééki panaṅisi-ṅvaṅ tan sara ṅka nahén unéṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 684 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_91.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>makin aṅvaki ləṅləṅ-kun baryan vəṅi sumaput,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>jalada kasarakat lvir siṅjaṅ-kun van kacava,</l>
    3830 <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>vulan avénés alurva lek tan sémva samu suma,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>riris alit aniran himpər luh tan kəna pinégéṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 685 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_91.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="72v"/><lb n="22"/> kaka pavəkasani-ṅvaṅ riṅ janma-ntara ta kunəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>yadi satəmahanan-téki-ṅvaṅ sélvana sadulur,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>gaḍuṅ amarəki tandan luṅ-luṅta ṅlih aṅalayan,</l>
    3835 <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>liraṅ ika təmahāṅkva nvam mahva pupus aputih.</l><note>Stanza numbered 686 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_91.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>nahan ujar ira marma sambat-sambati nr̥pati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>hinusap ira vinas-vas saṅ sampun pəjah hinamər,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>taṅan ira ya sinambut de saṅ lvir tulis araras,</l>
    3840 <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>tinukupakən i santén tambaniṅ jaja mahénék. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 687 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_92" n="91">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_92.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="30"/>samantara dan matutur sudevī,</l>
    . <l n="b">géṅni laré-tvas pinégatniṅ ambək,</l>
    3845 <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>təlas maraṅ citta sudhīra bhakti,</l>
    . <l n="d">maṅke juga ṅhiṅ pəjah éki tan lén.</l><note>Stanza numbered 688 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_92.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="32"/>gəluṅ lukar kolot i bau lumraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b">marmé-najum riṅ kuku sampun épén,</l>
    3850 <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>tapihnira nindya sabuk narendra,</l>
    . <l n="d">marmanya tan sah ri təṅah nirāṅlih.</l><note>Stanza numbered 689 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_92.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="72v"/><lb n="34"/> təlas manəmbah ri narendra mamvit,</l>
    . <l n="b">ginya-kén iṅ rāga təkapniṅ onəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>yateka himpər jaruman naéndra,</l>
    3855 <l n="d">lvir majaré géṅni lulutnira gya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 690 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_92.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="36"/>huvus nira-dan maṅadəg tan himba,</l>
    . <l n="b">patrém pabélan ya təlas minuṣṭi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>yaté-nunus dipta miṅis malandhép,</l>
    3860 <l n="d">céb ṅér kéné prana tékas tumaṅgə̄ṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 691 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_92.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="38"/>mélés maraṅ rah mamirah tikaṅ kén,</l>
    . <l n="b">madrəs hilinyeki təhər tan ampét,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="39"/>sugandha mamba jənu kasturi arik,</l>
    3865 <l n="d">siṅgih rahiṅ satya viśeṣa putri.</l><note>Stanza numbered 692 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_92.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="73r"/><lb n="1"/>sémék maré-tvasnira saṅśaya hénék,</l>
    . <l n="b">asrét maraṅ śabda haneṅ jaja hrit,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="2"/>pəgat-pəgat mandra lana pégé-tvas,</l>
    3870 <l n="d">lvir tan karuṅveki vuvusnira srét. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 693 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_93" n="92">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_93.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>antén-ku ratna kusumāṅsa mapo-lahan-ta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>ta-ntak mareṅ magara ayva vihaṅ manah-ta,</l>
    3875 <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>hat-hat ajəṅta bibi méman apan kita-nvam,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>tapvan vruh iṅ turida rāga kinuncaṅiṅ hyun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 694 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_93.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>nahan mateki pavəkas-ku raṅən təkapta,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>vantən karas-ku kavəkas ri daləm paturvan,</l>
    3880 <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>sésinya bhasa saha gita gurit narendra,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>maṅke pəjah tuturakənta siluṅ-laṅāṅkva.</l><note>Stanza numbered 695 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_93.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>solah-ku yeki guritan kakavin palambaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>muṅgviṅ ṭikā-rjja pakirim-kirim éṅ paḍa hyun,</l>
    3885 <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>mo yan paka-vaka taṅisniṅ anuksma-kén kuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>bhāgyan gurit-guritaniṅ kavi su-srama nvam.</l><note>Stanza numbered 696 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_93.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>nahan vəkas-vəkas ireki təhər paratra,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>ṅkāne hiriṅ nr̥pati tapva siran sumaṇḍiṅ,</l>
    3890 <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>marma sahur taṅis ika saṅ inojaran syuh,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>ahrit svaranya kadi métva riris taṅisnya.</l><note>Stanza numbered 697 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_93.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>sémbah patik aji réṅés yva təkap sudevī,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>ṅunin pasatya ri daganta matāku tan len,</l>
    3895 <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>ndan yan paratra sili dhirya hurip-ku dén-ta,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>riṅ janma soṅ huluna tāku muvah təkapta.</l><note>Stanza numbered 698 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_93.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>lavan muvah syapa tika srayaniṅ kadi ṅvaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>pun rāga hetuka mateki təlas paratra,</l>
    3900 <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>honyé-dagan nr̥pati bhakti su-satya tan sah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>yāṅde laré-tvasi manéhta miyat katiksnan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 699 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_93.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="73v"/><lb n="27"/>saṅsipta teki pəjahāṅkvi-daganta tosén,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>patrémta sopanani jivitaniṅ hulun dyah,</l>
    3905 <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>nargganta yeki avanāṅkva tumuta tan sah,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>vétniṅ kabhaktin ati satya ri jéṅta tan lén.</l><note>Stanza numbered 700 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_93.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>é rāga hetuka lihat ri manéhta masku,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>bhaktyāṅku tan sah ikiteki tuhanku tāṅhér,</l>
    3910 <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>suṅ-suṅ mara-ku ta dulur saparan matun-tun,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>sugyan-ku tāṅlihaa riṅ hənu durga mevəh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 701 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .
    . <lg xml:id="rt_93.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="73v"/><lb n="35"/>aṅhiṅ kiteki paranāṅkva vuvus narendra,</l>
    3915 <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>paksāṅa yan srahakən é kita rékva ṅuni,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>maṅke pəjah kaka ta sis mapa to-lahāṅkva,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>aṅhiṅ paratra juga ṅenaka rakva tan sah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 702 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_93.10" n="10">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="39"/>nahan vuvusnya tékas amvit apatrém aṅga,</l>
    3920 <l n="b"><lb n="40"/>ləs śīghra sakṣaṇa pəjah gumuliṅ luméndha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="41"/>marman sumuṅkém i sénéṅnya təhər sumaṇḍiṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="42"/>himpər anyar<!-- hañar?--> kavava muṅgvi daləm paturvan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 703 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_93.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="43"/>kén-kénya uavli mirir arja kaluṅsur amlés,</l>
    3925 <l n="b"><lb n="44"/>deniṅ rah adrəs amirah sumarambah smvas,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="45"/>murcca vnés aṅlh alumé lukariṅ gəluṅ mrik,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="46"/>kadyāṅrəṅih-rəṅih ataṅhya mahāṅdudut kén. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 704 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_94" n="93">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_94.01" n="1">
    3930 <l n="a"><lb n="47"/>sakveh saṅ maka punya rāga aji riṅ śayana sira mateki varṇanən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="48"/>sampun teki matuṅgaan taṅis ira-jar i kalaran iran hinaryakən,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="49"/>nahan étu nirāṅlugés turida tan hana tinaha-tahé-délém hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="50"/>aṅhiṅ matya jugeki rakva tumuté-aji saparanya ramya tan saha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 705 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_94.02" n="2">
    3935 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="74r"/><lb n="1"/>śīghra dan-dan anəmbah amvit i narendra saha taṅis irāṅhiris hati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>layvan puṣpa sakeṅ gəluṅnira pamursitanira saha luh(nir) tibéṅ pipi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>patrém tiksna ané-nagém ri taṅan arja paməgata hurip hinandhéman,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>marbas taṅ rudhiré-jaja mvas amirah gupé aluru siran huvus pəjah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 706 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_94.03" n="3">
    3940 <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>maṅkin tanpa paruṅvan strī taṅisiṅ kaka-kaka ri pəjah nareśvarī,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>kadya mindha sékéṅ tavaṅ taṅis ika sélur asəmu hudan anyar<!-- hañar?--> ḍatəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>sambat-sambat ika raras pituruniṅpatər akətər i kalaniṅ kapét,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>luhnya ṅəmbəṅi soca matra tumibéṅ susu masəmu panindhaniṅ riris.</l><note>Stanza numbered 707 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_94.04" n="4">
    3945 <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>samanta prabhu gharini tucapa teki sira paḍa huvus haneṅ abha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>ton kasyasihi saṅ pəjah ri təṅahiṅ raṇa kasihan ira gilaṅ-gilaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>marma nyarvani luh vasāṅrurubi cavli saha kusuma layvaniṅ gəluṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>lagya nambatakən ri sihnira maṅol i sava aji təhər sinuṅkəman.</l><note>Stanza numbered 708 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_94.05" n="5">
    3950 <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>a hah saṅ pəjah iṅ palugvan apa teki kaka təmahaniṅ hulun pəjah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>yadyastun sadadinta masku tumut aku ri kita kaka havya saṅśaya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>yan paṅ-janma kitéṅ karas hulun adadya kakavin araras palambaṅa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="16"/>vétniṅ tan saha taku toh lihati matya-ku kaka ta dulur-dulur pəjah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 709 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_94.06" n="6">
    3955 <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>nahan sambat rian paratra sumavat ri sava saṅ amaṅun laré hati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="74v"/><lb n="18"/>stniṅ taṇḍa muvah paratra ri paratrani sénéṅ iki riṅ raṇāṅgana,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>len taṅ medran amet ri uṅgvan ira saṅ priya masaṅu taṅisnya tan pəgat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>sambya ṅémban i putra-putra niki katak asaha kavula ṅavin séréh.</l><note>Stanza numbered 710 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_94.07" n="7">
    3960 <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>ndan rakveki anyar-anyar təlas apaṅgih ulihiṅ akirim-kirim ṭikā,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>luṅha-ndoh ahañaṅ-anyaṅ gati nikén turuṅ hinubhayaniṅ yayah bibi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>vantən rakva vuvusnya ṅūni pinastya-kén ika ya pasatya riṅ karas,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>hetunya pəjah éki rakva kaharəpnya maṅavakana pjariṅ ṭikā. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 711 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_95" n="94">
    3965 <lg xml:id="rt_95.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="74v"/><lb n="25"/>taṅéh yan ucapən mateki gati saṅ tumut riṅ priya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>muvah sahana kinnara sura pəjah yata varṇanən,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>udani təkapiṅ vara mréta kaśakti saṅ bharggava,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>tékéṅ gaja ratha sva taṅgaṅan ika huvus saṅkəpan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 712 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3970 <lg xml:id="rt_95.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>masa praṇata bhaktya nambah umusap ri jə̄ṅ saṅ yati,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>lumampah aṅiriṅ makéri ri siraṅ mareṅ asrama,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="31"/>anan kadiṅ husana rupanika pūrṇa śobha haləp,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="32"/>təkapni kəñariṅ sva bhūṣaṇanika-rjja ratnāṅsuka.</l><note>Stanza numbered 713 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3975 <lg xml:id="rt_95.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="33"/>nda śīghra tinamuy-tamuy riṅ upa bhoga tapvan kuraṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="34"/>mijil sakariṅ yoga saṅ paraśurāma sampun avis,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="35"/>səkar jənu su-gadha kasturi miṅgiṅ samaṅde sukha,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="36"/>mamukti phalaniṅ jayeṅ raṇa su-satya vīra brata.</l><note>Stanza numbered 714 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3980 <lg xml:id="rt_95.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="37"/>təlasnya paḍa mamvit adhara ri jamadha gnya-ksama,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="38"/>mésat gagana mārga śīghra tumuluy təkeṅ kahyaṅan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="75r"/><lb n="1"/>katancana vara-psari ḍatəṅ anuṅsuṅ saha taṅis,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>raras hatinikan ana jara riyan sénéṅnyan pəjah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 715 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    3985 <lg xml:id="rt_95.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>sapolah ika tan tiṅana tinékan samaṅde sukha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>unéṅnyan alavas yateka pinunagya-kényéṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>macarva lurusiṅ təṅah yva maka aryasaṅ kén lukar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>masarya vavéliṅ gəluṅ lukar agantuṅan riṅ pipi. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 716 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    3990<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_96" n="95">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_96.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>atīta gatiniṅ sura-psara haneṅ sura pada mari teki varṇanən,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>ikaṅ ry anupa rajya teki caritan valu-valu ri pəjah nareśvarī,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>lavan sahananiṅ karaṇḍan hinya len kaka-kaka maṅiriṅ mareṅ raṇa,</l>
    3995 <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>huvus téka haneṅ daləm saha taṅisnya pamavanika riṅraṅiṅ hati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 717 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_96.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>ya hetunikanaṅ kadhatvan i yavé-daləm asəpi téké panaṅkilan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>ikaṅ vataṅan arja tan kadiṅ husana masamun i natarnya nis prabha,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>dilahni gupuranya mandra təkapiṅ him ləṅəṅ asaput-saput mukha,</l>
    4000 <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>baṅun mavarahé laranya maka luh ririsan ira anirami kalaṅiṅ rəməṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 718 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_96.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>gr̥ha-rjja ri daləm puri kahiḍəpanya kadi-kadi kadhatvaniṅ tulis,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>anan paṅadəg iṅ natar <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> ika tan hana maṅucap apiṇḍa suṅkava,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>gəluṅnika lukar ndatan kahuniṅanya murarak akusut mareṅ mukha,</l>
    4005 <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>vulatnya kamatéṅgéṅén kadi katona nr̥pati kalavan nareśvarī.</l><note>Stanza numbered 719 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_96.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>yan iṅ masa surup hyaṅ arka lumaya luru səminiṅ asoka riṅ natar,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="75v"/><lb n="20"/>mayat məkar i kəmbaṅiṅ manur aṅémbi atutur i masanya sumpaṅa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>ikaṅ bhramara mantén aṅhréṅ anaṅis paḍa ləṅəṅ arurab-rurab səkar,</l>
    4010 <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>umaṅgah umiṅél gaḍuṅnya mavəlas harəp aluṅ amara srayéṅ tahən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 720 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_96.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>ləṅəṅ ri vijiliṅ śaśāṅka sumanāṅdhadhari ri huvusiṅ ḍavuh pisan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>….. tan aṅu-aṅu améndhar-médhar sari,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>baṅun salahasé-rarasnya juga tan hana lumihat apiṇḍa koméṅan,</l>
    4015 <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>marāṅluh akécap titisni bañuniṅ makara tumus avarṇa kasrépan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 721 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_96.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="76v"/><lb n="27"/>ikaṅ <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> i daləm kadhatvan hinya len kaka-kaka paḍa soka duhkita,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>miyat ri ləyəpiṅ vulan kadi maha mituturana taṅisnya tapva ya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>vilasa aji rakva yan maṅadəg iṅ natar araras akalihan ulas,</l>
    4020 <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>anan kadi katona rakva sira muṅgah adulura mareṅ pasaṅgaman.</l><note>Stanza numbered 722 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_96.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>ya karananikan lumampah adulur-dulur aṅənés i tambvaṅiṅ sasi,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>maha ṅlipurakən taṅisnya mahasiṅ taman araras anisakən uyaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>prapañca miyatiṅ səkar jéṅér aṅimbuhi pamanisi tiksnaniṅ hati,</l>
    4025 <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>viraṅ-rva turidanya tan hana juga-naka paṅimuara riṅ-raṅiṅ hati.</l><note>Stanza numbered 723 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_96.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="35"/>hana galiṅah iṅ mahantən aṅuré gəluṅ amuni taṅisnya tan umuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>gurit nr̥pati ṅūni rakva kavəkas pitéṅanika tinénya riṅ téta,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>kataṅgama ktāṅlilir vinulatanya riniṅa-riṅa-kénya vaspada,</l>
    4030 <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="76r"/><lb n="1"/>yateka vinacanya yan sinuluhanya tiṅət-hiṅət ika-rjja riṅ kapa. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 724 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_97" n="96">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_97.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="2"/>ah rakryan mapa kolahanta bibi yan panékana samayāṅku riṅ karas,</l>
    4035 <l n="b"><lb n="3"/>yadyan ta ṅvaṅ anyidra mañjiṅa mareṅ jinəm anakanakaptiniṅ hulun,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="4"/>résniṅ tvas yadiyan kaciryana sapolahiṅ anilib akalihan huləs,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="5"/>byakta matya kakanta masku kakajin kakahavas inuvarga riṅ ṭikā.</l><note>Stanza numbered 725 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_97.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="6"/>mdi ṅganyan muvah aku vanva ri kité-bu satata paka ratna riṅ purī,</l>
    4040 <l n="b"><lb n="7"/>nojarté-ləpihan yateka hiniḍəp-ku panucap-ucapanta riṅ hulan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="8"/>layvan-teki lavan tapihta ya sinūkṣmaniṅ hutusan amétva-kén taṅis,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="9"/>riṅ paṅkvan-kvi-naras-haras-ku vinédar yva kadi ana katéna vaspada.</l><note>Stanza numbered 726 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_97.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="10"/>ndan yan tan katəkan asambati manéhta saharasa makantéṅan hurip,</l>
    4045 <l n="b"><lb n="11"/>apan deni rusitniṅ amrih aṅiriṅ liriṅ anəkani sésthiniṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="12"/>énak ṅvaṅ pəjah éṅ pasir ləṅəṅ amarna laraniṅ apatamaṅan lulut,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="13"/>riṅ jama-ntara rémyaniṅ salahasa ṅratakəna rasaniṅ pralapita.</l><note>Stanza numbered 727 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_97.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="14"/>yak mati-bu madadya siñjaṅ aku tan sah aguliṅana ta ṅvaṅ iṅ tulam,</l>
    4050 <l n="b"><lb n="15"/>yadyan ṅkanya huvus lukar viru-virun-ku ta védhar anamar-namar karas,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="16"/>sarmāṅdani taṅista maṅəni gurit-ku pagavasani sihta iṅ halun,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="17"/>svargāṅkun ləsəh éṅ təṅahta tinular-tularan i vaṅiniṅ sédhak haṅét</l><note>Stanza numbered 728 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_97.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="18"/>maṅkin saṅśaya śūnya mémbéhi huvusnya mamaca ri gurit nareśvara,</l>
    4055 <l n="b"><lb n="19"/>ndan rakveki huvus sinūkṣma kinirim-kirim i vəkas ikaṅ karasikan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="20"/>ṅuni ratri silib-silib <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> amaliṅ-maliṅ anahali sisiniṅ tapih,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="21"/>santén vuryani sihnya tan ləbur avarṇa kadi sipat i sampuniṅ taṅis.</l><note>Stanza numbered 729 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_97.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="22"/>yékāṅlud rumémék hatinya səḍəṅiṅ smara maṅirim-hirim raras hati,</l>
    4060 <l n="b"><lb n="23"/>kaṅən rakva manis-manisni paṅucap aji sahaja marantunan pipi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="24"/>pantəsan pamibik tapih suji bisa ṅlipu-lipuri panas prihiṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="25"/>marmāṅdani taṅisnya tambéh amaṅun lara turida kéncéṅ smara nala.</l><note>Stanza numbered 730 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_97.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="26"/>nahan hetunikan prapañca kəna rāga sinarik i kaśaktiniṅ smara,</l>
    4065 <l n="b"><lb n="27"/>ləṅləṅ luhnya lalitya méṅéni narendra ana kadi katon sumaṇḍiṅa,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="28"/>ləs śīghran gumuliṅ manurva-kén i luhnya tuna-tuna taṅisnya tan umuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="29"/>riṅ svapneki hiḍəpnya rakva sira yan ḍatəṅa musépi luhnya riṅ sabuk.</l><note>Stanza numbered 731 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_97.08" n="8"> <l n="i"><pb edRef="#JK" n="76v"/><lb n="30"/> taṅhéh yan caritan taṅisnya ana riṅ taman aṅimur-himur puték hati,</l>
    . <l n="j"><lb n="31"/>rém-rém taṅ sasi raśmi mandra kətəriṅ patər akətər aṅambva-kén riris,</l>
    4070 <l n="k"><lb n="32"/>lvir kadya slasa riṅ səkar turuṅ aṅantya ri gəluṅ araras anyar<!-- hañar?--> məkar,</l>
    . <l n="l"><lb n="33"/>muṅva ṅambəki rāga matra vaṅiniṅ kusuma surabhi jaṅga kaṅinan. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 732 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" xml:id="rt_98" n="97">
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="34"/>sakalaṅvan ikiṅ taman amuhara ləṅləṅ asuṅ turida,</l>
    4075 <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="77r"/><lb n="1"/>ri karaṅnya mapaṇḍan apuḍak aṅudhédha katon aṅisis,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="2"/>mapupur hrəbuk arja baṅun asaji rumnya ya karékana,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="3"/>kadi harṣa vəkas-vəkasana kakavin mapatuta ṭikā.</l><note>Stanza numbered 733 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="4"/>hana tīrtha mijil ri alévaṅi parasnya sumoṅ arahur,</l>
    4080 <l n="b"><lb n="5"/>ri tusanya pinañcuran ajajar anir-jara konəṅ-unəṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="6"/>tumibéṅ tahas arja mani maya sateja katon aputih,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="7"/>kadi candrama pūrṇa sirat ika sumamburat asəmu riris.</l><note>Stanza numbered 734 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.03" n="3">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="8"/>ri pasir-pasiriṅ lvah amalahar agə̄ṅ mahəniṅ mabiru,</l>
    4085 <l n="b"><lb n="9"/>vatu antiga ramya mamatiga təpinya tinumpaṅ atap,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="10"/>véréhiṅ bañu tut sisi kasarah avor kusuma nirara,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="11"/>kadi rurva sakeṅ gəluṅ alum apulaṅ pupar arja miṅiṅ.</l><note>Stanza numbered 735 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg> <lg xml:id="rt_98.04" n="4">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="12"/> lalu masa ktaṅ rahina ri vijiliṅ ravi manda lumə̄ṅ,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="13"/>sumékas maraṅ utphala vahu linavad-lavadiṅ bhramara,</l>
    4090 <l n="c"><lb n="14"/>ataṅis-taṅisan jənək amisiki sari tan intar umél,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="15"/>paka luhnya titisnikaṅ ébuni lavénya tumus umili.</l><note>Stanza numbered 736 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.05" n="5">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="16"/>asinaṅ panəḍəṅniṅ asana tan himumbarah arja ruru,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="17"/>umuré səkariaṅ gaḍuṅ avilət anolét avor katirah,</l>
    4095 <l n="c"><lb n="18"/>mənur arja baṅun susu-susup inarak katitih-titihan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="19"/>taru raśmi səminya sa-laṭi kasaraṅ binibit-bibitan.</l><note>Stanza numbered 737 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.06" n="6">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="20"/>ri siriṅnya gunuṅ-gunuṅ aṅililan arja katon aruhar,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="21"/>majuraṅ ya mapajara-jaraṅ i hiriṅnya ləṅəṅ pinaran,</l>
    4100 <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="77v"/><lb n="22"/>sinaput-saput iṅ limut asəmu banantən anyavli marar,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="23"/>kadi kén lukar arja kahariṅətan asmu ririsnya sumar.</l><note>Stanza numbered 738 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.07" n="7">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="24"/>alaṅa ri samipanika rinacanéṅ səkara anjrah harum,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="25"/>asinaṅ tumibéṅ natar arésik amarsa ruru sumahur,</l>
    4105 <l n="c"><lb n="26"/>anagisbhramaranya kasih harəp atīta tiniṅgal-akrn,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="27"/>anmar dyah akuṅ sinalah-asa turuṅ kavavéṅ sayana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 739 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.08" n="8">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="28"/>paḍa suṅkava sinvami tahən ika ruksa katon akusut,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="29"/>aṅésah siraranya maksusak-asikan sinirirniṅ aṅin,</l>
    4110 <l n="c"><lb n="30"/>vəlas asihnya baṅun kapilaṅa pəjah aluṅ asəmu lumé,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="31"/>abalut mataniṅ vuluh anamar harum pinuyur-puyuran.</l><note>Stanza numbered 740 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.09" n="9">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="32"/>hana pañcuran asnét analaga tusnya kinəmbəṅ atis,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="33"/>ri təṅahnika nusa ləyəp i racananya baṅun siluman,</l>
    4115 <l n="c"><lb n="34"/>pinaran-paraniṅ sivuhén asəmu soka kaciryan akuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="35"/>tuhu rantunaniṅ masa kapat alaṅa panamun turida.</l><note>Stanza numbered 741 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.10" n="10"> <l n="i"><pb edRef="#JK" n="77v"/><lb n="35"/> sakaton ri tiliṅniṅ aruṇa tuhu tis-tis asépya asmun,</l>
    . <l n="j"><lb n="36"/>uménéṅ paḍa vismaya kakalaṅə̄n ikan tiniliṅ-tiliṅan,</l>
    . <l n="k"><lb n="37"/>tinilar-tilari riris aluru səkarnya paran ta katon,</l>
    4120 <l n="l"><lb n="38"/>kadi kiṅkiṅiṅ anya malavas aləsəh pinatambaṅakən.</l><note>Stanza numbered 752 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.11" n="11">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="39"/>tadanantara méh sirépa kəñariṅ arka lumə̄ṅ anisih,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="40"/>luməyəp anilib sumurupa katavéṅ-tavéṅan jalada,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="78r"/><lb n="1"/>asinaṅ aa riṅ gagana kadi ranandhi sateja katon,</l>
    4125 <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>panavat-navatiṅ dadali sa-halis arja kumiṅcuṅ avas.</l><note>Stanza numbered 743 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.12" n="12">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>vau séb-séb ikaṅ vəṅi sumaput agatra sasi suména,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>rumavas-ravasiṅ pətəṅ alilaṅ ikaṅ dasa deśa katon,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>maluya kalaṅə̄nya kahidépan ikan linihat-lihatan,</l>
    4130 <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>araras baṅun adyah hinamər i kakuṅnya silih sih apém.</l><note>Stanza numbered 744 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_98.13" n="13">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="7"/>adavan caritan saka-ləṅəṅani ramya nikiṅ nagara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>ri pasirnya təkeṅ vukir alas ika yeki baṅunkalaran,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>pira rakva karas tanahaniṅ aṅapus kakavin ta kunəṅ,/i</l>
    4135 <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>pilu rañca maraṅ kavi vahu kavi tandaṅ amet kalaṅə̄n. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 745 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="rt_99" n="98">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_99.01" n="1">
    4140 <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>nāhan hiṅhan ikaṅ katha carita parva rinacana giṇeṅ pralapita,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>ndan rakveki ṅaranya rāmavijayāstu kasubhaga təkeṅ jagattraya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>antukniṅ kavi lalana nvam alaṅa ləṅəṅ aṅulahakən manah licin,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>ṅhiṅ rakvaṅ aparab taniṅrat i daləm karas arəja vinimba riṅ ṭikā.</l><note>Stanza numbered 746 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_99.02" n="2">
    4145 <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>ṅuni kala bhaṭāra mokṣa mulihiṅ siva pada saha yoga samréti,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="16"/>rug bhrastaṅ yava bhumi kai kadi tan muvah atutur i jatiniṅ kr̥ta,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>śīrṇaṅ sastra su-dharma sasana yateka tinaya-taya mogha tan tinut,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>siṅgih rakva ya kali kala sumaput yata maṅavaki murka dur-jana.</l><note>Stanza numbered 747 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_99.03" n="3">
    4150 <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>maṅke pvan ana mūrti saṅ siniviniṅ nagara séphala śakti nītiman,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="78v"/><lb n="20"/>vira nvam kavi darsaniya maguna raja vinuvus harum priyambada,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>himpar surya mijil sakeṅ udaya paravata sira paka dipaniṅ sarat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>khyāti śrī kr̥ta rajasa-dbhuta panéṅgah i sira tuhu rajaséṅ jagat.</l><note>Stanza numbered 748 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_99.04" n="4">
    4155 <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>mantuk taṅ bhuvana pagəh kadiṅ husana muvah atutur iṅ rasa gama,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>saksa sasana saṅ narendra ya tinutnya satata paḍa bhakti tan salah,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>vaṅ-vaṅ savuka ṅaksa tan hana maliṅ avéh aṅvéhi rajya saṅ prabhu,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>prāpteṅ vana pasir vukir paḍa rinaksa katéṅéṅan ika maṅun laṅa.</l><note>Stanza numbered 749 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_99.05" n="5">
    4160 <l n="a"><lb n="27"/>yāṅde rañca ri buddhiniṅ hulun amarna kaləṅəṅan umuṅgva riṅ karas,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="28"/>tan saṅke vihikan matékya médhara kativasan amarantya-kén vuvus,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="29"/>vruh ṅvaṅ yan cacadén mateki palalun-kvi-ki paka pamavan puték hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="30"/>buṅha tandaṅ i ləṅləṅiṅ pasir amet kaləṅəṅn i katəmvaniṅ hiḍəp.</l><note>Stanza numbered 750 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_99.06" n="6">
    4165 <l n="a"><lb n="31"/>ṅuni ṅvaṅ satata marək-marək i jə̄ṅ nr̥pati huvus akarya sevaka,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="32"/>tan lot ṅanya sirāṅhulun ṅhulun apuṅguṅ akikuk agave panas hati,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="33"/>yāṅde duhkha narendra tanpa tahənan huna mavédi katona de aji,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="34"/>luṅha ṅvaṅ maṅalap kasaṅ saha karas tana umusi ri duṅhusiṅ pasir.</l><note>Stanza numbered 751 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_99.07" n="7">
    4170 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="78v"/><lb n="35"/>ry antukniṅhulun aṅləṅəṅ mahas aṅiṅdhaṅi pasisi marək ri jə̄ṅ aji,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="36"/>mavat bhasa palambaṅ arja ana riṅ karas hinapi sinūkṣma tan umuṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="37"/>nantən teki hiḍəpku rakva lipareki vuyuṅ ira tan aṅliṅ iṅ hulun,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="38"/>maṅkin duhkha karas pamandhém ira riṅ hulun avédi lana sahur taṅis.</l><note>Stanza numbered 752 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_99.08" n="8">
    4175 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="79r"/><lb n="1"/>yekāṅde pətəṅiṅ tvas ardha kapəgan maṅaṅən-aṅən i tan sihiṅ vidhi,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="2"/>aṅhiṅ matya jugeki ṅenaka mara ṅanyuta hurip i salvaṅiṅ pasir,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="3"/>marmāṅkva mrih amarṇanaṅ vaca-vacan jaya-jaya ri narendra riṅ prajā,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="4"/>rapvan randha rikaṅ sarat mapagəha prabhu sinisvin ikag jagattraya. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 753 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    4180<div type="canto" rend="met" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita" xml:id="rt_100" n="99">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+++\-++\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_100.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="5"/>aṅhiṅ soddaga cakra yeka paṅalah śrī nātha riṅ papraṅan,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="6"/>bhraṣṭa siṅ kahava ta denya sinacah malvaṅ pisan sayuta,</l>
    4185 <l n="c"><lb n="7"/>anyat mevivu laksa tan kəna tuha vrég tan valuy yan laga,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="8"/>siṅhəl mvaṅ vaju luṅha mavri malayu vrin-vrin matiṅgal raṅin. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 754 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="rt_101" n="100">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    4190 <lg xml:id="rt_101.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="9"/>siṅgih saptama sūryavaṅśa paṅadəg haji ri huvusiran jayeṅ raṇa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="10"/>təṇḍasniṅ ratu śakti nastha pəjahiṅ ratha tiga vəlas agilaṅ-gilaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="11"/>rvekaṅ śakti mataṅgal amrih aṅusī pakasulayah i madhyaniṅ raṇa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="12"/>rumpukniṅ sasa parvato-lur-uluran-tra paṅavasaniréṅ parāṅmukha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 755 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    4195 <lg xml:id="rt_101.02" n="2">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="13"/>hetunyaṅ yava bhumi śuddha rasana dvaya saṅ hinabhivadha iṅ jagat,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="14"/>kvehniṅ sevaka sapta tiki téka piṅ rva mara marək anambah iṅ sabhā,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="15"/>tanpa lvaṅ sukha homa paṅhilaṅ iréṅ ripu kula pajahiṅ raṇāṅgana,</l>
    . <l n="d"><pb edRef="#JK" n="79v"/><lb n="16"/>lavan saṅ sura saṅghya maṅjaya-jaya-aji hula-hula suṅsaṅiṅ laṅit. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 756 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    4200<div type="canto" rend="met" met="sragdhara" xml:id="rt_102" n="101">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">++++\-++\-\-\-\-\-\-++\-++\-+=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_102.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="17"/>nāhan doniṅ hulun yan hilu kavi kumavi mrākr̥ta vatas kāvya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="18"/>antukniṅ dhairya maṅhyaṅ-hyaṅ i giripati bhakty amrih aṅgə̄ṅ palambaṅ,</l>
    4205 <l n="c"><lb n="19"/>kāya mvaṅ śabda len citta yatika ginəlar parva pañcopacāra,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="20"/>sampun sampūrṇa śīghran kr̥ta vara kadi riṅ svapna yan non bhaṭāra. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 757 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg></div>
    .<div type="canto" rend="met" met="jagaddhita" xml:id="rt_103" n="102">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">+++\-\-+\-+\-\-\-+\-\-\-\-\-\-+\-+\-=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_102.02" n="1">
    4210 <l n="a"><lb n="21"/>ndah yeki pva ṅaranya rāmavijayāstu kavuvusan ikaṅ jagattraya,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="22"/>sampun pūrṇa sinurvan iṅ piḍaḍa kilyaniṅ acala śarīra devata,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="23"/>khyātiṅ rat raya riṅ siṅarsa ya ri uttara riṅ anima sobhita laṅa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="24"/>ndah maṅke pva dhiné bhaṭāra karananya masəpi tuhu tan kadiṅ lagi.</l><note>Stanza numbered 758 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_102.03" n="2">
    4215 <l n="a"><lb n="25"/>yeki pva karaṇanya ramya riṅ husana sira saṅ i harəpku nītiman,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="26"/>khyātiṅ rat sira kavi paṇḍita jatéṅ sarasaniṅ agama-ti durjaya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="27"/>marmanyan sada vah laṅə̄nya karika pinuji-puji patīrthaniṅ sarat,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="28"/>rat bhaktya mararəm paḍa muhun i jə̄ṅira maharəp aṅuṅnya śūnyatā.</l><note>Stanza numbered 759 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_102.04" n="3">
    4220 <l n="a"><lb n="29"/>maṅka saṅ makadharmaniṅhulun apan tuhu-tuhu paramādiniṅ laṅa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="30"/>maṅke ṅvaṅ ati hina duryaśa vimūḍha kasih arép amuktya saṅsāra,</l>
    . <l n="c"><pb edRef="#JK" n="80r"/><lb n="1"/>yāṅde kiṅ-kiṅ ikaṅ manah karirisan lara maravasika ndatan bésur,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="2"/>nél-ṅélén ṅvaṅ i panaputnya dadi luh drava ri mata mataṅnya nis-préha.</l><note>Stanza numbered 760 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_102.05" n="4">
    4225 <l n="a"><lb n="3"/>ləṅləṅ-kan riṅ amanda bhāgyani tuvuh-ku hiniraṅ-hiraṅiṅ parampara,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="4"/>byékta-byékta pakarya riṅ kuna yataka katəmu muvakéṅ kaduryaśan,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="5"/>ndi pvé-ka avanāṅkva yan madéhanaṅ lara ri hati sumar marémbéhan,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="6"/>tan péndah kadi puṣpaniṅ uphala tanpa sara riṅ apa yan hurip muvah.</l><note>Stanza numbered 761 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_102.06" n="5">
    4230 <l n="a"><pb edRef="#JK" n="80r"/><lb n="7"/>duran yan sama ri nilo-tphala larāṅkva ana avan ansmva-kn ayuh,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="8"/>byakta tan mahurip muvah linavad iṅ gərəh aṅirim-hiris lavan riris,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="9"/>lila maluy apuṣpa maṅ-jrah anəḍəṅ bhramara téka kadi mahas maṅa,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="10"/>tan <app><lem type="emn">vvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#JK">vaṅ</rdg></app> matra lar-ṅkva yan(sakaén iṅ) sama-kén iṅ kumuda təkapi mudha-niṅ hulun.</l><note>Stanza numbered 762 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_102.07" n="6">
    4235 <l n="a"><lb n="11"/>byakta-byakta yaté kaṅən-ku kadi tan hiliran ira maha jayeṅ laṅa,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="12"/>yekāṅde kadi tan ləvas géṅi larāṅku dinularan i tan sihiṅ vidhi,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="13"/>sayakta yeki phalanya tan dadi linaṅghana katəmu daridra vah dana,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="14"/>dagdha sina géséṅ hatiṅku ri pamahnya kadi gaduṅ aṅoloṅ ambara.</l><note>Stanza numbered 763 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_102.08" n="7">
    4240 <l n="a"><lb n="15"/>maṅke ṅvaṅ katiban viraṅ-rvaṅ aṅésah prihati riṅ apa yan vənaṅ pasah,</l>
    . <l n="b"><pb edRef="#JK" n="80v"/><lb n="16"/>apan madbhuta kadi sāgara mamarvvata maharus ahombakan unaṅ,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="17"/>ahah bhukti kadun-kr̥tan-mu ya mapaṅ masəmi masəkara anjrah éṅ hati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="18"/>yékoṅ aṅga manavaṅ iṅ kasih harəp-mu riṅ apa ya matiṅgal ujvala.</l><note>Stanza numbered 764 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . <lg xml:id="rt_102.09" n="8">
    4245 <l n="a"><lb n="19"/>maṅka bvatnikanaṅ larāmbək i hatiṅku umənəb ika tan vənaṅ pinəm,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="20"/>jag ḍatəṅ pva vidhi narendra saha pustaka manuruna rāmavijaya,</l>
    . <l n="c"><lb n="21"/>kagyat-gyat manahiṅ hulun dadi maṅa rumasa-rama ri tan sidéṅ gati,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="22"/>tan saṅkaṅ pamihaṅkv astuniṅ asuṅkava təkapi kahinasiṅ hulan. o.</l><note>Stanza numbered 765 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    .</div>
    4250<div type="canto" rend="met" met="basantatilakā" xml:id="rt_104" n="103">
    . <!-- <note type="prosody">++\-+\-\-\-+\-\-+\-+=</note> -->
    . <lg xml:id="rt_104.01" n="1">
    . <l n="a"><lb n="23"/>santoṣa tekini manehta apan vimūḍha,</l>
    . <l n="b"><lb n="24"/>vetnyan virūpanikaṅ akṣara tan sphuṭa ya,</l>
    4255 <l n="c"><lb n="25"/>kveh māti tan hana pənədnya kuraṅ viveka,</l>
    . <l n="d"><lb n="26"/>kevalya bhaktiyani manehta gégén narendra.</l><note>Stanza numbered 766 in <ptr target="#JK"/>.</note></lg>
    . </div>
    . <div xml:id="rt_105">
    . <ab xml:id="rt_105.01" type="colophon">iti kakavin rāmavijaya, samāpta. təlas sinurat riṅ gəria piḍaḍa, duk taṅgal 30 april 1973. varsaniṅ loka.-</ab>
    4260 </div>
    . </div>

    After this line, JK has: (malya-baṅ pinako-pa sobba mideriṅ taretepan ivaṅ), the brackets clearly being meant to cancel the words in question, which are identical to 48.3c. The scribe realized he had skipped ahead.    sampuh […] tətə̄.
